Deeply condemn the blast in Chaman. Those spreading lawlessness in Balochistan are enemies of the province & its people. I express my sympathies and condolences to the bereaved families & prayers for speedy recovery of the injured.

Latest report of International Crisis Group documents grave & manifest dangers to peace & stability in South Asia arising out of fascist Modi's renewed human rights abuses in IOJ&K. It‚Äôs a clarion call 2 international community 2 wake up & force India to put an end to its tyranny

I want to thank Dr Mahathir Bin Mohamad for speaking in support of Kashmiris and against Indian repression in IIOJK - this time at a function on 8 Aug to mark a year of the illegal Indian actions in IIOJK.

I want everyone to join me tomorrow, 9 Aug, in planting trees all over Pak. Have asked my MPs, ministers, Chief Ministers and Tiger Force to participate in the biggest tree planting campaign in our history. The target is 35 lakh trees in a day though we will try to exceed it.

Sad to hear about the Air India plane crash in Kerala. I send my sympathies & condolences to the families whose near and dear ones lost their lives in the tragic incident. My best wishes to the injured for an early recovery.
Saddened to learn of the Air India plane crash in Kerala state leading to loss of innocent lives. May Allah give strength to the bereaved families in their difficult hour.

An internally stable, economically prosperous & united Pakistan can be a strong bulwark against Modi's nefarious designs. Allah has blessed us with everything, what we precisely need is the will to leverage the resources to the benefit of the nation. #AJKaddress

If we follow the path of unity, consensus & purpose as we did during our journey of becoming a nuclear power by overcoming mammoth challenges, my heart says that our dream of 'Kashmir banay ga Pakistan' will be fulfilled. #AJKaddress

If Germany & Japan, which were razed to the ground in WWII, could rise again to become global economic powers through persistent hard work & if Berlin Wall could fall down, there is no reason why IOK cannot become part of Pakistan if we become economically stronger #AJKaddress

It was a great honour & personal privilege for me to address the Azad Kashmir Legislative Assembly today. Thankful to PM AJK who invited me & leaders of other political parties to attend the session. Unity in our ranks provides an impetus to the struggle of Kashmiris. #AJKaddress
Also 6million trees will be planted as part of the Ravi City Project.

The Ravi City project will also bring in foreign exchange through Overseas Pakistani investment in the project. It will create millions of jobs as 40 industries are connected to housing and construction and create wealth, enabling us to start paying off our national debt.

Today I felt great excitement in doing stone laying of Ravi City, one of the biggest mega projects we have launched in our history.This will save Lahore by stopping spread of unplanned urban sprawl, raise water table & revive River Ravi preventing it from becoming a sewerage nala

FM‚Äôs statement about brotherly Saudi Arabia is highly unfortunate & irresponsible. It flies in the face of history of our special & trusted relationship with the Kingdom. The cavalier attitude by this govt is undermining Pakistan's core relations with friendly countries!

PTI govt‚Äôs policy on Kashmir, since the annexation of the valley by fascist Modi, lacks direction & substance. There is a need for a serious & candid review of its performance in this most vital area. Why has Govt failed to present its case effectively to international community?
Pakistan will continue to extend all possible support to the Kashmiri people until they secure this inalienable right.

Pakistan‚Äôs position remains clear & unambiguous. The J&K dispute must be resolved in accordance with the relevant UNSC resolutions granting Kashmiri people the right of self determination under a free & fair plebiscite.

We thank the Council members who expressed concern over the deteriorating human rights & humanitarian situation in IIOJK, advised against escalation of tensions, underscored the need for respecting international law & called for a peaceful resolution of the dispute.

Deeply pained to hear of the massive explosions in Beirut with precious lives lost & thousand injured.We stand in solidarity with our Lebanese brethren in their difficult hour, sharing their sorrow & grief. May Allah grant speedy recovery to the injured & strength to the bereaved

World will be thankful to Kashmiris for standing up to state terrorism & keeping banner of freedom afloat at a time when doing so was not easy. With IOK having been reduced to prison for a year, peace on South Asia is precariously poised. International community should pay heed!

Irrespective of our political/internal differences, today we are together in calling out India for its crimes against humanity in IOK & expressing our unflinching solidarity with our Kashmiri brothers&sisters who are battling Modi's fascism with heroic courage! #5thAugustBlackDay
We have also depicted the aspirations of the Kashmiri people & our commitment to UNSC resolutions in the political map of Pakistan released yesterday.

I will continue to be an ambassador for all Kashmiris whose voices India has tried to silence through its brutal illegal occupation of IIOJK. After many years, my govt raised the Kashmir issue effectively before the UN & exposed the Hindutva Supremacist fascism of the Modi Govt

I will address the AJK Assembly today to show solidarity with Kashmiris on Youm-e-Istehsal. Kashmiris in IIOJK have been subjected to a brutal fascist military siege by India since its illegal actions of 5th Aug last year followed by efforts to change the demography of IIOJK.

Horrific images of death & destruction coming through from Beirut. We stand in complete solidarity with the people and government of Lebanon at this difficult hour. Our profound sympathies & prayers are with the bereaved families who lost their loved ones! üáµüá∞ üá±üáß

Police officers & soldiers are the unsung heroes who have rendered sacrifices as first line of defence in war against terrorism. On the Police Martyrs Day, we pay our rich homage to shuhada for their bravery & courage in the line of duty. The nation is eternally indebted to them!

Grieved to learn about the death of senior party leader Iftikhar-ul-Hassan Shah. He will be remembered for his political wisdom and democratic struggle. Shah sahib was a committed leader & follower of Nawaz Sharif. Inna Lillah e Wainna Elahi Rajioon!

Wishing overseas Pakistanis & Muslims around the world on the auspicious occasion of Eid-ul-Azha. Let us resolve to live in line with the spirit of this blessed Day that teaches us unity & a spirit of sacrifice. Eid Mubarak!

A heart-warming sight to see pilgrims performing Hajj. The day of Hajj is a lesson in unity & togetherness. Mubarak to Hajjaj & Muslims around the world. Saudi Arabia made excellent arrangements in these difficult times. Let us pray to Allah for His mercy & riddance of Covid-19!
I have asked the NDMA Chairman to go to Karachi immediately and start the clean up in the aftermath of the rain.

Had a meeting with British High Commissioner Dr Christian Turner to discuss the ways & means to further strengthen the partnership b/w our two countries. UK is a great friend of Pakistan & has been assisting us in several important areas, particularly health & education!

Given the U-turns & policy flip-flops, the confidence of the business community has been shattered. This government managed to bring the GDP growth rate down from 5.8% to 1.9% due to their mishandling & flawed economic policies.

The gap between the high sounding claims made by Imran Khan and the scary reality on the ground could not be wider. One crisis after another from sugar to wheat to petrol speaks to the sheer incompetence that is eating into the vitals of governance.

All Opposition parties are united in their opinion that the PTI government has plunged the country into an abyss of crises. The common man has been crushed under the weight of skyrocketing inflation with no light at the end of tunnel.
@muddakirbaig @iamFahadChadhar Salgirah Mubarak, Baig sb. Have a healthy & blessed life!

Best wishes to World Bank Country Director Mr. @Illango_WB for his new assignment. We worked very closely with WB in Punjab to bring about tangible improvements especially in the fields of agriculture, irrigation, & lands records management with significant socio-economic impact!

Capt. Muhammad Sarwar Shaheed, the bearer of first Nishan-e-Haider, embraced martyrdom on this day while fighting the Indian Occupation forces in IOK. These sacrifices will not go to waste & Kashmiris will eventually throw off the yoke of Indian slavery, InshaAllah!

The 25th of July will be remembered in history as the day when the people's mandate was stolen and a selected government was imposed on the country. Two years down the line, the experiment has cost Pakistan dearly with governance & economy in their worst shape ever in decades.

Sad to learn about the death of renowned social worker Sister Ruth Lewis. She dedicated her life to the service of special children & was a compassionate face of humanity. Her exemplary empathy and services will continue to blaze the trail. May she rest in peace!

Disappearance of senior journalist Matiullah Jan is highly condemnable & matter of deep concern. The government's campaign to muzzle the media & critical voices is simply shameful. If something happens to Matiullah, PM will be held responsible.

SC judgement in the case against Khawaja brothers is a stinging indictment of the NAB & so-called accountability process which was more of a witch-hunt against them than accountability. Their perseverance & determination is laudable!!

Heard with concern about hospitalisation of His Majesty King Salman bin Abdul Aziz, Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques. The government and people of Pakistan, and I myself, join our Saudi brethren in prayers for His Majesty's swift recovery, good health and long life. Ameen.

Deeply concerned about the health of Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques His Majesty King Salman bin Abdulaziz. The people and the leadership of Saudi Arabia have special place in our hearts. I pray for his speedy recovery and complete health!

As we pay rich tributes to Kashmiris for their unwavering commitment to Pakistan on the anniversary of 'Youm-e-ilhaq-e-Pakistan', the world must know that no other people have suffered as much as Kashmiris have for demanding their UN-sanctioned right to self-determination.

Kashmiris right of self-determination is recognised by the UNSC & under international law. We will continue to fight for justice for Kashmiris as they struggle against the brutal & illegal actions of the Hindutva Supremacist Indian govt in IOJK. I know that justice will prevail.

Despite massive disruptions in global air travel, we have fulfilled our promise of bringing back stranded Pakistanis & our overseas workers.250,000 Pakistanis from around the world have been brought home. My govt will continue to support overseas Pakistanis  in every way possible

Unfortunate that Sartaj Aziz, an upright & thorough gentleman who served Pakistan most honorably, is the latest target of NAB. It represents a new low in the so-called accountability drive spearheaded by the NAB-Niazi nexus.

I urge the nation to continue observing SOPs essential to sustain our positive trend. Eid ul Azha must be celebrated with simplicity so as not to repeat what happened last Eid when SOPs were ignored & our hospitals were choked. I am ordering strict implementation of govt SOPs.

Pak is amongst the fortunate countries where COVID 19 cases in hospitals, esp in intensive care & death rate have gone down, unlike in our unfortunate neighbor India. This positive trend has been the result of our smart lockdown policy & the nation observing govt SOPs.

As part of the Big Lie, IK preached the ministerial sacking to fix responsibility. After the PIA debacle, petroleum, wheat & sugar crises & train accidents, the PM & all the concerned ministers are holding their positions. Hypocrisy is a new normal in "Naya" Pakistan.

CAA's confirmation that all pilot licenses issued by it are genuine is a charge sheet against the PTI govt. Through their ill-considered actions, they have damaged PIA & inflicted heavy loss of billions of rupees on the exchequer in addition to bringing a bad name to the country!

Very sad to know that another renowned academic & a great human being Dr Mustafa Kamal Pasha, VC of Nishtar Medical University Multan passed away due to COVID-19. It‚Äôs a huge loss for all of us. May Allah rest his soul in peace and give sabr to his family and friends!

It is close to 2 years but nothing has been heard about the Lahore Orange Line. The project was just a couple of months away from completion when the PMLN govt completed its tenure. Looks like it fell victim to the incompetence of PTI govt just like many other projects. Shameful!

My condolences & prayers go to the families of Mustafa Kamal Pasha, VC Nishtar Medical University, & Nadeem Mumtaz - both of whom passed away as a result of COVID19. Nadeem Mumtaz and I were together in Aitchison for 9 years.

Supreme sacrifices of the Turkish people who stood up for their fundamental freedoms & rights, on this very day 4 years ago, under the leadership of President Erdogan are exemplary for any democratic nation & will continue to inspire millions around the world. üáµüá∞ üáπüá∑

Hearing about various committees set up by the Govt. for forced retirement of its employees. It wants to do this at a time when people are already hard-pressed economically. The whole matter reeks of ill-will.
PMLN will take up & inquire about this matter in the National Assembly

22 Kashmiri youth took on despotic Dogra Raj in 1931 & wrote a history of bravery. Despite intensification of violence
post-August 5 by India, Kashmiris of all ages & across genders are
challenging Modi‚Äôs fascism today with their blood. They are hope of future! #KashmirMartyrsDay

Pakistan has always stood steadfast for the Kashmiri right to self-determination and will continue to support this just struggle till IOJK is liberated from the clutches of Indian illegal occupation. That day is not far.

Their descendants have, generation after generation, laid down their lives for freedom and today they continue to valiantly fight & defy a Hindutva Supremacist regime bent on demographic engineering to wipe out the Kashmiri people & their identity.

Today, on Yaum-e-Shuhada-e-Kashmir, we salute Kashmiris for their continued struggle against the illegal & barbaric Indian occupation of Jammu & Kashmir. The Shuhada of 13 July 1931 were the forefathers of today's Kashmiri resistance.

Islam, our great religion, is categorical about rights & freedoms of all communities living in Islamic state. Equality is fundamental principle enshrined in Constitution of Pakistan. What Khawaja Asif said in NA was in the context of Islamic teachings & constitutional provisions!

Deeply grieved to learn about the passing away of eminent lawyer Syed Zahid Bokhari, the father of Azma Bokhari, PMLN'dedicated 
Secretary Information Punjab. May Allah rest the departed soul in peace! My heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family!

Israel's plan to annex the Palestinian territory of the West Bank & Jordan Valley flagrantly disregards the international law that will shut the window of finding a two-state solution between Palestine & Israel. Pakistan should take up this issue with OIC, the UN & world powers.

Ban on PIA imposed by several countries with the US being the latest is a consequence of mindless & ill-thought-out speech by Aviation Minister who only wanted to evade responsibility. Look at what he has done to the entire aviation industry besides bringing bad name to Pakistan!

Given the break-neck speed @ which bureaucrats are routinely changed in ‚ÄúNaya Pakistan‚Äù, our administrative structure is teetering on the edge of bureaucratic dysfunction. Loss of confidence that the civil servants are suffering has graver consequences for the state of Pakistan!

When the history of resistance against the Indian fascism in IOK gets written, name of Burhan Wani will stand out for being a personification of inimitable courage, legendary defiance & an unwavering sense of purpose. He will continue to be remembered as a metaphor for resistance

Sorry for the human & material losses that our Chinese friends have suffered due to torrential rains & floods. We, in Pakistan, express our solidarity with the government & the people of China. My deepest sympathies to the families who lost their near & dear ones in these floods!

An increasing number of doctors resigning from their jobs is a reflection of how this govt has lost the confidence of a community that is at the frontlines of fight against Covid-19. It is a stinging indictment of its treatment of doctors especially when they are needed the most.

As a Pakistani, what worries me deeply is the fast evaporating sense of hope in the future. With businesses shutting down, jobs being lost & much more, there is a pervasive sway of despondency. The drift appears to be way deeper than is understood.
Saddened by the news of the death of PPP leader Ayatullah Durrani due to Covid-19. May Allah rest his soul in peace! My most sincere sympathies and condolences to his family & the PPP.

UET Lahore has decided to impose a cut on the salaries & pensions of its employees due to shortage of funds for the first time in history. Drastic cut in budget of Higher Education introduced by IK govt has started to take its toll. This approach presents grim picture of d future
Heartiest congratulations to the government and the people of the United States on their Independence Day üáµüá∞ üá∫üá∏
@SMQureshiPTI My prayers and best wishes for your speedy recovery!

My condolences and prayers go to the families of the deceased. Have directed relevant authorities to ensure facilitation and care for all the families. Our entire railway's operational safety SOPs will be  reviewed immediately.

Deeply saddened at the accident this afternoon at a railway crossing near Sheikhupura which resulted in the death of atleast 20 people, mainly Sikh pilgrims returning from Nankana Sahib. Have directed that proper medical care be provided to the injured.

The LHC Administrative Committee's decision of sacking Accountability Court Judge Arshad Malik establishes that Nawaz Sharif was unjustly sentenced. His innocence stands proven today. As a natural corollary, Mian sb's sentence ought to be declared null & void.

Sending my best wishes and prayers in the way of PMLN MPA Mian Murghoob Ahmad for speedy recovery from Covid-19. He is a dedicated worker of the party who has stood by it through thick and thin. May he get well soon!

Strongly condemn the killing of 60 years old Bashir Ahmad in cold blood in front of his grandson by Indian occupation forces in IOK. Widespread human rights abuses by fascist Modi govt constitute an acid test for the international community. May Allah give Sabr to bereaved family

@BeenishSaleem As friends of China, we welcome any step taken by China to strengthen peace & stability within its frontiers. The self serving defenders of human rights appear to be oblivious to massive human rights violations by Indian forces in occupied territory of Jammu and Kashmir. 2/2

@BeenishSaleem The passage of a new legislation by China relating to Hong Kong is China‚Äôs domestic issue. Those who are expressing concern appear not to have heard of India‚Äôs illegal incorporation of the occupied Territory of Jammu and Kashmir. 1/2
@Shafqat_Mahmood Sad to learn about your loss. May Allah Almighty rest the departed soul in peace. Please accept my heartfelt condolences.

The time of putting blinkers on people's eyes has long gone. IK is a prisoner of the past and has lost touch with reality. He does not know what people think about his rule. He will have the worst reality check come next elections. People will talk back through their vote.

IK is unable to come to terms with the reality of even being selected PM. He should know that his ranting cannot mask his colossal failures in governing the country. People can easily spot the difference b/w Pakistan‚Äôs standing in 2018 & today. He has failed this country big time

Promotion of Major General Nigar Johar to the rank of Lt. General, the first lady officer to reach this position in the history of Pakistan, is a powerful message to our girls & women to aspire for the impossible in life. Congratulations to the newly appointed officer!

Heartbroken at the death of PML-N's hardcore & committed worker Maulvi Tariq Chauhan from Rahimyar Khan. He was an ideological worker & staunch supporter of Nawaz Sharif. May Allah Almighty rest his soul in peace. My heartfelt condolences to his family!

I have approached UN Secretary General and am reaching out to other world leaders. India must be stopped from this unacceptable path that further usurps the legal & internationally guaranteed rights of the Kashmiri people & seriously imperils peace and security in South Asia.

First India's attempt at illegal annexation of IOJK & now its attempts to alter IOJK's demographic structure incl by issuance of domicile certificates to 25,000 Indian nationals are all illegal, in violation of UNSC resolutions & international law, incl 4th Geneva Convention.

Strongly condemn the terrorist attack on Pakistan Stock Exchange. Swift & timely action by law enforcement agencies saved nation from a bigger tragedy. The attack, however, must alert us. Our condolences to bereaved families of martyrs & prayers for speedy recovery of the injured

The UN & international community must take notice of the Indian move to grant domicile certificates of the Occupied Kashmir to thousands of its nationals. This illegal step is aimed at changing the demographic structure of IoK that will render Kashmiri Muslims into a minority.

Saddened by the sorrowful news of the death of Daniyal Aziz's sister, Kiren Aziz who was an accomplished academician & a professor at UC Berkeley. May Allah Almighty rest the departed soul in peace & give fortitude to the bereaved family to bear her loss!

An example of embedded nexus b/w PTI & mafias is that prices of wheat, sugar & medicines that were exorbitantly increased 2 pocket profits have not come down, which means that mafias r skimming millions with full connivance of Niazi, its rhetoric of accountability notwithstanding

Genuine leaderships that are elected by the people keep public interest in view while taking decisions, whereas those who are parachuted into power serve d interests of mafias instead of masses. Last night, PTI govt dropped a huge petrol bomb on masses, taking people for granted!
Am saddened to learn of the passing of  Ex Amir JI Munawwar Hasan sahab. My prayers and condolences go to his family.

Increased prices at a time when there was a disruption in the supply of this vital fuel & less demand show that the only policy this government knows is to extract money from the people. IK's talk about the welfare of the poor is shallow as his actions contradict his rhetoric.

Grieved to learn about the passing away of former Amir of Jamat-i-Islami Syed Munawar Hassan. His services to Pakistan and commitment to Islam were unwavering. May Allah rest his soul in peace! My deepest condolences to the bereaved family & the JI workers.

These atrocities by Indian Occupation forces on orders of the Hindutva Supremacist Occupation Modi govt are well documented by UN, HR orgs & intl media. A continuing silence in the face of such blatant abuse is against int human rights & humanitarian laws & must be unacceptable

Today on International Day in Support of Victims of Torture, I call on the international community to hold India accountable for its human rights abuses in IOJK where women, men & children have faced pellet guns, sexual assault, electrocution, & physical & mental torture.

With latest summons issued to Khawaja Asif, the NAB-Niazi nexus continues to target PML-N to mask their own failures in an attempt to deflect public attention from glaring inadequacies. This method has already been tried umpteen times & is nothing but pure political victimisation

Sad to learn about the passing away of Dr Mughees-ud-Din Sheikh due to Covid-19. Sheikh sahib was a big name in journalism who influenced the life of hundreds of his students that are serving the country in different fields today. May Allah rest his soul in peace!

PTI ministers tearing into each other at the height of pandemic as hundreds are dying & thousands getting infected says a lot about how serious this Tabdeeli Sarkar is. Only goes to show that it is a hotchpotch of political vested interests put together that is ruining Pakistan!

Both Mufti Naeem and Allama Talib Johri were great religious scholars who always spoke about moderation, tolerance & unity within different religious schools of thought. They touched so many people's lives. Spoke to their families to pay my respects & tributes!

Spoke to Shahi Syed, the senior leader of ANP, to convey my condolences to him on the death of his wife. May Allah rest her soul in peace & give patience & fortitude to him and his family to bear her loss!

Grieved to learn about the passing away of noted religious scholar Allama Talib Johari. Allama sahib enlightened a whole generation with his knowledge & excellent oratory. May Allah rest his soul in peace! My heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family& followers of Allama sahib

In standing up for his beliefs in the face of all odds, he sacrificed the best years of his sporting life & lucrative earnings. His strength & courage continue to inspire people across the world even today.

My best wishes & prayers to @murtazawahab1 for his fight against Covid-19. Right from the word go, he has been at the forefront of efforts against the deadly virus & did a wonderful work as Sindh's chief communicator. Get well soon!
Saddened to learn of the passing of a most respected religious scholar and Chancellor of Jamia Binoria International, Mufti Muhammad Naeem.  My prayers and condolences go to his family.

Deeply saddened by the untimely death of Brig. Hasan Afzal due to Covid-19. Not only his family but also the country & the armed forces have lost a patriot & the son of the soil who had devoted himself to the service of the country. May Allah rest his soul in peace!

Grieved to learn about the death of GB Minister for Food & Agriculture Haji Jan Bazkai due to Covid-19. He was a great asset for the party who served the people of GB with complete sincerity & devotion. His services for the party & the country will be remembered for a long time.

I appreciate the philanthropic role played by the Overseas Pakistani community in helping their brothers & sisters abroad during Covid19. There are many examples where the Pakistani community has been a source of inspiration, helping those around in need.

Tomorrow we will partially open airspace for intl flights.This is being done specially to help our Overseas workers who have suffered most in this pandemic but have shown great courage & made us proud. We welcome you back home & our govt will facilitate you in every way.

Saddened by the terrorist bomb attacks on Rangers deployed at Ehsaas cash centres in Karachi, Larkana & Ghotki today. I have asked for an immediate investigation into this so the terrorists can be brought to justice.

Have asked PML-N governments in AJ&K & Gilgit-Baltistan to consider increasing the salary of the government employees & pensioners. The economic conditions may be dire but the provision of relief to the disadvantaged sections is also necessary.

The election of India, with the blood of Kashmiris on its hands, as a non-permanent member of the UNSC is a glaring failure of the PTI government. It did not propose a replacement for the Indian nomination, reflecting its tunnel vision & complacency.
Saddened by the martyrdom of two Rangers personnel in a blast in Ghotki. May Allah rest the departed souls in peace! I express my profound condolences to the bereaved families.

Saddened by the news of sudden death of senior civil servant Najam Saeed. I have known him as an upright, honest & hardworking officer who was a role model to many & inspired them with his conduct. May Allah rest his soul in peace! My heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family!

PM Relief Fund in Larkana, I found a large no of unemployed were Chaabrri-wallahs whom police had stopped from working. I have asked Gov Sindh to take this up with the CM as these poor people do not violate social distancing & their families survival depends on their daily income

The poverty & those unemployed because of Covid19 in Sindh is far greater proportionally than in other provinces acc to applications received by my PM Relief Fund - 32% of all applicants are from Sindh whereas pop of Sindh comprises around 22% of Pak's pop. While distributing

I am appalled at the way this so-called 'Tabdeeli' govt is eating away at the allocations of higher education in Pakistan. The PML-N scaled up the budget almost 4x times during its tenure 2013-18, which has almost been halved 0.5x by Niazi government now.
Saddened to learn of the passing of Tariq Aziz, an icon in his time and a pioneer of our TV game shows. My condolences and prayers go to his family.

Peace in South Asia is precariously poised after Modi's illegal annexation of IoK. Any miscalculation has the potential to rupture it. UN must not allow Indian jingoism to go unnoticed. Modi would do well to fight Corona, not a neighbor that believes in non-interference & peace!

While the world fights the pandemic, India is consumed by jingoism. Siege of Pakistani High Commission in New Dehli & attack on Chinese forces reflect its nefarious designs that can endanger regional peace. We express our unflinching solidarity with Govt. & the people of China!

A familiar aspect of Niazi regime is to pass on the blame to people & hold them responsible for his own confusion‚Äîfrom ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a simple flu‚Äù to ‚Äònot wearing a mask himself‚Äô to ‚Äúawam serious nahi le rahi‚Äù. The buck stops with PM & he can't shrug the responsibility off his shoulders!

Wishing H.E. President Xi on his birthday. He is a statesman of our times &a global leader whose vision of shared prosperity is capable of steering the world out of the pressing problems. People of Pakistan greatly value his role & contribution to strengthening Sino-Pak relations

Reform is continuous process that gets better through multiagency buy-in in an environment that promotes engagement & consensus-building on national issues. Unfortunately this fact has been lost on those whose understanding of 21st-century governance is confined to portals & apps
Sad to learn about the death of MNA Ch Noor Tanveer's nephew due to Covid-19 today. May Allah rest the departed soul peace and give Sabr to the bereaved family!

From 2013-18: We built power plants, motorways, schools, medical colleges, universities, hospitals, ports, airports, hydro projects. In short: Under Nawaz Sharif‚Äôs leadership we built Pakistan. Where did money go under PTI Govt? despite 30% increase in national debt in just 2 yrs

Deeply touched by the concern shown by Chinese government on my health & I am grateful to the Chinese leadership for the offer of medical care. It is very thoughtful of our great friends. This concern also reflects deep bond between peoples of our two countries. üáµüá∞ üá®üá≥
In a nutshell: This budget has nothing for the poor and the working class & does nothing to revive the economy!

The government says it will collect 27% or Rs 1050 billion more in taxes but doesn‚Äôt tell us how it will do that. Mark my words: there will be a mini-budget and this PTI government will try to raise taxes through the backdoor.
Agricultural output decreased by 2.9% last year and one cannot logically blame Covid-19 for that. The reduction in cotton of 6.9% will further decrease textile exports.
Large scale manufacturing is down by 7.8%. Yet the budget has no plans to revive the manufacturing. This was a time when reduction in the sales tax and duties was warranted.
The social protection budget in the coming year has also been reduced from Rs. 245 billion to Rs 230 billion even though Covid-19 is likely to be with us for much of next year. This is anti-poor.

Where is development expenditures to create jobs & cause growth? Govt should have come up with increased PSDP funding and innovative programs to redress increasing unemployment and poverty. Instead the PSDP budget has decreased from Rs 701 billion to Rs 650 billion.

IK cannot hide behind Corona pandemic to justify his stark failure. All economic indicators show that Pakistan is in reverse gear since he assumed office in 2018. My worst apprehensions have been proven right: people are being punished for the govt‚Äôs lack of vision & capability!

I congratulate Azam Nazir Tarar Advocate on his election as Chairman of the Executive Committee of Pakistan Bar Council, an honour he fully deserves. Hope he will continue to play a great role in upholding the rule of law.

Senior PML-N leader Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has tested positive for Covid-19. A thorough gentleman & seasoned politician who conducted the business of the National Assembly impartially as a Speaker. I wish him a speedy recovery and good health.

Takeaway: The threat levels posed by Covid-19 are alarmingly high. I appeal to people from the core of my heart to be extraoridinarily careful. The households should desginate one person for necessary outdoor chores. Others should strictly stay home. (n/n)

I am deeply touched by your messages and grateful to all those who conveyed their best wishes to me. After feeling a bit unwell couple of days ago, I decided to go for the Covid-19 test. Unfortunately, it turned out to be positive. (1/n)
Our govt successfully transferred Rs. 120 billion in 9 weeks to over 10 million families in a transparent manner to deal with the COVID19 fallout on the poor.

Saddened to learn, only today, of the passing of Dr Ijaz Ahsan. He was a founder mbr of PTI & stood by us during the difficult days when our Party was being mocked by the status quo. He was a mbr of our CEC & diligently attended all mtgs. My prayers & condolences go to the family

Sad to hear about the Covid-19 infection of PMLN's General Secretary Ahsan Iqbal. He is not only a senior politician of the country but also an embodiment of nobility, competence, and unwavering ideological commitment. I pray to Allah for his speedy & complete recovery!

Learned about the Covid-19 infection of PMLN's spokesperson Maryam Aurangzeb & her mother. Sending my prayers and best wishes their way for a speedy recovery.

Covid-19 is everywhere, infecting people. Wishing eminent journalist Sohail Warraich a quick and complete recovery from the virus. He remains a powerful voice for democracy & rule of law. His columns are an intellectual feast for the readers. Get well soon, Sohail sahib!

The shortage of petrol in parts of Pakistan is a sign that this government cannot provide even the most essential necessities of life to the people. Every day dawns with fresh evidence of their incompetence. The journey of fake Tabdeeli will come to haunt our people.

Sending my prayers and best wishes to senior PML-N leader Shahid Khaqan Abbasi for a speedy recovery from corona infection. He is a great asset to the party whose competence, & honesty is above board. May he get well soon!

Heartbroken at the loss of precious human lives in a PIA aircraft crash. May Allah Almighty rest the departed souls in peace & give Sabr to the bereaved families. May those injured recover soon including a very dear colleague of mine. Ameen!

PML-N offered its unconditional support to the government & presented concrete & practicable suggestions to fight Covid-19 in consultation with other Opposition parties. These recommendations could have served the nation well but the government refused to listen.

On the direction of Quaid Mian Nawaz Sharif, PML-N took an active part in relief & welfare activities throughout the country including the delivery of medical kits to the doctors & paramedics. It is in line with our motto of 'politics of public service'.

We demand the restoration of the local government institutions. These LG institutions can be very effective in providing relief to the masses at their doorstep. The government is not tapping this massive trained human resources due to political consideration.

Clear lack of direction & strategy at govt level. Confusion is manifest in matters related to the lockdown, provision of PPEs to medical staff & determination of interest rate. Telethons cannot be a substitute for coordinated economic & administrative public policy.

Everywhere in the world, the public policy on the pandemic is being formulated in consultation with the health experts who are leading the fight. The disdain & neglect with which this government has been treating our doctors & their advice is criminal, to say the least.

Remembering Allama Iqbal on his death anniversary: a philosopher, poetic genius & statesman of his times whose revolutionary ideas & thoughts shaped the history of the sub-continent. Iqbal continues to remain unifying figure for Pakistan & a beacon of light amid the darkness.

Received a letter from the U.S. Ambassador, detailing American assistance to Pakistan to fight Covid-19. We are grateful to the U.S. govt for supporting Pakistan at this difficult hour and extend our sympathies to the American people for the loss of human lives due to Covid-19.

Indian Army Chief whose record of human rights violations is globally well documented & which has kept ~8 million people in complete lockdown for months on end has the audacity to accuse others of terror, familiar but failed tactic used the umpteenth times. A brazen hypocrisy!!!

My prayers also for early recovery of those still battling COVID19. You are all in our prayers. We can never forget all of you far away from Pak who continue to do us proud & are our greatest asset, playing a critical role in Pak's development through remittances & charity work.

Glad that CM GB, civil admin & our armed forces r doing remarkable work & achieved significant success in containing infections in GB. I am told that +ve cases have significantly reduced & patients r being kept in hotels-turned-quarantine facilities having access to proper diet!

Wishing all our Christian citizens a happy Easter. Please stay safe and keep your families safe during the COVID19 pandemic by praying and celebrating at home; & by observing the national safety protocols

Visited my constituency today to check on the people. PMLN is taking part in the relief activities through its workers and public reps. I urge everyone to play a role in the noble mission of looking after the deserving & also adhere to precautions & guidelines to stay safe!

Sad to learn about the death of Mehdi Shah, brother-in-law of Murad Ali Shah. I express my most sincere condolences and sympathies to Shah sahib and his family on the irreparable loss. May Allah Almighty rest the departed soul in peace!

Local governments should be restored instead of putting up a facade of Tigers' force. Proper testing system should be devised in public hospitals; the doctors be provided with protective gear. The protection of their life means the protection of people's lives. NO COMPROMISE!

At a time when nation is fighting COVID-19, PM dismantled the health regulator. In the absence of PMDC, no doctor can b registered & it is the doctors country needs the most. There is no regulatory institution at the moment to monitor the delivery of health services to the people

PM Azad Kashmir informed me that he has turned new PM House, all officer clubs, hotels & rest houses into quarantine. Test laboratories have been set up with their own resources. Better coordination is needed between Federal govt, provinces & AJK/GB for a unified & swift testing.

I wish HRH Prince Charles @ClarenceHouse and PM @BorisJohnson speedy recovery, good health and long life. This deadly virus #COVID19 has hit people beyond borders. We need an internationally coordinated response to counter it. #TogetherWeCan

The issue of the lack of proper training to health staff to treat COVID-19 patients was raised and it was suggested that the government should immediately liaise with the Chinese government & have the master trainers ready to impart training to medical staff. Very Important! 2/2

As we see a rise in the number of Corona cases, it is important we refrain from stigmatizing those suffering from the virus. We need to be kind, humane & cooperative towards our fellow beings at these tough times. Also let‚Äôs respect the privacy of patients. May God bless you all!

Just learnt of the +ve corona test of PM @BorisJohnson. I wish His Royal Highness Prince Charles & the British PM early recovery & a healthy life. May all those infected with this virus anywhere in the world get well soon!

Lesson from China: It locked down Wuhan city which was the epicenter of COVID-19. It then concentrated all its resources there & rest of the country helped Wuhan. God forbid, if the virus spreads everywhere, things may go out of control. SO, ENFORCE LOCK DOWN IN LETTER & SPIRIT!!

This will end inconvenience caused to citizens having to wait in long queues and numerous trips to govt offices. After a trial period in Islamabad we will introduce this service in other cities as well.

Incldng e-policing, emergency services, NIC, domiciles, passports, arms licenses, vehicle registration, token tax payments, birth & death certificates & other services. App will also allow rapid response by the Administration to  shortages of goods incldng vital medical supplies.

Today my govt fulfilled another commitment when I launched the ICT City App bringing govt directly to ppl's doorstep & all city depts together. This has become even more critical during this time of COVID 19 pandemic. As many as 43 different services are being provided online

Committee of Parliamentary leaders should be turned into Parliamentary Monitoring Committee. Restoration of the local government system can be the key to turn around the situation at the grass-roots. Wisdom & courage should inform government's policy instead of anger & arrogance.

1st instalment of 5000 protective gears & 5000 masks handed over to an association of doctors. The members of the medical fraternity are at the forefront of the national fight against Covid-19. They need to be well equipped with the necessary equipment to continue doing their job

In wake of current situation, the Opposition has decided to take back its requisition for summoning session of the National Assembly. Social distancing must be practised and lives must be protected. We will continue to play our role in battling this pandemic.

Have directed PMLN Senators, MNAs, MPAs, office-holders & reps of local govts to take an active part in relief & welfare activities‚Äî as suggested by many of U inc @mughira2. Working together can sail us through this crisis. The challenge relates 2 our survival & national security

Disappointed by PM‚Äôs intentional absence from the meeting of parliamentary leaders today. It seems he is still not ready to listen to the Opposition & the whole country just saw the seriousness of its Chief Executive. I was left with no option but to walk out in protest.

Grateful to all the national leaders who participated in an APC to discuss the anti-COVID strategy today. We are at a critical juncture & need unity in our ranks. We demand that National Action Plan should be prepared in consultation with Opposition to deal with situation.

Govt should reduce petrol prices to Rs. 70/ liter. Such a step will provide massive relief to the people & bring down inflation.  POL prices are at their historic low in the global market & govt will not suffer any loss if it reduces the prices. #PresserCOVID19

Observing extreme precaution & staying home are the only ways through which we can guard ourselves against COVID-19. I would appeal to all of U to play your role in persuading the people in your circles to act upon the guidelines prescribed by relevant departments #PresserCOVID19

In order to deal with the COVID-19 in terms of provision of resources for free testing & procurement of necessary equipment, the govt should slash interest rate by 3-4%, which will allow for availability of approx. Rs. 80 billion to fund the anti-Corona campaign. #PresserCOVID19

Media is the fourth pillar of the state. It has proactively been raising awareness & prevention campaigns regarding COVID-19. I would ask the Prime Minister to collaborate with all the media, without any bias, to make the awareness campaign more result-oriented. #PresserCOVID19

In order to rid our medical professionals waging this fight against COVID-19 of any financial worry, the government should immediately double their salaries (x2) so that they can exclusively focus on the job at hand. #PresserCOVID19

In addition to Rs.13-14 B to b procured from Bait-ul-Maal funds, the govt should consider deferring the payment of utility bills to the extent of Rs.5000 if it cannot waive them off. At the moment, such households are not in a position to pay gas/electricity bills #PresserCOVID19

Plus, the BISP system can be used to register the poorest of the poor in cities for the provision of financial assistance until the end of this scourage. The funds at the disposal of Bailt-ul-Maal can also be used for this purpose. #PresserCOVID19
So far BISP is serving around 5.4M households. If the poverty scorecard is made flexible, it can lead to the inclusion of 3-4 million more poor families. Plus ++

Separate health facilities should be dedicated to the treatment of Corona patients. If the patients of this virus are treated in hospitals dealing with all kinds of patients, all the efforts to contain COVID-19 may become counterproductive. #PresserCOVID19

Govt should make a comprehensive plan for the provision of food to the vulnerable sections of society during the course of lock-down and communicate it clearly. PMLN MNAs/MPAs/workers will also be actively involved in their respective constituencies to contribute. #PresserCOVID19

The government should immediately make the testing for COVID-19 free of cost. The poor & underprivileged sections of society, already crushed under the weight of inflation, are not in a position to pay for the costlier test. #PresserCOVID19

We will donate 10,000 protective kits, whose design has duly been approved by DRAP, to the medical association. Govt need to look for all possible sources for equipment, testing kits, and protective gears on the war-footing basis & airlift them from anywhere it can procure them..

I demand of the PM to convene the meeting of CCI to map out a shared & nationally owned anti-Corona strategy. I also demand that a National Task Force represented by all political parties should be constituted immediately. #PresserCOVID19

I consider bringing politics into the national fight a sin. While we acknowledge & appreciate govt for good work, it is equally important to highlight the failures. Taftan is one such example of bad management that caused increased COVID-19 footprint in Pakistan #PresserCOVID19

Our hearts go out to the families who lost their loved ones to the COVID-19 scourge. We pray to Allah Almighty to rest the departed souls in peace & give their families the fortitude to bear irreparable loss! Ameen! #PresserCOVID19

A big shout out to the members of the medical fraternity who are putting their lives on the line to treat the ailing humanity. They certainly are our heroes & benefactors. We cannot thank them enough for their courage and sense of sacrifice. 

#PresserCOVID19

As the nation celebrates Pakistan Day today & pays its homage to the founding fathers, there could be no greater relevance of the message of the Day than it is today. We must emerge as one nation 2 defeat COVID-19. High time we revived the spirit that marked our freedom struggle!

On the basis of my meetings with public health experts, party leaders & public feedback I am of the considered opinion that it has become essential that the govt imposes the lockdown to contain COVID-19. Any further delay in taking this vital decision has serious implications.
@anum_zahoor Beti, by the grace of Allah, we will collectively & successfully deal with this challenge IA!

Had preliminary conf call with experts to assess current situation. Have convened another video-linked meeting of senior party leaders tonight 2 decide on what PMLN can do to mitigate the threat. Ur feedback is welcome - would be helpful to gauge  situation in ur respective areas
It is about time the world community put interests of humanity first & assisted Iran in mitigating the common COVID-19 challenge.

Received letter from Iranian ambassador to Pakistan in which he detailed serious obstacles Iran is facing in combating COVID-19. U.S sanctions r adding to Iranian people's miseries. World must realise that unless the last person is cured, no one & I repeat NO ONE would be safe!!!

Despite global pandemic of COVID 19, we remain committed to supporting our Afghan brothers & sisters. I have given instructions to open the Chaman-Spinboldak border & let trucks crossover into Afghanistan. In time of crisis, we remain steadfast with Afghanistan.
Special abilities children are our asset, not a liability. Hope better sense prevails among those who want to be rulers.
Saddened to hear of the death of PTI worker Mohammad Hassan who was badly injured during our Mohmand public meeting. My prayers and condolences go to the family. PTI will ensure the family's welfare.

Our doctors, nurses, and medical staff are front-line warriors, waging this war for the physical well-being of all of us. They are our heroes & deserve utmost respect and cooperation. Govt MUST facilitate/equip them to ensure their safety, as COVID-19 cases increase sharply!

Lest the world should forget: Over 80,00000 people in Indian occupied Kashmir still remain under an oppressive & crippling lockdown due to MODIVIRUS since 5th Aug 2019. Despite its available treatment, the world at large turned a blind eye and didn't feel their pain and anguish!!
We are alert to the dangers & have put in place sufficient protocols for the safety and health of our people. The WHO has commended our efforts as being amongst the best in the world.

I want to inform the nation I am personally overseeing measures to deal with COVID 19 & will address the nation soon. I would advise people to follow safety instructions issued by our govt. While there is a need for caution there is no need for panic.

Govt must also look into locally customised solutions as well, ones based on our local conditions & shaped by our peculiar dynamics. National fight against Corona must transcend all political divides & emerge as a collective fight for a HEALTHY PAKISTAN. Take care, everyone!!!

The government alone can't deal with the COVID-19 threat. Whichever profession or walk of life we may belong to, we need to come together as one people. I appeal to the families to cooperate with the doctors & medical staff and help/let them treat the patients as per guidelines.

Our People must exhibit an unwavering sense of duty by acting upon the precautions for the well-being of everyone around us. Our dengue experience is an example of how we did it together back then. We CAN DO it now as well.

History bears witness to the fact that great Pakistani nation is capable of overcoming any adversity & defeating any challenge. Each crisis has strengthened us & brought the best out of us. Coronavirus may be a serious health hazard but it is not bigger than OUR national resolve>
I want to congratulate Afghanistan's President Ashraf Ghani & look forward to working with him. Pakistan will do everything it possibly can to bring peace and stability in our region.

Deeply saddened to hear of the passing of Anwaar Husain Haqqi, journalist from Mianwali, who joined me when most people ridiculed PTI. He stood with me and PTI through thick and thin. My prayers and condolences go to his family.
Wishing all our Hindu community a very happy and peaceful Holi, the festival of colours.

During PMLN's term in office, we made our modest contribution to women empowerment by launching projects such as Zeevar-e-Taleem, Punjab Educational Endowment Fund, WomenOnWheels, & the establishment of Violence against Women Centre, to mention only a few. Time to take it forward

Following the great Sunnah of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH), we not only need to treat our families well but also support our mothers, sisters and wives in life. And this should be a matter of duty, not a favour to our women.

As we acknowledge d amazing services of our women in every field of life including agriculture/science/sports, it‚Äôs equally important to realise the issues they face in their day-to-day lives. Equal opportunities to grow & a sense of safety @ workplaces & home r just basic rights

If this Supremacist ideology is not checked it will target all communities in India incldng Dalits & eventually anyone who dares to disagree with this fascist ideology will be the target of violence. The consequences will be felt beyond the region unless resolute action is taken.
Deeply saddened by the passing away of renowned comedian Amanullah. He spent his whole life in spreading smiles on the faces of people. May Allah rest his soul in peace!

Sadly, few voices from the Muslim World are speaking out & condemning this; & more voices are being raised in the West condemning the Hindu Supremacist Modi regime's massacre of Muslims in India & Kashmiris in IOJK.

PM Citizen Portal application crosses mark of 1.5 mn users within 15 mths, with 92% resolution of public complaints. This result is unprecedented in Pak & I commend my team for bridging the gap between citizens & govt depts. This is actual citizens' empowerment. 
#PCP #PMhazirHay

Good to see Cabinet decisions to reduce inflation, incl subsidy on products through Utility Stores, starting to bear fruit. Inflation rate for Feb shows decline by more than 2% versus Jan. We will continue pursuing measures to bring down inflation & reduce burden on citizens
The Trump administration must pursue peace in South Asia & press India to lift curfew in IoK with the same determination with which it finally brought the Afghan conflict to a negotiated end. (3/3)
It is now incumbent on all parties to give peace a solid chance. The Afghan people have already suffered enough. They need sustainable peace & opportunities to unlock their potential. (2/3)

The signing of a peace deal between the US & Taliban represents a huge opportunity for Afghanistan & the whole region. Pakistan has rendered untold sacrifices for global peace & stability which should be lauded... (1/3)

Now all stakeholders have to ensure that spoilers are kept at bay. My prayers for peace for the Afghan people who have suffered 4 decades of bloodshed. Pakistan is committed to playing its role  in ensuring the agreement holds & succeeds in bringing peace to Afghanistan.

We welcome the Doha Accord signed between US & the Taliban.This is the start of a peace & reconciliation process to end decades of war & suffering of the Afghan people. I have always maintained that a pol solution, no matter how complex, is the only meaningful path to peace.

This technological feat will revolutionize the economy, trade and life style in the most inaccessible areas of Balochistan and increase interprovincial harmony and stregthen the federation of Pakistan to initiate a new era of development. (2/2)

Deeply saddened by the loss of precious human lives in an unfortunate incident of the collision of a train with the passenger bus in Sukkur. My heartfelt sympathies and condolences to the bereaved families.

Images coming out of Muslim homes & businesses being burnt, Muslims being beaten & killed, mosques & graveyards being burnt & desecrated are similar to Jews fleeing the pogrom in Nazi Germany. The world must accept this brutal reality of the Modi fascist racist regime & stop it.

As I have stating repeatedly, Modi's Hindu Supremacist agenda is akin to the Nazi pogrom of Jews in the 1930s while  the major powers appeased Hitler. Modi conducted pogrom against Muslims in Gujarat as CM & now we are seeing the same in New Delhi.

Feb 27 marks a watershed in the history of Pakistan Air Force. Other than demonstrating superior professional excellence, PAF action established that Pakistani servicemen & women are second to none when it comes to courage, sacrifice & dedication. Nation is proud of their heroes!
I want to warn our people that anyone in Pakistan targeting our non-Muslim citizens or their places of worship will be dealt with strictly. Our minorities are equal citizens of this country.

As I had predicted in my address to UN GA last yr, once the genie is out of the bottle the bloodshed will get worse. IOJK was the beginning. Now 200 million Muslims in India are being targeted. The world community must act now.
Today in India we are seeing the Nazi-inspired RSS ideology take over a nuclear-armed state of over a billion people. Whenever a racist ideology based on hatred takes over, it leads to bloodshed.

As a result of Govt focus on price control, substantial decrease in prices, especially in vegetable prices, can now be seen. I assure our people that I will not relent until all involved in artificially-created price hikes are identified & punished.

Today is Kashmir Women Resistance Day. For 7 decades, Indian forces have committed war crimes against women in IOJK. Their sufferings have multiplied after 5 Aug siege by Modi Govt. I urge world community, esp women, to become voice of resilient Kashmiri women for peace in IOJK.

News from Karachi continues to be distressing as govt is unable to get a handle on the gas leak crisis. I urge Punjab govt to assist through the forensic lab as it has the capacity to detect and trace the chemistry of such toxic elements.
Very distressed at the loss of precious lives in Karachi and Quetta today. My heart goes out to the affected families of those who passed away.
Congratulations to the Pakistan Kabbadi team for winning the Kabbadi World Cup after defeating India.

Very sad to hear about the passing away of Naeem-ul-Haq. My profound condolences to the bereaved family and the PTI. May Allah rest his soul in peace!

In the last two years I saw him battle cancer with courage and optimism. Till the very end he was involved in Party affairs and attended cabinet meetings as long as he was able. His passing has left an irreplaceable void.

Am devastated by one of my oldest friend Naeem's passing. He was one of the 10 founding mbrs of PTI & by far the most loyal. In 23 yrs of PTI's trials &  tribulations, he stood by me. He was always there for support whenever we were at our lowest ebb.

President @RTErdogan‚Äôs unequivocal statement on FATF & Kashmir reflects his love of Pakistan. His relentless advocacy of Palestinian cause represents aspirations of Muslims around the world. People of üáµüá∞ & üáπüá∑ are one nation living in two states. Long live Pak-Turkey friendship!
I have issued instructions to our Foreign Office and Overseas Ministry to do everything possible for our students who are stuck in Wuhan city.

Pakistan stands with the people & govt of China in their difficult & trying time and it will always stand by them. We will be extending every material & moral support to China just as China has always stood by us during all our times of trial and tribulation.

Congratulations to Ali Zafar & mbrs of PM's Prisoners Aid Committee, which finalised its reform package report for effective prison reform. It will ensure greater public safety & rehab of prisoners on the principle that a prison sentence does not imply deprivation of human rights

The IK government has rendered the foundations of the country‚Äôs economy hollow. The implications of weak economy for national security are serious & our survival lies in reviving economy... Right Now!

At the same time all the relevant govt Agencies have begun doing an in-depth probe into the flour & sugar price hikes. The nation should rest assured that all those responsible will be held accountable & penalised.

I understand the difficulties ordinary people incl salaried class are confronting & have decided, come what may, my govt will be announcing various measures that will be taken to reduce prices of basic food items for the common man in Cabinet on Tuesday.
I welcome the Bangladesh cricket team to Pakistan and the resumption of test cricket in Pakistan.

Even though there were groundless & false accusations of corruption against the 3 BRT projects built by PMLN & they were derided as 'Jangla' bus, these were completed in record time & provide dignified & safe travel to the citizens, especially women & the daily wage earners.

Cost of Peshawar Metro (still incomplete) is almost equal to the cost of Lahore, RWP-Islamabad & Multan BRTs combined. Lahore BRT 27km @ Rs 29.65B cost AND Peshawar BRT 27.6 km @ Rs. 90+ Billion cost. No wonder PTI got stay orders from courts to prevent corruption inquiry...
~ Rs. 11,000 Billion*

Record debt of Rs 11,000 that PTI govt has accumulated in just 18 months (more than 30% of all debt incurred in 70 years) has mortgaged our future. Q is: where has all the money gone? It will take a generation to clean the mess created by this incompetent & clueless Niazi regime!
To top it all, it created 'aata' crisis, benefiting crony mafias & making life miserable for the poor.

PTI govt has asked IMF to reduce tax collection targets by Rs 800 billion. If last year's deficit of 8.9% of GDP, the highest in Pakistan's history was not inflationary enough, govt is expected to run a deficit of around 9.5%, which means more inflation & further debt pile-up...>

No amount of brute Indian power has succeeded in silencing brave Kashmiris. The chapters of exemplary courage they are writing to annals of human history will continue to inspire oppressed people... Pakistan will always stand by its Kashmiri brothers & sisters.

With food inflation more than 20%, now even the stock market is nose-diving. The stock market declines 1220 points while the callously incompetent and connivingly corrupt PTI leaders sit and watch the destruction of our economy.

It was not just my own dignity that was put at stake. What hurt me more deeply was the least regard and respect for the country. Pakistan was made to look bad in the eyes of our friends. The UK government has been an amazing development partner of Pakistan.

Had there had been even a shred of evidence against me in this case, NAB and ARU would not have spared me & NAB would not have arrested me in false and spurious Aashiyana & Chaudhry Sugar Mills cases. Rather it would have nabbed me in the alleged embezzlement case without fail.

IK knows that he can neither beat us in an open political field nor in the field of service delivery. The only game he can play well and in an unsportsmanlike manner is the hurling of unsubstantiated allegations against opponents & U-turns.

This story was part of the character assassination campaign launched by IK's government in the name of accountability. The purpose of this campaign was to create doubts in the mind of the common people about my &  my party‚Äôs integrity & sully the record of public service.

Today I have filed a lawsuit in the London High Court against Daily Mail Online for publishing a false, defamatory & misleading story against me. Carter-Ruck, a law firm in the UK, will represent me in the court of law.

Peaceful protest is fundamental human right & central to growth of democracy. Constitution clearly provides framework for resolution of all disputes through dialogue & engagement. Police's treatment of MNA Mohsin Dawar, Ammar Rashid & their companions was unwarranted & deplorable

As friends and brothers, we are deeply concerned at the deaths caused by the outbreak of Coronavirus in China. We express our sympathies to the bereaved families and show our solidarity with the government and and people of China.

IK & his team are mired in conflict of interest, incompetence, showmanship & falsities. No wonder our economy is devastated, inflation is rampant, and poverty/unemployment is rising due to their naive understanding of governance. The result is there for everyone to see.

Deeply saddened by the news of an earthquake that hit eastern part of Turkey. We stand by our brothers & sisters at this hour of grief. My heartfelt condolences to President @RTErdogan and the whole Turkish nation on human and material losses.

Deeply saddened by the loss of so many precious lives and of hundreds injured in Turkey‚Äôs earthquake. Our thoughts and prayers are with the brotherly people and government of Turkey. Pakistan stands by them and is ready to lend any assistance in this hour of need.

As the world celebrates International day of Education, It is unfortunate that PTI govt has cut down the budget of higher education. Stipend schemes launched by PML-N in Punjab are also being rolled back. It appears education does not figure anywhere in priorities of this govt!
I want Pakistanis at home and abroad to come out on 5th Feb in support of the 8 million Kashmiris who have been besieged by 900k Indian soldiers for almost 6 months by the fascist racist Modi regime

Reg. Alice Wells' repeated comments on CPEC: China & Pakistan have been engaged in the process of negotiating CPEC in a transparent way & there is a high-powered Joint Coordination Committee (JCC) where the candid conversations on all aspects of CPEC take place & decisions taken!

Transparency International's ranking of Pakistan on CPI is a proof that governance was more transparent during PML-N's tenure under leadership of NS than it is under PTI that was selected on ‚Äòanti-corruption‚Äô agenda. Rhetoric, divorced from realities, has a limited shelf life!

Reports of surge in sugar prices after deepening flour crisis are worrisome. Through its flawed economic policies, this incompetent govt is making sure that the poor get poorer and only a select mafia, close to the rulers, lines their pockets at the cost of people. Horrible!!!

Grateful to Allah Almighty for the bail of Fawad Hassan Fawad. He has been one of the most competent civil servants whose honesty is above board. His stellar contributions to public service will continue to inspire many.

I want to make clear to India and the international community that if India continues its military attacks killing civilians across LOC, Pakistan will find it increasingly difficult to remain an inactive observer along the LOC.

As Indian Occupation forces continue to target & kill civilians across the LOC with increasing intensity & frequency, there is an urgent need for UN SC to insist India allow UNMOGIP return to IOJK-side of LOC. We fear an Indian false flag operation.

Aata crisis and massive price hike is yet another reminder of sheer callousness that is hallmark of the PTI government. People's lives are being made miserable by the day with government‚Äôs apathetic attitude!

Grateful to China, Turkey & Malaysia for their unstinted support for Kashmiris.. Called India out on its post-Aug 5 actions in IOK. At a time when silence vis-a-vis rights abuses is a global norm, these countries have been on right side of history& showed others the way forward.

Modi regime cannot hide the reality of grave human rights abuses in Occupied Kashmir by arranging guided diplomatic tours of the Valley. EU diplomats did well to turn down invitation of the Indian govt after they were not allowed to meet the detained political Kashmiri leaders.

J&K dispute must be resolved in accordance with relevant UN Security Council resolutions & the will of the Kashmiri people.¬†We will continue to provide moral, political and diplomatic support to the Kashmiri people until they secure their inalienable right to self-determination.

Pakistan welcomes UN Security Council discussing the situation in Jammu & Kashmir again. An internationally recognized dispute, J&K remains on the Security Council‚Äôs agenda & its consideration by the Council reflects a recognition of the seriousness of the prevailing situation.

Reports of a surge in HIV/AIDS cases on the heels of massive failure in polio and dengue cases in Punjab reflect not only lack of vision but also misplaced priorities. Every other day, the people are being reminded of how inept & incompetent this government is.

My deepest condolences to the bereaved families whose near and dear ones lost their lives due to snowfall and massive rains in AJ&K and Balochistan. May Allah rest the departed souls in peace! Fed/provincial govts must expedite the rescue work for those affected by these events.

The severe snowfalls and landslides in AJK have caused misery & deaths. I have asked the NDMA, the military & all our federal ministers to immediately provide all humanitarian assistance on an emergency footing to the affected people in AJK.

Very kind of @KarzaiH for sparing time to visit Mian Nawaz Sharif to inquire after his health. I have always maintained that our sorrows and happiness are shared and the future of Pakistan & Afghanistan is interwoven, challenges notwithstanding.

Deeply grieved on the passing away of His Majesty Sultan Qaboos bin Said al-Said, a visionary leader who led Oman to become a prosperous nation. In his death, Pakistan has lost a great friend. I extend our condolences to the brotherly people of Oman.

I extend our deepest condolences to people of Oman on the passing of His Majesty Sultan Qaboos bin Said al Said. He was a visionary & transformed Oman into a vibrant, modern state.Oman has lost a beloved leader & Pakistan a close, trusted friend.May his soul rest in eternal peace

I have demanded an immediate report on the condemnable cowardly terrorist attack in Quetta targeting a mosque & people at prayers. Have asked prov govt to ensure all medical facilities are provided to the injured. Martyred DSP Haji Amanullah was a brave & exemplary officer.
Strongly condemn the blast in Quetta. My profound condolences and sympathies are with the bereaved families of the martyrs. Prayers for early recovery of the injured.

I have asked FM Qureshi to visit Iran, KSA & USA to meet with respective foreign ministers, Secretary of State; & COAS Gen Bajwa to contact relevant military leaders to convey a clear message: Pakistan is ready to play it's role for peace but it can never again be part of any war

I want to congratulate IG Punjab Shoaib Dastgir and the Punjab police for successfully going after hardened criminals in the province. This has sent a positive message of a new culture of zero tolerance in the Punjab police for criminals.

In contrast, Modi's RSS vision supports minorities oppression & the targeted attacks against Muslims are part of this agenda. RSS goons conducting public lynchings, Muslims being violated by mobs are all not only supported by Modi Govt but Indian police leads anti-Muslim attacks

The major difference between the condemnable Nankana incident & the ongoing attacks across India on Muslims & other minorities is this: the former is against my vision & will find zero tolerance & protection from the govt incl police & judiciary;

As curfew enters 150th day in IoK, Kashmiris continue 2 b subjected 2 grave human rights abuses. Silence of world community has perpetuated their nightmare, emboldening Modi & Amit 2 wreak havoc on religious minorities in India. Global indifference is only adding 2 ppl‚Äôs miseries

May 2020 prove to be the most fulfilling year for everyone! 

May Allah bless Pakistan with peace, prosperity, & a bright future!  

Happy New Year!

PTI's commitment to the strengthening of institutions stands exposed as Parliament is purposefully & routinely ignored when it comes to discussing vital national issues. Ordinances have been the preferred route at the cost of parliamentary enactments.

Given the extremely cold weather conditions I have asked CMs of Punjab & KP to ensure that no person is left out without shelter; & their administrations must take immediate action to provide temporary shelters plus food for those who cannot be accommodated in existing Panagahs.

Remembering Mohtrama Benazir Bhutto on her death anniversary. She was an icon, a leader with grace whose services to democracy will continue to be eulogised. Pakistani politics is never the same without her. May Allah rest her soul in peace!

All our young aspiring leaders should make our Quaid their role model. He was Sadiq & Ameen; & his 40-year struggle was not for personal gain but to achieve a Homeland for the Muslims of the subcontinent where they could live as free citizens second to none.

Today, on Quaid-i-Azam's birthday, we as a nation must resolve to build Pakistan in accordance with his vision of an Islamic welfare state based on compassion & human dignity; justice & rule of law; & a plural inclusivist society.

Happy birthday to my brother & leader Mian Nawaz Sharif whose proven record of public service, nation-building & a struggle for democracy will continue to inspire a generation. May Allah give him health, happiness & a long life! Thank you for your prayers and messages too!
Wishing all our Christian citizens a Happy Christmas.

As we celebrate the Quaid-i-Azam's birth anniversary, the events taking place across the border have reaffirmed his vision, political wisdom and farsightedness. We can't thank the Quaid enough for his gift that is Pakistan.

Wishing all Christian brothers and sisters on the festive occasion of Christmas! 

May this day bring peace, happiness and prosperity for all!

Being elected representative of the people,Ahsan Iqbal is authorised to take initiatives for welfare of his electorate. Narowal has been totally transformed under his leadership. Poor NAB tactics can neither deter us from our commitment 2 public service nor hide IK‚Äôs incompetence

Provocative statements by the Indian authorities are symptomatic of the mindset currently ruling New Dehli. In order to take the focus away from the homegrown movement, the Modi govt is likely to cause trouble on the borders. Modi-Amit duo have Kashmirised the whole of India!

I have been warning the int community of this for some time & am reiterating again: if India does such an operation to divert attention from its domestic chaos plus whip up war hysteria to mobilise Hindu nationalism, Pak will have no option but to give a befitting response.

The whole world is waiting to see what happens to oppressed Kashmiris in IOK when curfew is lifted. Does the BJP govt think by using greater military force against Kashmiris in IOK, it will stop the freedom movement? Chances are it will gain momentum.
Pakistan must immediately call an emergency meeting of the UN Security Council and should engage all friendly countries for a strong and decisive strategy.
We will stand by our Kashmiri brethren with voice, sweat & blood and will go to every last limit and beyond to safeguard their legal and human right to self-determination.

Strongly Condemn abrogation of Article 370 by the BJP Govt. India's unilateral revoking of Kashmir's status as a disputed Territory is an open declaration of war against the United Nations and a test of the international community.

Peace in our streets, villages, cities and surroundings owes itself to the blood and sacrifices of our Police force. May the martyrs continue to smile in heaven and the bereaved families find the strength to bear this irreparable loss of their loved ones!

President Trump offered to mediate on Kashmir. This is the time to do so as situation deteriorates there and along the LOC with new aggressive actions being taken by Indian occupation forces. This has the potential to blow up into a regional crisis.

It is time to end the long night of suffering for the people of Occupied Kashmir. They must be allowed to exercise their right to self determination according to UN SC resolutions.The only road to peace & security in South Asia runs through a peaceful & just settlement of Kashmir

I condemn India's attack across LOC on innocent civilians & it's use of cluster munitions in violation of int humanitarian law and it's own commitments under the 1983 Convention on Certain Conventional Weapons. UNSC must take note of this international threat to peace & security.

The Indian government's intent to do away with special status of the occupied Kashmir will expose the region to a new round of tensions. Modi is playing with fire. High time that Pakistan raised the issue internationally.
Horsing trading won and democracy got undermined again today. It is not just Opposition's loss. We will get down to the bottom of the matter and those who sold their conscience will be exposed.
@_AbdullahNaeem @humairabadar Salgirah Mubarak @humairabadar beta! Wish you a great day & life.. God bless

I salute our armed forces personnel who continue to lay down their lives fighting terrorists to keep the nation safe. My condolences & prayers go to the families of the10 brave soldiers, including an officer, martyred fighting terrorists in North Waziristan & Balochistan today.

Congratulations Rt. Hon. Boris Johnson MP on your election as Conservative Party Leader & on assuming PM's Office. I am confident that under your leadership not only the UK & its people will prosper but our bilateral relations will also flourish.I look forward to working with you

Imran Khan suffers from Nawaz phobia. He does not have the capacity to think about issues beyond NS. Optics more than substance defined Niazi sahib's tour to the US. His propensity for 'U-turns' was on full display in Washington.

Niazi sahib proved to be an outright liar when he declared the Pakistani media to be independent. He has ushered in the worst reign of censorship and the media gagging, something that even the dictators failed to accomplish.
Heartiest congratulations to Mr. @BorisJohnson on winning the party's nomination for the slot of the PM of his country. I am sure the UK-Pakistan friendship will further prosper under his leadership.

3. Surprised by reaction of India to Pres Trump's offer of mediation to bring Pak & India to dialogue table for resolving Kashmir conflict which has held subcontinent hostage for 70 yrs. Generations of Kashmiris have suffered & are suffering daily and need conflict resolution.

2. I want to assure President Trump Pakistan will do everything within its power to facilitate the Afghan peace process. The world owes it to the long-suffering Afghan people to bring about peace after 4 decades of conflict.

1. I want to thank President Trump for his warm & gracious hospitality, his understanding of Pakistan's point of view & his wonderful way of putting our entire delegation at ease. Appreciate the President taking out time to show us the historic White House private quarters.
Appreciate ICJ‚Äôs decision not to acquit, release & return Commander Kulbhushan Jadhav to India. He is guilty of crimes against the people of Pakistan. Pakistan shall proceed further as per law.
Omg what a finish of the tournament... well-played ENG and NZ, both of you equally deserved this win!
