Have decided to file law suit against Daily Mail. The fabricated and misleading story was published at the behest of Imran Khan and Shahzad Akbar. We will also launch legal proceedings against them. Btw IK has yet to respond to three such cases I filed against him for defamation.

The poverty of the people is the actual cause of the devastation and ruination of a country; & the main cause of the poverty of the people is the desire of its ruler and officers to amass wealth and possessions whether by fair or foul means
Hazrat Ali (AS) 
Nahjul Balagha

I want to thank our overseas workers for sending more remittances through banking channels. Remittances for the past fiscal year came in much higher at 9.7 % annual growth & totalled $21.8 bn for the yr. This was much higher than the previous year when they grew only 2.9 %

Saddened to learn of train accident in Sadiqabad. My condolences to the victims families and prayers for the speedy recovery of the injured. Have asked Railways Minister to take emergency steps to counter decades of neglect of railway infrastructure & ensure safety standards.
Well-played NZ!

Remembering Mohtrama Fatima Jinnah on her death anniversary. Her role firstly by the side of our beloved Quaid-i-Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah during the freedom struggle and then to uphold democracy was iconic and legendary. Her rich legacy will continue to guide our journey.

I was delighted to launch the National Poverty Graduation Initiative, one of the several initiatives we will launch under @Ehsaas_Pk this year. The key aim is to lift millions out of poverty by targeting funds, resources and skills training at the most marginalized communities.
My prayers for those martyred along the LoC in defence of the motherland. The soldiers are our heroes and benefactors. May Allah grant sabr to the bereaved families!

Appreciate the excellent performance of Ministry of Power: Generated additional revenue of Rs.106 bn in 8 months (Oct 2018 - May 2019) compared to same period last year (Oct 2017 - May 2018). 75% of this revenue increase is the result of the Anti Theft Drive. PTI Govt delivering.

I want to congratulate the Power Ministry. On 2nd July we reached the highest ever power supply at 22,550 MW in national grid with the system running smoothly across the country; almost 3000MW more than the max supply last summer. 1/2

Congratulations to the Pakistan team for keeping their nerve under pressure and in the end winning against Afghanistan. I also especially want to congratulate Afghanistan for the grit and determination with which they played against Pakistan today & against India earlier.
Imad, Wahab, Shadab ‚Äî What a performance by tailenders under immense pressure! Mubarak üáµüá∞

Had a great meeting with Afghanistan President @ashrafghani earlier today. A peaceful & prosperous Afghanistan is integral to peace & development in Af-Pak region. We look forward to the strengthening of our brotherly bond.

During the PML-N government, 350 thousand students belonging to deserving families got scholarship under the Punjab Education Endowment Fund. Over six lac girl students of South Punjab got a monthly stipend to stay in schools. The myopic vision of IK will push Pakistan backward.

All scholarships done away with. Universities asked to increase fees. The budget of higher education reduced by over Rs. 20 billion. This is how the guardians of Naya Pakistan are playing havoc with the future of the country.
Congratulations to our cricket team for a great comeback. Congratulations especially go to Babar, Haris and Shaheen for their brilliant performances.
There is still time for the government to revise the Budget and make it people-friendly. Yesterday, I suggested a whole range of measures that can be incorporated to make it less harsh on the people.

The free-fall of rupee against dollar has further overburdened people, making it next to impossible for them to make their both ends meet. The PTI govt has neither a plan nor capacity to run the economy and steer the country out of the problems created by their own incompetence.

How do you explain the government's economic policy? If Budget is anything to go by, it spells pain and misery for the people. This Budget, coming on the heels of two failed mini-budgets, will further contract economy, lead to price hike & reduce social sector spending.

As of today over 1 million citizens have registered at Pakistan Citizens Portal within 8 months of its launch. This is  testament of people‚Äôs trust in the system & its effectiveness. No political or bureaucratic reference required to reach out to a public office.
#PMHazirHai

5/5 3. Finally, even though India may be the favourites, banish all fear of losing. Just give your best and fight till the last ball. Then accept whatever the result like true sportsmen. The nation's prayers are with all of you. Good Luck.

4/5 1. In order ro have a winning offensive strategy Sarfaraz must go in with specialist batsmen and bowlers because "Raillu Kattas" rarely perform under pressure - especially the intense kind that will be generated today. 2. Unless pitch is damp, Sarfaraz must win the toss & bat

3/5 All fears of losing should be banished from the mind as the mind can only process one thought at a time. Fear  of losing leads to a negative & defensive strategy & crucially mistakes by opponents are not pounced upon. So here are my suggestions for Sarfaraz & Pakistan team:

2/5 Today, given the intensity of the match, both teams will come under great mental pressure and the power of the mind will decide the outcome of the match today. In Sarfaraz we are fortunate to have a bold captain & today he will have to be at his daring best.

When I started my cricketing career I assumed success was 70% talent & 30% mind. By the time I finished playing cricket I felt it was 50-50 ratio. But now I tend to agree with my friend Gavaskar it's 60% mental strength & 40 % talent. Today role of mind will be more than 60% 1/5

Time for nation to stop glorifying money launderers who have damaged our nation & impoverished our ppl & now seeking refuge behind "democracy". No protocol shd be extended to them. Where are plunderers of public wealth given such special treatment? Time to treat them as criminals

Deeply saddened to learn of the shahadat of 3 officers &1 soldier from a terrorist-planted IED blast in Kharkamar, N.Waziristan. My condolences to the families of the Shuhada & prayers for recovery of the injured.

Want to congratulate Omar Ayub and Secretary Irfan Ali for the way they went after the electricity thieves and worked on removing bottlenecks in the electricity transmission - thus allowing Pakistanis the luxury of having the first load shedding-free Ramazan.

Eid Mubarak to my Pakistanis. Wishing you all a Happy Eid. Let us all resolve to to stand up as a united nation to overcome our economic crisis while putting the least amount of burden on the poorer section of our society.

I appreciate Pak Mil's unprecedented voluntary initiative of stringent cuts in their defence expenditures for next FY bec of our critical financial situation, despite multiple security challenges. My govt will spend this money saved on dev of merged tribal areas & Balochistan.
Congratulations¬†team Pakistan! A brilliant victory & a great match of cricket.

Congratulations to the Pakistan cricket team for a great win and for coming back into form after a poor start in the warm up matches and the first WC match. You have the talent, all you need is the self belief that you can go all the way.

A failed government is bent upon adding to the woes of the people. At a time when petrol prices are decreasing in the world, the Niazi government has been consistently increasing them. There cannot be a worse example of running a country without a vision, experience & capability!

My advice to the Pakistan team today is what I would tell my players before a match: Give your 100 percent, fight to the last ball and never let the fear of losing enter your mind, influence your strategy or play. Pakistan‚Äôs prayers and support are with Sarfaraz and the team.

Youm-e-Takbeer symbolises our national resolve to protect our sovereignty and territorial integrity. It was the day when MNS rejected all inducements & pressures to make Pakistan nuclear power. Pakistan stands for peace but with honour.

I want to thank the people of Karachi for donating Rs 24 crore at the Friday fundraising Iftar for SKMTH. The generosity of my people never ceases to amaze me. InshaAllah will soon collect money to pay off our debts.
Dependence on imported fuels to be brought down from 41 percent to 30 percent in 5 years and less than 20 percent in 10 years using hydel, renewables and local fuels like Thar coal.

I congratulate Omar Ayub and his whole team. Rs 81 billion increase in collection in 8 months. Rs 58 billion from theft control. 80 percent of the country free from load shedding. Zero load shedding at sehr and iftar. Keep up the good work. This is Naya Pakistan.
I congratulate Prime Minister Modi on the electoral victory of BJP and allies. Look forward to working with him for peace, progress and prosperity in South Asia

I hope this Ramazan people will open their hearts & donate generously to SKMTH for treatment of poor cancer patients. Challenge for SKMTH now even greater as poor patients provided treatment at SKMTH in Lhr & Peshawar, Construction of Pak's 3rd & biggest SKMTH in Khi also ongoing
I want to thank the donors at the Islamabad SKMTH fundraising iftar last night where  a record Rs 20 crores was raised.
My condolences and prayers go to Asif Ali & his family on the passing of his daughter from cancer. May Allah give them strength to bear such a precious loss.

I want to thank all the donors at SKMT fundraising iftar for breaking all previous records and donating Rs 20 crores tonight. All zakat donations are only used to give free treatment to the cancer patients.
Strongly condemn the terror blast outside Data Darbar this morning. Have asked Punjab govt to provide all assistance to the injured & families of victims.
Today 4th May is the death anniversary of Tipu Sultan - a man I admire because he preferred freedom and died fighting for it rather than live a life of enslavement.

My condolences & prayers go to the families of our 3 soldiers martyred while repulsing condemnable terrorist attack in Alwara area of N Waziristan. We salute the bravery & sacrifices of our soldiers in combating terrorists.
3/3 And now we have entered the final phase: to build Pakistan on the principles of Riyasat-i-Madina -  a society based on justice, compassion and the dignity of our human beings.
2/3 It took 15 years in the  political wilderness before my message penetrated amongst the masses. It took another 7 years to convert our movement into a party capable of fighting elections.

Today is PTI's 23rd Anniv. Our struggle has been the greatest of any party since Independence & gone thru 3 phases: 1st phase was mobilising ppl on our msg for change; to fight corrupt status quo & make ppl aware that a nation only progresses by developing its Human Resources 1/3
Tragic Easter carnage in Sri Lank. We mourn the loss of innocent lives. Stand by Sri Lanka and the Christian community around the globe in this hour of grief.

Strongly condemn the horrific terrorist attack in Sri Lanka on Easter Sunday  resulting in precious lives lost & hundreds injured. My profound condolences go to our Sri Lankan brethren. Pakistan stands in complete solidarity with Sri Lanka in their hour of grief.
Wishing all our Christian citizens a happy Easter.

As per NDMA, 39 people have died and 135 people are missing so far in the ongoing storms and torrential rains but we see no word or rescue efforts by the govt. Such an apathetic attitude of the govt is mind boggling and condemnable.

The catastrophic fire at the Notre-Dame has saddened the entire global community. Notre-Dame is a sacred place of worship for the Christians & belongs to a shared global heritage. Our hearts go out to France & the Christian community across the world.

Deeply saddened & have strongly condemned the terrorist attack in Hazarganji market area of Quetta targeting our innocent people. I have asked for an immediate inquiry & increased security for the ppl. Prayers go to the families of the victims & for early recovery of the injured.

CDA's biggest plots' auction results in highest ever return for CDA - Rs 11.28 bn. This highlights 2 imp facts: One, it is a vote of confidence in future of Pakistan's economy; two, it reveals how much money has been lost in the past because of non-tranparent, corrupt practices.

Allah blessed my younger son with a boy while my elder son got blessed with a baby girl after 20 years of marriage. Little girl had to undergo major heart surgery in London within a week of birth. I haven‚Äôt seen both of them yet because of my detention and my name being on ECL.

When ldrs in Israel & India show a moral bankruptcy in their readiness to annex occupied West Bank & IOK in defiance of int law, UNSC resolutions & their own Constitution for votes, don't their ppl feel a sense of outrage & wonder how far they will go simply to win an election?
Our prayers go to the people of Iran as they deal with unprecedented flooding. We stand ready to provide any humanitarian assistance required.
Our Prophet PBUH said: "Many nations before you were destroyed where there was one law for the powerful and another for the weak‚Äù.

The truth always prevails and is always the best policy. BJP's attempt to win elections through whipping up war hysteria and false claims of downing a Pak F 16 has backfired with US Defence officials also confirming that no F16 was missing from Pakistan's fleet.

Our prov & fed elected reps must visit Panah Gahs in their areas & share a meal with the people using them. This will sensitise them to issues faced by the bottom tier of our society. In the coming months I will personally monitor effectiveness of our poverty alleviation jihad

While defending the motherland, three more Pak fauj jawans embraced shahadat in unprovoked shelling by india yesterday. The nation salutes you and our thoughts and prayers are with you and your families!

Today on #WorldAutismAwarenessDay there is global recognition not only of Autism but also the immense potential of persons with Autism. I want to assure parents & teachers we will have a policy that ensures welfare of persons with Autism & allows them to realise their potential.
I am delighted to congratulate friend of Pakistan Recep Tayyip Erdogan on another important victory in the Turkish local elections. The people of Pakistan wish him many more successes.
@fia_sara @president_pmln People think I rarely smile and you have spectacularly captured that :) thank you so much!
Grateful to Allah Almighty for acceptance of NS's bail plea. May He give him health and long life!

What a pleasure it was to see the paintings at Alhamra made by the special students of Oasis School for autism that my daughter has been running since 2009. Was impressed by their amazing qualities. Whatever be the challenges in life, one should never give up!

Another commitment fulfilled to bring what was FATA into the mainstream. Last Friday in the jalsa I had promised the people of Bajaur 3 G service. Now  3 G  service has been launched in Tehsil Khawar in Bajaur.

Pakistan Day is a reminder that this country was achieved for a higher purpose. We have yet to travel quite a distance to reach that destination. We pay rich tributes to the vision of our founding fathers and sacrifices of the people in their struggle to carve out this homeland..

I welcome PM Modi's message to our people. As we celebrate Pakistan Day I  believe it is time to begin a comprehensive dialogue with India to address & resolve all issues, esp the central issue of Kashmir, & forge a new relationship based on peace & prosperity for all our people.

Received msg from PM Modi: "I extend my greetings & best wishes to the people of Pakistan on the National Day of Pakistan. It is time that ppl of Sub-continent work together for a democratic, peaceful, progressive & prosperous region, in an atmosphere free of terror and violence"
A Happy Nauroze to all those celebrating it.
Wishing the Hindu community on the festive occasion of Holi - the festival of colors. May this day be a source of peace and happiness for all!
Wishing our Hindu community a very happy and peaceful Holi, the festival of colours.
Congratulations to Afghanistan on their team's first ever win in test cricket. The Afghan cricketers have achieved amazing successes in such a short period of their exposure to international cricket.

Congratulations to PCB, all the organisers & security forces for holding a successful PSL extravaganza in Pakistan. Congratulations to Quetta Gladiators & their manager & my friend Viv Richards on their win. InshaAllah, the next PSL will be held entirely in Pakistan.

Living up to our commitment. A 3-week consultative process on 10 yr Dev Plan for former FATA is being initiated, starting from Bajaur. Our ppl in the tribal area will see unprecedented development as Govt plans to spend over Rs100 billion annually for 10 yrs in tribal districts

We stand ready to extend all our support to the families of Pakistani victims of the terrorist attack in Christchurch. Pakistan is proud of Mian Naeem Rashid who was martyred trying to tackle the White Supremacist terrorist & his courage will be recognized with a national award.

Strongly condemn the horrible incident of terrorism in Christchurch. Shocked at the massacre of innocent people in a New Zealand Mosque. I express my condolences and sympathies with breaved families, government and the people of New Zealand. 
-ss

Shocked and strongly condemn the Christchurch, New Zealand, terrorist attack on mosques. This reaffirms what we have always maintained: that terrorism does not have a religion. Prayers go to the victims and their families.

I am extremely disappointed by decision of Punjab Assembly to raise pays & privileges of MPAs, Ministers & esp CM. Once prosperity returns to Pak such a move cld be justified, but now, when we do not have resources to provide basic amenities to all our people, this is untenable
@betterpakistan Unfortunately, removal of Dr Saeed Akhtar not only damaged the performance of this hospital & research centre but also demotivated the most  competent doctors and staff.

Got great news of successful liver transplant procedure at PKLI. Congrats to Dr Saeed Akhtar, Dr Faisal Dar, former health minister Kh Salman Rafique & relevant health dept officials for their efforts in setting up this public sector facility- 100% free for those who can't afford

I have asked the Punjab CM to ensure that every health facility in the country is made available for Nawaz Sharif to get the treatment of his choice. The federal govt will assist wherever required. I wish him good health.
Satisfied that the government under the PML-N introduced massive reforms for women empowerment. Our commitment to the women empowerment agenda is absolute and will continue to uphold it. (2/2)

A day to celebrate and honour the incredible work our women are doing to strengthen their families, communities and the country. The women of Pakistan have come a long way off but a lot needs to be accomplished and soon. (1/2)

Met Mian sb earlier today. He has severe pain in his arm, which is, God forbid, symptomatic of something serious. Tried to convince him to shift to hospital but to no avail. I appeal to all friends, supporters and the people at large to pray for his health!

I welcome CJ's statement on punishing those who give false testimony. ‚ÄúJourney towards truth‚Äù is a journey towards Naya Pakistan. Nations become great because they have a higher value system. Muslim civilisation's foundation was State of Medina with truthfulness as the core value

The common man is bearing the brunt of the government's lopsided policies on the economy. It appears there was neither any plan at hand nor has it been worked out six months into the government. Mere political rhetoric won't work.

PTI government has also failed to devise any economic policy to cope with the growing economic challenges by the country. Economic strength is imperative and a pre-requisite to make our defense invincible and diplomatic efforts effective.

Foreign investment has already dropped by 77% during first 6 months of PTI govt. Inflation rate has risen to 8.2% compared to last year in Feb'19. Govt's ill advised policies have increased hardships faced by people esp due 2 rising price of electricity, gas, petrol & fertilisers

I am not worthy of the Nobel Peace prize. The person worthy of this would be the one who solves the Kashmir dispute according to the wishes of the Kashmiri people and paves the way for peace & human development in the subcontinent.

Wars are not a solution to any dispute. Unless Kashmir issue is resolved as per the UN resolutions & aspirations of the Kashmiris, a durable peace will not be established in South Asia. Pakistan should continue to extend its moral, political & diplomatic support to the Kashmiris.
@MustafaRamday Allah be praised!

Pleased to know that SC has cleared Dr. Saeed Akhtar from all charges. Admire him for his competence & humble nature. No one can deny his great services in setting up state of the art Pakistan Kidney & Liver Institute in Lahore & network of hepatitis prevention clinics in Punjab!

... where thousands of the people were killed, maimed & rendered homeless, still, nothing was done to stop the human misery. Scapegoating Pakistan for its colossal failures in Indian occupied Kashmir is an old Indian policy. (2/2)

When it suited the international powers, they took no time to ensure separation of East Timor, South Sudan on religious grounds. But when it comes to the independence of the Muslims, the global powers go quiet. Look at the Bosnian and Palestinians examples where... (1/2)

The kind of human rights abuses that are being committed in the Indian occupied Kashmir, it is natural that such an oppressed land will give birth to people like Wani & Dar. Do not expect 'flowers' to grow from a soil that has been watered by the blood of innocent people.

India provoked Pakistan & Pakistan has the right and is capable of defending it's frontiers. The international community should also take notice of Modi sarkar‚Äôs aggressions & brutalities in the occupied Kashmir taking lives of innocent civilians for its petty political gains!

I have issued instructions today that Afghan refugees who are registered can open bank accounts and from now onwards they can participate in the formal economy of the country . This should have been done a long time ago.
@SalmanSufi7 Yea the food pix forced me to keep an eye on u

Pakistan's contributions and sacrifices against the war on terror are known to the world. The Indian leadership is jeopardizing the regional peace for its petty political interests by taking lives of innocent Kashmiris.
@saaadmalikk Would have to complete Peshawar metro first
@azkhawaja1 But don‚Äôt ask for an underpass in the name of AB or wiese. U know that‚Äôs not possible for now
WHAT A GAME!!! Have been waiting for such a knock by AB. Incredible!
Well played Lahore!! great young talent seen on both sides esp Umar & Haris.
@Razarumi Thank u Raza sahib.. hope u r doing great!

Allah's blessings, my mother's prayers, my brother's guidance, my family's love & the strength of the party workers & people of Pakistan along with a clear conscience have given me the courage to stand with conviction and righteousness .....

We should all thank Allah almighty for the continuing winter rains that are worth billions to the economy apart from replenishing our water table and glaciers plus countering air pollution. InshaAllah we will have a bumper wheat crop this year.

2/2 Deficit in services trade also down by 800 mn & Overseas Pakistanis' remittances up by 12.2% July 2018 to Jan 2019 from same period a yr ago. The clear improvements in our external accounts indices prove success of our economic policies.
Our economic stabilization measures now showing positive results with exports rising & imports falling for Jan 2019 compared to Jan 2018 leading to to a $1 bn reduction in trade deficit. 1/2

In my meeting today with IMF Managing Director Christine Lagarde there was a convergence of our views on the need to carry out deep structural reforms to put the country on the path of sustainable development in which the most vulnerable segments of society are protected.

The brutality of Indian security forces in Occupied Kashmir has rallied all Kashmiris together in their demand for freedom from Indian Occupation. The Indian army is not fighting insurgents but an entire people in IOK. All freedom loving ppl in the world must stand with Kashmiris

I have tasked the relevant govt stakeholders to make necessary arrangements for the Torkhum border to work round the clock within next 6 months. This step will be instrumental in boosting bilateral trade & enhancing people to people contacts between the two brotherly countries.

My condolences go to the people of Afghanistan at the great loss of life suffered in the condemnable act of terror in Maidan Wardak province on Monday; I pray that peace will return soon to our war-ravaged neighbour.

The grief & anger of the ppl of Pak on Sahiwal incident is understandable & justified. I assure the nation that when I return from Qatar not only will the guilty be given exemplary punishment but I will review the entire structure of Punjab police & start process of reforming it.

Still shocked at seeing the traumatized children who saw their parents shot before their eyes. Any parent would be shocked as they would think of their own children in such a traumatic situation. These children will now be fully looked after by the state as its responsibility.

Why are some of our lawmakers so scared of the ECL? Why are they so keen to go abroad? There is so much work to be done by politicians in & for Pak -  the land they claim to love but some cannot wait to take frequent trips abroad & lawmakers have iqamas or residencies abroad.

Over the years my faith in the goodness of mankind has increased greatly. Shaukat Khanum Memorial Cancer Hospital @SKMCH is a living tribute to your kindness and generosity. I am personally grateful to all of you for helping us achieve the financial targets for the year 2018.

In a Parliament that costs taxpayers  billions yearly, yet another walkout in NA by the Opposition shows that this is the only function they intend to perform. These are pressure tactics to seek an NRO & evade accountability for corruption in NAB cases not initiated by PTI.
Congratulations to Virat Kohli and the Indian cricket team for the first ever win by a subcontinent team in a test series in Australia
Our New Year resolution is to wage jihad against the 4 ills of our country: poverty, illiteracy, injustice and corruption. InshaAllah 2019 is the beginning of Pakistan's golden era.

The Panama JIT report & the Fake Accounts JIT report are case studies in how states fail - getting impoverished & drowning in debt. The scale & methods used for siphoning off public money are incredulous & mind-boggling.

Quaid envisaged Pakistan as a democratic, just and compassionate nation. Most importantly he wanted our minorities to be equal citizens. It should be remembered that his early political career was as an ambassador for Hindu Muslim unity.
Wishing all our Christian citizens a happy and peaceful Christmas.
I want to thank the UAE govt for supporting Pakistan so generously in our testing times. This reflects our commitment and friendship that has remained steadfast over the years.

Pakistan has helped in the dialogue between Taliban and the US in Abu Dhabi. Let us pray that this leads to peace and ends almost three decades of suffering of the brave Afghan people. Pakistan will be doing everything within its power to further the peace process.

Strongly condemn killing of innocent Kashmiri civilians in Pulwama IOK by Indian security forces. Only dialogue & not violence & killings will resolve this conflict. We will raise issue of India's human rights violations in IOK & demand UNSC fulfil its J&K plebiscite commitment

Ppl shd use PM's complaint portal, launched 28 Oct, to get immediate response & effective resolution of their issues. 172000 complaints received in last 47 days of which 59000 resolved & others in process. Of these, 29000 ppl gave feedback with 57% expressing 100% satisfaction.

Today as we remember & pray for the survivors & the victims' families, esp the parents, of the Peshawar APS terrorist attack, my govt commits itself to fully implementing NAP to rid Pak of all forms of terrorism, violence & hatred.
As the nationwide campaign against polio begins across Pakistan, I call on the nation to step forward, take responsibility and make Pakistan #polio-free. #PakFightsPolio

Congratulations to Yasir Shah who broke an 82 year old record held by an  Australian & became the fastest bowler to reach the 200 test wickets' milestone in just 33 matches. Last week he had equalled my record of 14 wickets in a test match. Stellar performance.

On International Day of Persons with Disabilities, I want to reiterate our govt's commitment to transforming the lives of those with disabilities by offering them equal opportunities in education & employment. Our Bill to empower & enable them to surmount all barriers is ready.

I have asked CM Punjab to set up tents for people sleeping on footpaths and provide them food until the Panah Gahs (shelters) are built, as the weather is turning increasingly cold. Peshawar and Karachi spots also being located.

The failed attack against the Chinese Consulate was clearly a reaction to the unprecedented trade agreements that resulted from our trip to China. The attack was intended to scare Chinese investors and undermine CPEC. These terrorists will not succeed.

Strongly condemn the terrorist attacks against Chinese Consulate in Karachi & in Orakzai tribal area. My prayers go to the victims & their families. Salute the brave security/police personnel who gave their lives & denied success to terrorists in the mission ag Chinese Consulate.

I want to express my heartfelt thanks to Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad for his warm hospitality & I want to thank his Ministers & the Malaysian business community for welcoming us in the spirit of friendship. This trip will strengthen ties between our two countries.

Trump‚Äôs false assertions add insult to the injury Pak has suffered in US WoT in terms of lives lost & destabilised & economic costs. He needs to be informed abt historical facts. Pak has suffered enough fighting US's war. Now we will do what is best for our people & our interests

Instead of making Pakistan a scapegoat for their failures, the US should do a serious assessment of why, despite 140000 NATO troops plus 250,000 Afghan troops & reportedly $1 trillion spent on war in Afghanistan, the Taliban today are stronger than before.

3. Our tribal areas were devastated & millions of ppl uprooted from their homes. The war drastically impacted lives of ordinary Pakistanis. 4. Pak continues to provide free lines of ground & air communications(GLOCs/ALOCs).Can Mr Trump name another ally that gave such sacrifices?

Record needs to be put straight on Mr Trump's tirade against Pakistan: 1. No Pakistani was involved in 9/11 but Pak decided to participate in US War on Terror. 2. Pakistan suffered 75,000 casualties in this war & over $123 bn was lost to economy. US "aid" was a miniscule $20 bn.

Prayers and condolences on the passing of Ameer Tableeghi Jamaat Haji Abdul Wahab. He made a major contribution in spreading the message of Islam and peace; and he leaves behind a vacuum which cannot be filled easily.
Doing a U-turn to reach one's objective is the hallmark of great leadership just as lying to save ill-gotten wealth is the hallmark of crooks.

Have followed the shocking tragedy of the murder of SP Tahir Khan Dawar & ordered KP govt to coordinate with Islamabad police in holding an inquiry immediately. MOS Interior Shahryar Afridi has been tasked to oversee it with an urgency & present the report to me.
Wishing all our Hindu citizens a happy Diwali.

Our government is fully committed to ending polio in Pakistan. On #WorldPolioDay, I am confident, together with our people, we will achieve a safer, healthier and polio-free Pakistan for our children.

Strongly condemn the new cycle of killings of innocent Kashmiris in IOK by Indian security forces. It is time India realised it must move to resolve the Kashmir dispute through dialogue in accordance with the UN SC resolutions & the wishes of the Kashmiri people.
Saddened to learn of the tragic train accident in Amritsar India. Condolences go to the families of the deceased.

Condemnable terrorist attack targeting Kandahar's governor, police chief & Intel chief. Our condolences & prayers go to President Ghani, the families of the victims & the ppl of Afghanistan. Peace & security of Pakistan is inextricably linked to peace & security in Afghanistan.

Had an extensive mtg this morning on Overseas Pakistanis. We are going to announce a special package of incentives to encourage them to send remittances through banking channels by removing all hindrances & procedural issues. Philippines did this successfully.

We have launched our most ambitious, landmark housing policy of building 5mn homes in 5 yrs. InshaAllah this will provide affordable houses for our less privileged strata of society, plus 6mn jobs, create demand in 40 industries directly involved in house building & attract FDI.

Heartiest congratulations to President Xi Jinping, Premier Li Keqiang & the people of China on their National Day. Peaceful rise of China is a factor of stability in the world. Pakistan further looks forward to strengthening its bond with her iron brother & an exemplary friend.

Just spoke to Raja Farooq Haider, PM AJK whose helicopter was fired at by Indian forces. India wants to hide its oppression on Kashmiris through such incidents. Pakistan will continue 2 stand by the people of Occupied Kashmir in their just struggle for right to self-determination

The bellicose & irresponsible statement by the Indian Army Chief exposes the Indian designs to the world that should immediately take note of New Delhi's threatening posture. Pakistan extending an olive branch to India, should never be misconstrued as weakness.

Disappointed at the arrogant & negative response by India to my call for resumption of the peace dialogue. However, all my life I have come across small men occupying big offices who do not have the vision to see the larger picture.
I want to thank the people of Karachi for their generosity in supporting the Dam Fund. Rs 76 crores were raised at this Dam fundraiser.
Sad to learn of Begum Kulsoom Nawaz's death. She was a courageous woman of great dignity and confronted her disease with fortitude. My condolences and prayers go to the Sharif family.

On 70th death anniversary of the Quaid, we pay our rich tributes to our founding father & one of the greatest leaders who shaped political history of the 20th century. His vision & ideals continue to be pivotal to putting Pakistan on the pedestal of glory it so richly deserves..

Met Chairman Wapda today & emphasised urgency of building the Diamer Bhasha & Mohmand Dams. I may supervise Dams project myself, given the urgency. 45 maf is total water outflow of Pak, of which 80% is in 3 mths & only 20% in rest of 9 mths.

People of Pakistan are shocked at the irresponsibility of PTI government, which is trying to undermine Pakistan-China strategic partnership, by speaking in the voice of our enemies on CPEC! We will resist & reject such conspiracies, our Chinese friends should rest assured.

I have just got figures of 90% of state-owned land in KP, Punjab & federal areas & rest houses/official residences built on this land. The figures are startling: 34,459 kanals are rural & 17,035 kanals are urban.Just the urban land with buildings is worth over Rs.300 billion!

The unmistakable message is that when the people forge unity in their ranks, no obstacle is too insurmountable & no challenge too daunting to be overcome. 
Every Pakistani is proud of their heroes. Pakistan Zindabad! -ss

The Defence Day of Pakistan revives the memories of legendary valour & bravery showed by the armed forces of Pakistan in the defence of the motherland. It is the day when we pay our rich tributes to our heroes & ghazis who rose to the occasion in the call of duty... (cont)

Had very constructive meetings with Punjab CM & cabinet; & the senior Punjab bureaucracy yesterday. Informed them all that priority must be given to achieving our 100-Days prog. We are determined to change governance in Pak, focusing on austerity, anti-corruption & meritocracy.

Today we launch our tree plantation drive #Plant4Pakistan across the entire country. I want everyone to join this #GreenPakistan drive so we can counter the twin threats of climate change and pollution confronting our future generations.

Had a wonderful meeting with the British High Commissioner earlier today. Was humbled by his kind words about achievements in Punjab during PML-N government. Thanked him for the UK's valuable cooperation and assistance in health and education through DFID.

On behalf of the people of Pakistan, we send our prayers and best wishes to those who have been devastated by the floods in Kerala, India. We stand ready to provide any humanitarian assistance that may be needed.

I want to thank Sidhu for coming to Pakistan for my oath taking. He was an ambassador of peace & was given amazing love & affection by ppl of Pakistan. Those in India who targeted him are doing a gt disservice to peace in the subcontinent - without peace our ppl cannot progress
I have appointed Ehsan Mani as Chairman PCB. He brings vast and valuable experience to the job. He represented PCB in the ICC; was Treasurer ICC for 3 yrs and then headed the ICC for another 3 yrs.

I want to make it clear I stand by our nominee Usman Buzdar for CM Punjab. I have done my due diligence over the past 2 weeks & have found him to be an honest man. He has integrity & stands by my vision & ideology of Naya Pakistan.

I expected grace from the Speaker National Assembly who is custodian of the House. He should mete out equal treatment to all political parties. My speech was interrupted today, which reflects very poorly on his neutrality. #SSinNA
We will not let the parliamentary proceedings continue unless our demand for constitution of a powerful Parliamentary Commission is accepted. There is not going to be any escape from it. #SSinNA
I would like to appreciate media that has operated in difficult circumstances & held the banner of truth high. #SSinNA

The country under the leadership of Nawaz Sharif became hub of peace again for which our armed forces, police & law enforcement agencies deserve accolades. Our GDP growth touched 5.8%. Inflation went down. #SSinNA

The only crime of Nawaz Sharif is that he rejected Bill Clinton's offer of $5 billion & made Pakistan an atomic power, brought CPEC, & rid the country of the scourge of load-shedding. 11000 MW was added to the system during past 5 yrs - unprecedented in last seven decades #SSinNA
Page No 171 of the NAB court's judgement says that no allegations of corruption could be proven against Nawaz Sharif. Then why has he along with his daughter & son in law been incarcerated? #SSinNA
Our love for the motherland is unconditional & absolute. Today I pay tribute to those who were martyred in the struggle for democratic supremacy. #SSinNA

We have become part of Parliament under protest. Will strengthen democratic process & keep its flame burning. Will not attack & abuse Parliament. Judges will not b forced to change their route.Will not recommend use of 'Hundi' 4 transactions & burning of electricity bills #SSinNA

Probing electoral rigging & manipulation is a matter of national importance. Let me make it clear that if the rigging allegations are not investigated, we will not give up on our demand. No one should be in any doubt on this count. #SSinNA

We demand constitution of a Parliamentary Commission to probe rigging & present its findings within 30 days. We demand forensic audit of votes. The Commission should present recommendations to reform election process as well.  #SSinNA

This was the election in which 1.6 million votes were rejected. Ballot papers were retrieved from garbage. The whole nation rejected this sham election marked nationwide rigging. Both winners & losers have been complaining. #SSinNA

GE18 will b remembered as the most rigged election in Pakistan's history. RTS underwent forced shut-down. Polling agents were expelled during vote counting. PMLN workers were arrested. Media was gagged. There was massive pre-poll rigging & there was no level playing field #SSinNA

Deeply disturbed & outraged at the savagery inflicted in Afghanistan. Those indulging in this senseless massacre of students have actually attacked the future of our great brotherly country. We in Pakistan share the grief & pain of our Afghan brothers & sisters.

In the death of former PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee, India has lost a leader whose services to regional peace will be remembered for long time. He & Nawaz Sharif launched a sincere peace effort b/w neighboring countries in 1999. Wish India builds on his legacy by giving peace a chance

Today I met my dear friend, Chinese Ambassador Mr. Yao Jing & exchanged views on matters of mutual interest. Assured him that my commitment to China-Pakistan friendship is absolute & I will continue to play my role to further strengthen our unique bond of strong friendship.

We joined the assemblies to record our protest on the rigging & manipulation of GE2018. We will make sure that all rigging instances are duly probed & the people's mandate is safeguarded. We will play our role to strengthen democratic traditions & uphold the civilian supremacy.

NAB court's judgment clearly stated that the prosecution failed to establish any corruption allegation against Mian Nawaz Sharif. We are hopeful that the wrong done to him, his daughter & the son in law will be righted in the court & they will celebrate Eid with the people.

On behalf of the people of Pakistan & myself, I want to let President Erdogan & the people of Turkey know we are praying for their success in dealing with the severe economic challenges confronting them, as they have always succeeded against adversities in their glorious history.

Independence Day is a day of thanksgiving; a day to remember how Muslims of sub-continent came together under the inspiring leadership of Quaid-i-Azam to carve out a homeland for themselves. Today I pay my rich tributes to those who sacrificed everything 2 achieve this country-ss

While celebrating amazing contributions of our non-Muslim Pakistanis today, we can‚Äôt thank them enough 4 their great services. They r part&parcel of Pakistani nationhood. This day Quaid-i-Azam laid foundation of an inclusive Pakistan during his address to 1st Constituent Assembly

Good news for our national asset, the Overseas Pakistanis - PTI's struggle for their voting rights' implementation has been won as SC has decided this must be done and directed ECP to ensure the same through electronic means.
I want all Pakistanis to celebrate 14th August, our Independence Day, with full fervour - especially as we are now moving towards Naya Pakistan & reclaiming Jinnah's vision InshaAllah.

Remembering Dr Ruth Pfau, an icon & role model, on her death anniversary. What a life she lived in service of suffering humanity!She left behind a legacy that is worthy of celebration, an all-important lesson that selfless service of humanity is what makes r life truly meaningful
Saddened to learn of the death of our newly-elected MPA from Rajanpur Tariq Dreeshak. My condolences and prayers go to the family.

On #PoliceMartyrsDay we salute our police martyrs who laid down their lives in defence of the nation & its citizens. We are committed to strengthening the police force across all provinces, as we did in KP, by making it a merit-based, professional force free from pol interference

On the police martyrs' day I pay rich tributes to those who rendered supreme sacrifice of their life for the secure & bright future of the nation. A living nation can never forget their heroes. Their sacred blood is a debt on us. My eternal gratitude to their brave families! -ss

The burning down of schools in Gilgit Baltistan is a matter of grave concern. It is despicable as well as ominous. It is no less than an attack on the future of this country. Those involved in this heinous act should be arrested & exemplary punishment should be given to them. -ss

What a pleasure to receive congratulatory phone call from Turkey‚Äôs President Erdogan on PMLN emerging as second largest political party nationally. Assured the brotherly President that I will continue to play my role to further strengthen friendship between our two countries...

Celebrating birthday of a great democrat & icon of Pakistan Movement, Madar-e-Millat Fatima Jinnah, who galvanised women during freedom struggle & who stood by her brother, the Quaid e Azam, realising the dream of a free country. A respected &beloved role model for all Pakistanis

Outraged by the killing of PML-N worker in Mansehra. Demanding the recount of votes is a legal right of political parties. PML-N is a peaceful national political party and fear & intimidation can't suppress our rights.

Will b co-hosting an All-Parties Conference (APC) today to discuss incidence of serious poll irregularities on Election Day. Glad that all political forces understand their responsibility to protect people's basic right. ECP failed miserably to hold fair, free & transparent polls
We will use all political and legal options for redressal of these glaring excesses. This is an outright rigging and the results based on massive rigging will cause irreparable damage to the country.

ECP should give strict instructions for issuance of the Form 45. It completely failed in its main responsibility of holding a free, fair & transparent elections. A serious blow has been dealt to the democratic process of the country.

We are convening the meeting of the party's Central Executive Committee tomorrow to decide on the next course of action. We will then hold consultations with other political parties to agree on a shared set of actions. This matter cannot be allowed to go unattended.

Someone hinted that the PML-N emerged as the largest parliamentary party in Punjab. I told him it it is not about seats. It is about respect of the people's mandate. It is about our future. It is about our posterity.
Through this election, we wanted Pakistan to enter a new epoch but there is no place in the country where blatant violation of the election laws & humiliation of the public mandate was committed.

I have not seen the kind of malpractices done today after the polling time expired in my whole political career. We heard complaints from the whole country that Form 45 was not being given & the polling agents of the party were driven out.

We thought that the people will be allowed opportunity to express their will freely. Long queues of people could be seen in the morning in this hot, humid weather. We requested the Election Commission of Pakistan to extend the polling time, which it did not accept.
In Lahore alone the results of Pervez Malik, Sardar Ayaz Sadiq & even of my constituency were stopped.

The mandate of the millions of people who came out to vote has been humiliated. Our democratic process has been pushed back by decades. Had the public mandate been delivered in a fair manner, we would have accepted it happily.

Pakistan Muslim League (Nawaz) wholly rejects the results of General Elections 2018 due to manifest & massive irregularities. Form 45 was not given to our agents, results were stopped & votes were counted in the absence of our poll agents. This is both unbearable & unacceptable!

Condemnable terrorist attack in Quetta by enemies of Pak seeking to disrupt our democratic process. Saddened by the loss of innocent lives. Pakistanis must defeat the terrorists' design by coming out in strength to cast their vote.

Heart broken to learn of martyrdom of innocent people including police officials & injuries sustained by others in a terrorist attack in Quetta at a time when the people are exercising their democratic right of vote. My profound condolences to the bereaved families.
All PTI workers and esp our polling agents should sleep early and be fresh and vigilant all day tomorrow to make history.

People of Pakistan must come out and vote tomorrow in this historic election. This is the first time in 4 decades the nation has a chance to defeat the entrenched status quo. Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity.

Lucky to have such a good, motivated team. We fought the good fight and, what‚Äôs more important, we are on the right side of history! Let us VOTE on 25th for the bright future of Pakistan & Pakistanis! -ss

Back in Lahore after a gruelling campaign, capped by a huge, charged jalsa in DG Khan, morale among our supporters is very high. Leading the campaign in the absence of Mian sahib & with all the hurdles was a big challenge, but our part rose to the occasion. Lucky to have.. (cont)
Off to Dera Ghazi Khan for a public meeting tonight
Not only Pakistan, but entire Muslim Ummah is proud of Turkey and President Erdogan, who is a source of pride & inspiration... -ss

& prayed for health of Begum Kulsum Nawaz & good wishes for PMLN Quaid Nawaz Sharif. I congratulated him heartily on well-deserved victory in both Parliamentary & Presidential polls. Told him that we stand together in fight against terrorism & struggle to alleviate poverty (cont)

It was a pleasure to receive a very friendly phone call from brotherly Turkey‚Äôs President Erdogan. He expressed support & solidarity for people of Pakistan especially victims of recent acts of terrorism. He asked how Turkey can be of help to its Pakistan brethren... (cont)
Just reached home ... thank you everyone especially the people of Lahore & my team members for staying up all night ... God bless u all!
Just reached Multan ... will address a public meeting shortly.
Off to Multan ...
Will be on Geo News' programme 'Capital Talk' with Hamid Mir sb tonight at 7 pm.
Saddened to learn that Ikram Gandapur succumbed to his injuries. My prayers go to his family. May Allah give them the strength to bear this loss.

Grieved to learn about the martyrdom of Ikramullah Gandapur, PTI candidate for PK-99. Spread of violence ahead of the national polls is truly ominous. Where are ECP & Caretaker govt? My profound condolences to the family of martyr & PTI on my behalf & that of the PML-N. -ss

These days I am giving example of Turkey in my speeches. I do so because known as 'Sick man of Europe' once, Turkey consolidated itself internally to emerge as a regional power. It is the only country that looks Israel in the eye & exposes its brutalities on hapless Palestinians.
Strongly condemn the cowardly terrorist attack against Ikram Khan Gandapur and his convoy today. May Allah grant Ikram and the other injured a speedy recovery.

Notwithstanding such discrimination & targeting of PMLN, I appeal to all our candidates & workers to resist & reject such nefarious designs & remain loyal to the single-minded objective of ensuring victory for PMLN in July 25 polls, Inshallah. The verdict is also harsh & unfair!

Only an exception has been made in case of PML-N‚Äôs Hanif Abbasi. We condemn the malafides behind the timing of this decision,  which is politically motivated and seeks to undermine the election campaign of the PML-N.... (cont)

Verdict, like judgement in the case of Nawaz Sharif, came after an inordinately long wait on Saturday close to midnight, and that too in the midst of the election campaign. All cases against other politicians, including IK & AAZ, have been deferred till after elections... (cont)

The timing and manner of judgement of Hanif Abbasi clearly shows a discriminatory attitude towards PML-N, targeting our Party on the eve of the polls when PML-N is on the verge of winning the polls.... (cont)

Judge of Accountability Court wrote at page# 171 that no corruption allegation was proven against Nawaz Sharif. Niazi sb should read the judgment of Peshawar High Court which has clearly highlighted occurrence of corruption in Peshawar metro bus project. #SSinSargodha

Pakistan has all the potential to be at par with Turkey and Malaysia. There is only one condition. All of us need to begin working hard. It is through 'work, work & more work' that we can end our unemployment & poverty. #SSinFaisalabad
All known corrupt faces are sitting with IK, be it Gondals of EOBI fame, or Babar Awan of Nandipur scam. The people will bury the politics of 'Ladla' on July 25. #SSinFaisalabad

Peshawar High Court stated in its judgment that original cost of Peshawar metro bus project shot up from Rs. 38 billion to Rs. 68 billion. PTI govt awarded the contract to a black-listed company. While Lahore metro was completed at the cost of Rs. 30 billion. #SSinFaisalabad

We served the masses with utmost dedication. PEEF scholarships, provision of cheap fertilizers & electricity to farmers, interest-free loans, construction of hospitals & massive reforms in education sector are some of the chief points of our tenure. #SSinFaisalabad

Even our sick mother was not allowed to meet Nawaz Sharif at the airport. If the accountability court verdict says that no allegation of corruption was proven against Nawaz Sharif, why has he been put in jail? #SSinFaisalabad
Congratulations to Fakhar Zaman for becoming the first Pakistani to score a double century in One Day cricket.
Will shortly address a public meeting in Faisalabad ...

Hospital in Swat funded by the Punjab government is gift from the people of Punjab for their brotherly people of KP. The PTI government impeded its functioning. Pakistan is not about one province. It is about beautiful bouquet of all federating units. #SSinSwat

Peshawar is a beautiful, historic city, known as city of flowers. KP is home to gallant and honorable people but look at the state the PTI government subjected KP to. If Allah gives me an opportunity to serve KP, I will transform this province. #SSinSwat

When I go to Karachi, Quetta & Peshawar, I say it publicly & with a sense of conviction that I will develop these cities on the lines of Lahore. Can Khan sahib say the same thing that he will turn Karachi, Lahore & Quetta into Peshawar? #SSinSwat

Imran Khan opposed metro bus project tooth & nail but then took his famed U-turn. Modern, efficient & affordable transport system is a huge service to the common people who need it to access educational institutions, hospitals and work places. #SSinSwat

Peshawar bus project is a mega corruption scam. PTI government awarded the contract to a blacklisted company. The PHC judgment termed the contact as 'shady & shaky' & referred the case to NAB for investigation. This is Imran Khan's concept of a corruption-free country. #SSinSwat

By fielding me as their candidate from their constituency, people of Swat have bestowed their honour on me. I will return this love by burning my mid-night oil. Mingora & Malakand Division have prior right on me. I will usher in a new era of development in the area. #SSinSwat

11000 MW electricity was generated through projects that were cost-effective & efficiently installed in a record time. The resolution of energy crisis has restored businesses, powering the wheels of national life. #SSinSwat

PTI Chairman promised to generate enough electricity to power the whole of Pakistan in 2013 but at the end of 5 years, it is net minus -8 megawatts electricity that PTI govt produced. Whereas we injected a total of 11000+ MW under leadership of Nawaz Sharif. #SSinSwat

Was a heart-breaking sight when our daughter Maryam Nawaz was arrested before her father's eyes. Likewise, it was equally painful for the daughter to see her beloved father arrested. Nawaz Sharif chose to come back for the sake of his people. #SSinSwat

Just addressed Workers' Convention in Swat. Massive enthusiasm was on display. All claims of 'change' made by PTI are bogus. Their change lay in the ads/facebook/photoshop. PTI broke all records of corruption & gave contract to black-listed companies in KP. Now off to FAISALABAD!
Off to Sawat to address PMLN workers convention. Could not go there a couple of days ago due to bad weather. Excited to meet my constituents. -ss
Will shortly be addressing a public meeting in Pindigheb (Attock) InshaAllah!
Interviewed by Murtaza Solangi on current political situation seven days ahead of polls. The interview will go on air at 10 pm tonight on Capital TV!
Just landed in Rajanpur. Will address the people in a short while InshaAllah!

Addressed 2 massive & fully charged public meetings today. PTI bubble has burst like an artificially inflated, hot air balloon as their 4 failed rallies in the last 24 hours vividly showed. Any attempt to trample the popular mandate will be fully exposed, resisted & rejected! -ss

Just addressed a mammoth public meeting at Alipur Chattha. The small town of Gujranwala showed its massiveness of devotion to PML-N and Nawaz Sharif. This passion will explode on July 25. On way to Nowshera Virkan for another Jalsa.

The blatant bias of Dawn against PTI has now come out in the open. So much for Dawn's neutral and liberal credentials! Complete farce! Full marks to Stevan Sackur for exposing Dawn in his BBC HardTalk interview.
Just reached Ali Pur Chatha (Gujranwala) ... will shortly address a public meeting here before moving to Nowshera Virkan for another Jalsa tonight InshaAllah!

Just addressed a political gathering in Swat on telephone. Could not go there because of bad weather.  However I plan to visit Swat in near future IA. Going to visit different constituencies of Lahore shortly.
PMLN workers & candidates are motivated, their morale is High, especially after the historic rally in Lahore of July 13. PMLN is a National Political party with roots in all 4 provinces. -ss

My visit 2 Quetta was painful. Met bereaved families including that of Shaheed Siraj Raisani. How heart-rending it is to lose our loved ones 2 terrorism! The pain was written large on their faces. Went 2 CMH 2 inquire after health of the injured. Pray 2 God 4 their early recovery

Just reached Quetta to condole with the Raisani family on the martyrdom of Siraj Raisani & other bereaved families whose near & dear ones lost their lives in tragic Mastung incident. May God rest their soul in eternal peace!
Our workers have not committed any illegal act. Taking out a political rally is not a crime. #SSpresser
If an excess is being committed against PPP and the party's electoral campaign is being hampered, we strongly condemn it. #SSpresser
The way Lahore was out on roads yesterday, we are sure that we will succeed on July 25. The massive turnout yesterday was a forerunner of what will happen on the day of elections. #SSpresser
All political parties will get united for Pakistan's future, for we do not have a future without free, fair and transparent elections. #SSpresser

ECP should use its authority and order the release of the political prisoners.Otherwise the elections will be termed as non-transparent. Even PPP is saying that if elections are to be held this way,we will not accept the elections.We will gather all political parties. #SSpresser
I am thankful to all provincial chapters of the PML-N particularly Amir Muqam who came from KP at the head of a large rally. #SSpresser

We will use all legal and constitutional options after the arrest of Nawaz Sharif and Maryam Nawaz. I will give a countrywide call of protest in a few days. Our workers will wear black bands as a mark of peaceful protest at our electoral offices. #SSpresser
The elections are just around the corner. By banning the coverage of parties that are contesting polls, where do you want to take Pakistan? #SSpresser

Known corrupt people are in the party of Niazi sb whose cases are under trial in NAB courts. Those who conspired against progress of Pakistan and undermined democracy have been given full freedom. #SSpresser

Media gave non-stop coverage to Imran Khan as he went about disrupting life & spreading mayhem in 2014. The hundreds of thousands of people came out to receive their leader against whom no proof of corruption was found, but media boycotted it. #SSpresser
Those who built Pakistan took out a rally attended by hundreds of thousands of people. It was wholly organised and peaceful but media totally boycotted it and no coverage was given. #SSpresser

People had gathered at Bhatta chowk yesterday to join the main rally, they were tortured without any reason & FIR was also registered against them including against the senior leaders of the PMLN such as Mushahid Hussain, Marriyum Aurangzeb, Saad Rafique and myself. #SSpresser
Despite threats, intimidation and lockdown, the people came out in their hundreds of thousands. Police tortured our workers and time is not far when those doing so will be held to account. #SSpresser

When Nawaz & Maryam landed, the whole Lahore city was out on roads. People belonging to all walks of life were part of rally. I have never seen such a passion & energy in my entire political career. #SSpresser

After arrest of Nawaz Sharif and Maryam, it has been decided that their trial will be conducted in jail. It is akin to shredding law into pieces because it is the terrorists whose trial is done in jail. This NAB decision is in violation of law & the constitution. #SSpresser
What happened in Mastung is the heart-rending and soul piercing incident of Pakistan's history. Indian footprint has often been traced in similar acts of terrorism. #SSpresser
Am deeply saddened by the Mastung tragedy and will be flying over on the first opportunity.

As I was busy with homecoming rally for Nawaz Sharif in Lahore, I was heart-broken to learn about the martyrdom of over 100 people in a suicide attack on a corner meeting in Mastung. Words cannot describe the feeling of anguish & sense of loss...

Another condemnable terrorist attack on a political gathering - this time in Mastung. Saddened to learn of Nawabzada Siraj Raisini's shahadat in this targeted attack as well as the shahadat of 15 other innocent citizens.
Beginning to wonder why whenever Nawaz Sharif is in trouble, there is increasing tension along Pakistan's borders and a rise in terrorist acts? Is it a mere coincidence?

Strongly condemn the terrorist attack on Akram Durrani & his convoy. There seems to be a conspiracy to sabotage the 25 July elections but the people of Pakistan will not allow any design intended to target these historic elections to succeed.

Wrote a letter to the Caretaker Chief Minister Punjab to protest the illegal detention of our party workers. Also demanded their immediate release. The copies of the letter have been sent to Chief Justice of Pakistan and the Chief Election Commissioner.

Established corruption cases ve been lying in NAB courts for a decade now. Nawaz Sharif attended 109 hearings of NAB court bt was handed dwn the punishment &when he is cmng bk 4 rule of law, coercive action has been initiated on his workers a few days ahd of elections. #SSpresser

I have never feared arrest. Such tactics are not new to me. I am first & last a patriotic Pakistani and it is the interest of Pakistan that is close to my heart and an inspiration for my political struggle. #SSpresser

That party is being pushed against the wall that has invested its sweat and blood in building Pakistan; which added thousands of megawatt to the system; made CPEC a living reality & steadied the ship of the state amid massive turbulence. #SSpresser
The present state of affairs in Punjab confirms our worst fears that the Election Commission has become a puppet. #SSpresser

The PMLN is ready to sit with the administration & jointly agree on the steps to make our reception peaceful. But the arbitrary arrests of the workers under MPO are unacceptable. I will be the first one to defend my workers. #SSpresser
I appeal to the Supreme Court of Pakistan to take notice of the illegal detentions and suppression of fundamental rights of our political workers. #SSpresser

From Caretaker CM to Home Minister to Chief Secy to IG Police,they ve all ganged up against PMLN by shedding ny veneer of neutrality if thr was ny.V r being pushed agnst the wall.If no level playing field is provided &vindictive action continues,thn plz do not blame me #SSpresser

The PMLN raised objection to the appointment of Hasan Askari as Caretaker CM. His biased views about PMLN are well-known. Who will read his columns & listen to his commentary afterwards? How much credibility will he be left with? #SSpresser

Rumours are being spread about cancellation of Nawaz Sharif's flight. Both he & Maryam are coming to Lahore according to the schedule. Pakistan is Nawaz Sharif's first love & even jail cannot stop him from doing his duty towards the country. #SSpresser

I would ask the police and administration officials not to violate law & fundamental rights of Pakistanis. Work within the legal mandate or be ready to be held to account over your excesses. #SSpresser

I visited Lahore yesterday & met people in different areas. I have gauged the mood of Lahorites. We are winning elections by the grace of Allah. If the results of elections are illegally changed, those doing so will be brought to justice. #SSpresser

The Hon'able SC barred FIA 4m arresting any1 till July30. On the other hand,our workers &candidates r being threatened,cases r being registered against them,&the sanctity of their homes is being violated in illegal raids of police. Is it how u conduct free& fair polls? #SSpresser

The whole world now knows that the PMLN alone is being targeted. Imran Khan has all the freedom to hold a public meeting in Lahore today while Section 144 has been imposed on the occasion of homecoming of PMLN Quaid Nawaz Sharif tomorrow. #SSpresser

Hundreds of the PMLN workers ve been rounded up in wt is an illegal swoop in violation of our fundamental rights.Our workers ve been incarcerated for 30 days under MPO, which means that they will not be able 2 take part in elections.This is naked rigging,pure & simple. #SSpresser

I will personally lead the reception rally from Lohari Gate tomorrow. I assure the authorities that our reception for Nawaz Sharif will be wholly peaceful. The PMLN is builder of Pakistan.We served the masses during last many years. How can we destroy what we built up? #SSpresser

Nawaz Sharif knows what is in store for him. He has left his seriously ill wife in the protection of Allah. He is coming back along with his daughter to fulfill his commitment with the people of Pakistan. #SSpresser

Page 171 of the NAB court judgment clearly states that allegations of corruption & corrupt practices could not be proven against Nawaz Sharif. Still he was sentenced for 10 years on presumption (1/2) #SSpresser

Does IK have anything to show by way of performance in KP? Did his govt produce a single megawatt of electricity? Did it establish universities & hospitals? Beautiful & historic city of Peshawar was rendered into a rubble. #SSonExpress

Does such a person who is a habitual liar, climbs up mountains when people are in agony & is flanked by known corrupt people deserve to be leader of the nation? What to speak of becoming PM, he even does not deserve to be UC chairman. #SSonExpress

IK made three allegations against me: Javed Sadiq was my front man & I made Rs. 27 billion; I offered Rs. 10 million as bribe to IK on Panama & I made $17 million through Chinese firm Yabaite in Multan Metro project. I sent him legal notices & moved the court. #SSonExpress

If elections are held in a free, fair & transparent manner & are seen to be so, we will accept the verdict of the people whichever it swings. If they are otherwise, we will use all our democratic and constitutional rights. #SSonExpress
The nation will vote out those who turned out to be turncoats & fell to temptations. They will be defeated by the PML-N ticket-holders. #SSonExpress

Despite all vindictive tactics & one-sided accountability, PML-N is winning the elections. All national & international surveys & opinion polls have established that we are way ahead of PTI nationally & about 20% in Punjab alone. #SSonExpress

Nawaz Sharif always safeguarded Pakistan's interest. He rejected Clinton's offer of $5 billion & stood up to threats & intimidation. He ordered detonation of nuclear devices to teach India a lesson. Do not humiliate someone who turned around Pakistan. #SSonExpress

NAB court's verdict clearly states that no allegation of corruption &corrupt practices has been proven against Nawaz Sharif.Likewise,it was nt proven that he was owner of Avenfield apartments.He was handed down punishment on da basis of a presumption,not fact of law. #SSonExpress

If Pakistan has to beat India in the fields of health, education, exports, economic production, industrial growth, innovation & research and be at par with brotherly countries of Turkey & Malaysia, then all stakeholders need to sit across the table ... (1/2) #SSonExpress

We do not have even a distant idea of boycotting the elections. However, if vindictive actions against PML-N do not stop & Election Commission continues to remain indifferent, we would use our constitutional and legal right of protest in the evening of July 25. #SSonExpress

Corrupt elements with established corruption cases are sitting in the lap of PTI such as Nazar Gondal family with a corruption tag of Rs. 33 Bn. A SC-appointed Commission held Babar Awan responsible in Nandipur Project scam but still NAB has not taken any action. #SSonExpress

There is a world of difference between PMLN & PTI. Against PTI's politics of incessant agitation, lock-downs, abuses & violence, we have always promoted politics of development, positivity & inclusiveness. PMLN stands for inclusive and peaceful Pakistan. #SSonExpress

I do not fear arrest. I have faced the worst of times before including the persecution during the Musharraf's dictatorial regime. Our team is in contact with administration. We have assured them that PMLN will not be involved in any subversive activity. #SSonExpress

We are going to the airport to receive our Quaid. PMLN believes in constructive politics. We have given our sweat & blood to this country. Why would we reverse the progress we have made through negative & destructive politics? #SSonExpress

Nawaz Sharif is coming back to fulfill his promise to the masses. He knows that he will be put behind bars. His wife is fighting for her life. He himself has had an open heart surgery. But he has still chosen to come back to stand by his people & for rule of law. #SSonExpress

Hundreds of thousands of people will accord a warm welcome to PMLN Quaid Mian Nawaz Sharif. As President of the party, I will lead the masses & the workers at the reception for Nawaz Sharif. #SSonExpress
The Peshawar terrorist incident has adversely affected the election campaigns of political parties. Hope no other untoward incident takes place & elections are held peacefully. #SSonExpress
Next point Shahdara, Lahore
Local government office holders of PMLN will resume their mission of serving the people on July 26 InshaAllah!
Election Commission of Pakistan must take notice of this government‚Äôs arbitrary, high-handed approach, which is against all democratic norms. (2/2)

Strongly condemn illegal arrest of PMLN workers in Lahore & Rawalpindi on frivolous charges. These arrests represent pre-poll rigging & a gross violation of ECP's code of conduct. The elections will only be credible if all political forces are provided level playing field.. (1/2)

Will speak to PMLN workers in different areas of Lahore today IA. There is however a somber mood in the wake of terrorist incident in which ANP leader Haroon Bilour & other workers were martyred. Workers are shared asset of every party. A loss of one party is loss of others too!

Shocking news from Peshawar: Grieved to learn about shahadat of Haroon Bilour. Strongly condemn this barbaric act of terrorism on a public meeting. Its govt & ECP's responsibility 2 provide fool-proof security 2 political parties leaders. My condolences to bereaved families & ANP

Sad to learn of Haroon Bilour and 2 other ANP workers deaths and strongly condemn the terrorist attack at the ANP corner mtg in Peshawar. All political parties and their candidates must be provided proper security during their election campaigns by the State.
Off to Bhalwal (Sargodha) ... PMLN will take its case to the people of the area to judge its performance while in office and deliver their verdict for continuity of policies and development.

Heartiest congratulations to my dear brother & esteemed friend of Pakistan, H.E. @RT_Erdogan on the inaugural ceremony for a fresh term of office. He very kindly invited me as his guest to participate in the ceremony in Ankara today but due to election campaign, I could not go..

On this very day, the nation lost an iconic & chrismatic leader, Madr-e-Millat Mohtarma Fatima Jinnah whose single-minded devotion to her brother & Father of the Nation will remain a stuff of legend. Her standing up to dictatorial regime inspired Pak & set an example of heroism!
Just reached Haroonabad (Bahawalnagar) ... will be addressing a public meeting shortly InshaAllah!
Just heard that Pakistan won T20 Final against Australia. Well done Team Green!
Congratulations to the Pakistan cricket team for their victory in the Twenty20 Tri Series; and especially to Captain Sarfaraz for the way he led the team.

Burhan Wani represented the aspirations of Kashmiri youth. The flame of freedom ignited by his martyrdom has inspired a whole generation. His sacred blood has infused a spirit of defiance in the face of the Indian state terrorism that no power can ever kill. May his soul RIP! -ss

Remembering Edhi sahib on his second death anniversary today. What an iconic figure he was who taught us how service of the people over & above all discrimination forms the core of our essential humanity! May his soul rest in peace! -ss

Pakistan Muslim League(Nawaz) will utilize all legal &constitutional remedies against the decision. NAB court gave its decision 2day.Another court, the court of people, will deliver its verdict on July 25. The masses will use the power of vote & their evidence will be irrefutable

I would ask the candidates of the PML-N to keep running their electoral campaigns. They should make the electorate aware of the excesses being committed against the party leadership & the double standards of justice applied by NAB.

I will go to our nook and corner of the country and make the masses aware of the miscarriage of justice & cruelty committed by NAB against the leader who served this country with his heart & soul. They know better who served them & who fed them on rhetoric.

Nawaz Sharif&our daughter appeared b4 NAB court for 109times incldng weekends. As son ofthe soil,he served Pakistan&its people.He is the one who madePakistan atomic power.He stood up to stick&carrot approach applied by foreign powers&did wt was in the supreme interest of Pakistan

Nawaz Sharif has CPEC, operationalisation of Gwadar port, strong advocacy of the Kashmir cause at the UN, motorways, vast road infrastructure to his credit. He led Pakistan out of economic crises & stabilized it.
Nawaz Sharif has been a personification of courage. The more he was suppressed, the greater force he came back with.

There is no denying the fact that NAB has dual standards of justice. Proven corruption cases have been pending before NAB for many years. Some as old as ten years but no action was taken. Justice on pick & choose basis is no justice.
The NAB court's decision is based on oppression & cruelty. The name of Nawaz Sharif was not mentioned in Panama papers nor was it there as owner of Avenfield flats.

Pakistan Muslim League (Nawaz) strongly rejects the verdict of the Accountability Court in the Avenfield case. History will remember this verdict in black words. The decision is flawed, politically motivated & has glaring loopholes.

Housing is major issue. PMLN will provide low-cost housing facilities 2 the poorest of the poor. A law will b introduced that will make it obligatory 4 banks 2 provide loans @ min interest rates 4 housing 2 needy. Housing sector dev will spur economic activity. #PMLNManifesto2018

Diamir Basha dam is a matter of life & death. It will not only meet our water needs but also trap flash floods & provide a longevity 2 Tarbela & Mangla dams. Even if I have to ask 4 donation for the dam, I will do that. Almost ~70% of work on the project will b completed in 5yrs!

Construction of multipurpose Diamir Basha Dam will generate an electricity of 4500 MW besides storing over 6 million acre feet of water. The Nawaz government completed land acquisition for the project at the rate of Rs. 100 billion. #PMLNManifesto2018

Water is the greatest challenge we are facing. There is no use of crying over spilt milk. By constructing dams on water that is our share, India has flouted all laws & treaties & intensified the water challenge for us. We have to act & act fast to overcome this existential threat

PMLN has also conjured up the idea of building Industrial Complex in villages, which will not only add value to the goods produced there but also employ a sizable chunk of workforce. Presence of such complexes in rural areas will help modernise agri sector & stop load on cities.

.. assured supply of fertilizers at reduced prices, & provision of subsidy on electricity for tube wells. Farmers can have better agricultural output when the cost of input is lower. (2/2) #PMLNManifesto2018

Agriculture is a backbone of the national economy that contributes a sizable share to GDP & employs a large number of people. PMLN govt introduced pro-farmer initiatives during past 5 years that include interest-free loans .. (1/2) #PMLNManifesto2018

Private sector is the generator of jobs. We will implement policies to help private sector grow & expand. PMLN will provide an attractive investment climate by bringing down the cost of doing business & facilitating the prospective businessmen. #PMLNManifesto2018

Skill development is an important area to produce skilled human force. We will set up centres for technical & vocational education & training in every school. Punjab has the honour of starting Pakistan's 1st technical university named: Punjab-Tianjin University of Technology.
Under Punjab Educational Foundation, 2 million students were enrolled in the schools through voucher scheme. We will expand the scope of this scheme to the rest of Pakistan. #PMLNManifesto2018

Right time for the people to ask IK as to how many hospitals he set up in KP, how many facilities such as CT scan, MRI machines his govt provided? In 2013, he had vowed to make KP a model province in terms of health & education facilities? Where does KP stand? #PMLNManifesto2018

Health reforms introduced by PMLN in Punjab are path-breaking. Latest machinery such as MRI, dialysis, & CT scan machines were installed & drug testing, forensic & pathology labs were set up. Every DHQ hospital in Punjab has hepatitis filter clinic. #PMLNManifesto2018
