National Health Card was a revolutionary initiative aimed at the poorest of the poor that Nawaz Sharif launched as PM of Pakistan. Its unfortunate that some of the provinces refused to implement it on political grounds. #PMLNManifesto2018

PEEF is the largest endowment fund in Pak under which 375,000 students belonging to the poorest families got scholarships. 1000s of them have become Doctors & Engineers. Scholarships worth Rs.17B have been distributed. PEEF will become flagship project of PMLN @ national level.

Self-employment scheme launched by our Govt benefited 2 million individuals & 12 million families, making them economically empowered & self-sufficient. Today, these individuals are powerful success stories. We will continue with this scheme & expand its scope. #PMLNManifesto2018

Zeevar-e-Taleem, launched by our govt in South Punjab, is aimed @ girls education under which amount of stipend was increased 4m Rs.200 to Rs.1000/m. It helped increase & sustain enrolment of girls. We will increase scope of this stipend throughout the country. #PMLNManifesto2018

We will use BISP as an instrument to promote literacy and technical & vocational education in the country. Only those families will be eligible to get the cash grants who will ensure that their children go to schools. #PMLNManifesto2018
Cash grants under BISP will be made conditional on certification by the parents that their children are getting education. #PMLNManifesto2018

No society can claim to be economically sustainable unless it takes care of the poorest of the poor. PMLN Govt not only retained BISP but also increased its budget from Rs. 40B to Rs. 120 billion. We will continue with BISP by allocating more resources for it. #PMLNManifesto2018

Establishment of peace in Karachi, Pakistan's financial capital, was the result of sustained efforts by former PM Nawaz Sharif. Armed forces of Pakistan, police and other agencies rendered exemplary sacrifices in the shared pursuit of bringing peace to Karachi. #PMLNManifesto2018
^ Our national history has yet to record such an example of dedicated performance. #PMLNManifesto2018

Key features of power projects completed by PMLN govt are: fast-paced implementation, highest level of transparency during their execution & their construction at half the cost of projects earlier installed. We saved a total of Rs. 160 billion in these projects.

Out of 11000MW, 5000MW electricity came 4m gas-based power plants funded by federal & Punjab govt, 3000MW 4m CPEC proj, 1000 4m TarbelaIV Ext project & the rest 4m solar, wind & nuclear projects. PMLN completed 969MW Neelum-Jhelum Hydropower Proj that was limping along for 20 yrs

Nawaz Sharif worked hard day in & day out to overcome energy crisis. PMLN govt added a total of 11000MW during past 5 years. Compare this generation capacity against 18000MW which was achieved during past 70 yrs. Energy projects were commissioned despite pol. protests & sit-ins..

Ending load-shedding & terrorism 4m Pak are 2 shining achievements of PMLN govt under the leadership of Nawaz Sharif. Imagine the state of affairs when darkness ruled in 2011-12. Protests were order of the day & businesses had shut down with economy suffering a loss of 2% of GDP.

How the political parties fared in office in different provinces during the last 5 years should be judged by a comparison of their actions vis-a-vis the targets contained in their manifestos of 2013. This is the single most criterion to judge their performance
#PMLNManifesto2018

Welfare of the people is at the heart of PMLN‚Äôs Election Manifesto 2018 which is going to be launched today. The document contains policy responses to the major challenges facing the country & has been prepared after due deliberations with an input of the relevant stakeholders...

Will go 2 Sahiwal today 2 speak @ Workers' Convention IA. Workers of PMLN r the greatest strength of the party. No amount of coercion during Musharraf's dictatorial regime could browbeat them into submission. They kept party‚Äôs flag high during d worst of time. Will DO it NOW too!

Have had to cancel today's Workers' Convention in Kasur due to incessant rain. It will be rescheduled at some other date. Please stay safe wherever you are and I hope that the caretaker administration is taking care of you in such torrential rains. God bless you all!

Do you know that implementing strict merit policy in recruitment, the PMLN government recruited over 250,000 teachers purely on merit in Punjab? The system was so foolproof that even the Chief Minister could not interfere in the selection process.

It was disturbing to learn about the recent carnage in Jalalabad, Afghanistan, two days ago, in which 19 people, mainly members of the Sikh community, were killed. Recurring nature of violence in Afghanistan is the biggest hurdle in the way of peace.
Against a general perception of my being a strict person, I have a soft side as well. I sang a song a few days ago in Karachi :) #SSonGeo
I took strong administrative action against those who tried to exploit the farmers in Punjab. Many sugar mill owners were arrested. #SSonGeo

PMLN stands by the resolutions of separate provinces but it is for the people to decide. Our govt, however, allocated up to 40% of its budget 4 31% population of South Punjab. I made sure that 10% greater share was given 2 South Punjab in quota of jobs & other projs etc. #SSonGeo

Danish School System was severely criticised when it was launched a few years ago. Today their students who are orphans with no means are changing their lives after getting education from the top-class national educational institutions like UET, LUMS, NUST, KEMU etc. #SSonGeo

Punjab Educational Endowment Fund is Punjab's greatest contribution to promotion of education under which scholarships of 17 billion were distributed among 350,000 talented students. These children belonging to the poorest families have now reached top institutions. #SSonGeo

We have to resolve our problems ourselves without involving our friends like China/Turkey/KSA. We need a candid and frank dialogue among all stakeholders for a national agenda for next 15-20 years. We need a new social contract to make Pakistan prosperous and stable. #SSonGeo

I met Rehman Khan only once when she interviewed me in 2014. I say this with full responsibility that I didn't have any contact with her either directly or indirectly. Nor am I behind her book. IK is habitual liar who has been making baseless allegations against me. #SSonGeo

I have given my sweat and blood to the province during the past 10 years. One example: Sahiwal Coal Power Plant broke China's record of construction of a similar project & was commissioned in a record time of 22 months, 6 months ahead of the scheduled date of completion. #SSonGeo

'Respect of vote' emanates from performance. The identity of politics of Mian Nawaz Sharif is performance as is mine. There is no difference between our respective positions. Our choice of words may be different but their essence is the same. #SSonGeo

As of today we are not thinking of boycott. We are carefully evaluating the situation. If we find that free and fair polls are not possible, we will take decision according to the demand of the situation.  #SSonGeo

There is absolutely no corruption charge against Mian Nawaz Sharif. His name is not included in the Panama leaks. He was ousted from office on Iqama. The jurists described the SC judgment as being weak-footed in legal terms. #SSonGeo
Some of the electables have left party but the vote bank of the PMLN remains solid Alhumdulillah and our voters are determined more than ever before to use their democratic right of vote. #SSonGeo

Rs. 75 billion were saved in Orange Line project. No bidding was ever carried out in G to G projects in the past 70 years. It is for the first time in our history that we made sure that bidding takes place even in G to G Orange Line Project. #SSonGeo

I do not say that we have become equivalent to Europe but there is a paradigm shift in the health sector. Modern Hepatitis Filter Clinics have been set up in all the 36 districts of Punjab that are manned by professionally trained staff linked with PKLI & RC in Lahore. #SSonGeo

Punjab govt provided all the modern, state of the art health facilities across the provinces purely with its own resources. Now people don't have to travel to big cities for CT scans. Machines have been purchased & owned by Punjab govt but operated by the private sector. #SSonGeo

In 2013, PTI's slogan was to turn KP into centres of excellence in terms of health & education. How many health facilities did PTI govt set up? Where did they establish labs to check quality of drugs? How many universities did they establish ? #SSonGeo

Watch 2nd part of my interview with Saleem Safi on Geo News shortly at 10:05PM. 

#SSonGeo

@hsan_nabi_dar Thank u for ur kind words. It is an article of faith with me that politics is all about public service. We have a plan for Karachi. If the people elect us, the metropolis will undergo a transformation it richly deserves to emerge as cosmopolitan city of country. @junaidakram83

Do you know that Punjab's public health sector witnessed an increase of 525% budgetary allocation between 2008 and 2018?

Did PTI make institutions such as Forensic Science Agency & Dolphin Force in KP? #SSonGeo

Punjab govt selected thousands of police officers & constables purely on merit. Likewise, 300,000 teachers were recruited purely on merit. We established CTD, which is the best among 4 provinces. It carried out thousands of operations. #SSonGeo

In 2013, Niazi sb promised to build 300+ dams & provide electricity to whole country. IK recently said: "74MW bijli tayyar bethi hai". The fact is that 80-MW power project set up by previous govt has been out of order since 2016, PTI govt did not even repair it to date. #SSonGeo

PMLN govt built hospital in Swat with Rs. 700 million & handed over to KP govt. For the support of IDPs of North Waziristan, Punjab donated Rs. 800 million to ease their sufferings & hardships. It was meant to show solidarity with our brothers & sisters of KP. #SSonGeo

If people repose their trust in PMLN, we will begin work on addressing water crisis on war footings. Basha dam is a critical to these endeavors. PM NS completed land acquisition of Basha dam with Rs. 100 billion. Building big & small dams would be our top priority. #SSonGeo

The decisions in the party are taken with mutual consultations & consensus after threadbare discussions. If PMLN wins elections, the party and Quaid PMLN have nominated me as the candidate for PM's slot. There is no ambiguity on that. #SSonGeo

I am a witness to the decades-old friendship & companionship between Nawaz Sharif & Ch. Nisar Ali Khan. It is regrettable that there has been some strains in relations. The gulf should not widen anymore. #SSonGeo

We are passing through a critical phase. Look at India in our neighborhood. It has surpassed us in exports, IT & other sectors. Its IT-related exports r $60 billion whereas ours are only $1 billion or so. It is in the realm of economy that we have to compete with India. #SSonGeo
We should respect judiciary. It increases its prestige & honour through the quality of its decisions. The whole nation is looking at the judicial verdicts. #SSonGeo

ECP should address the concerns & reservations of all political parties regarding elections. I believe that all candidates taking part in the polls irrespective of their party affiliations should be allowed to contest elections. #SSonGeo

There is no dichotomy between the narratives of 'respect of vote' & development. One can only raise the slogan of respect to vote when one has performed on the ground. That is what PMLN has done during its term. There can be no respect of vote without service delivery. #SSonGeo
When I talk of institutional harmony, I do not do so to appease anyone. My point is that progress & long-term stability of any nation lies in respecting its institutions. #SSonGeo

Nandipur machinery got rusted @ Karachi port for 3 years, resulting in massive cost overrun. The Commission appointed by the SC held Babar Awan, who is now VP of PTI, responsible for delay in Nandipur power project but no action has been taken to date against him. WHY? #SSonGeo

Instead of complying with the LHC order, NAB did not initiate any inquiry and stated that no robbery was committed. The same is the case with EOBI and Nandipur power project, which was awarded without any tender. #SSonGeo

Away from appointment of Chairman NAB, the larger point is that NAB is duty bound, under the law, to conduct fair, transparent & above board system of accountability. Performance of NAB is before all of us. #SSonGeo
We should have focused more on increasing exports, & skill enhancement of working force. #SSonGeo
Our effort should be to learn lessons from the past mistakes & replace deprivations with happiness. #SSonGeo

PMLN started its election campaign from Karachi. I had a very good interaction with people belonging to different walks of life during my 2-day stay there. Pakistan was achieved after countless sacrifices under the inspiring leadership of the Quaid-i-Azam. #SSonGeo

Mian Nawaz Sharif is busy in looking after his wife. She is passing through the toughest time of her life. I appeal to the people to pray for recovery. It is unfortunate that the issue of Begum Kalsoom Nawaz's sickness was politicisized by the vested interests. #SSonGeo

We are in an electoral fight with the political parties. We are going to the electorate based on performance shown by PMLN governments in Punjab & Islamabad. Our politics is the politics of public service. It is now on the people to decide who to vote for. #SSonGeo

PMLN demonstrated responsible & mature attitude when the caretaker governments were formed. Though the interim Chief Minister Punjab had an unfavorable view of the PMLN, we did not go beyond getting our concerns registered. #SSonGeo

We have reasons to believe that the elections will be held on time & it is constitutional responsibility of ECP to make sure that the polls are conducted in a free and fair manner. The decisions of ECP will provide us with an evidence about their fairness or otherwise. #SSonGeo

Will be with Saleem Safi on Geo News program "Jirga" being aired tonight at 10pm. 

#SSonGeo

Grieved to learn about the murder of PMLN worker Abid Tanoli in Karachi today. I demand of Sindh government to investigate the incident & bring culprits to justice. My sympathies and heart-felt condolences to the bereaved family. May Allah rest the departed soul in eternal peace!

Heartiest congratulations to Archbishop Joseph Coutts on his appointment as Cardinal by Pope Francis. It certainly is a great honour for Pakistan & the Christian community. Hope he will continue to serve this country and bring laurels to the motherland. -ss

If people elect us in GE 2018, we will build a better Karachi, Peshawar & Quetta than Lahore. We are raising performance-based slogans & presenting our track record as a proof of our intentions. We have to catapult Pakistan into the league of the developed countries. #SSonDunyaTV

Those who played politics in the name of Janobi Punjab are exposed. My govt gave more share to South Punjab in development funds, provision of laptops & stipends for girls, PEEF scholarships & self-employment scheme, establishment of Universities & Hospitals. #SSonDunyaTV

Karachi is a gateway of Pakistan & our financial hub. It generates massive revenues & gigantic economic activity. For last 2 decades, the city has been meted out step-motherly treatment. PMLN will turn around Karachi by fixing its roads, water& sanitation, transport. #SSonDunyaTV

I made a comment in Karachi in light tone. Neither was any pun intended nor was it meant in a negative manner. Some elements tried to blow this comment out of proportions. I have great love & respect for Karachiites & will do everything in my power 2 ease their life. #SSonDunyaTV

We are in talks with like-minded parties who were our allies in recent past. We are doing seat adjustments with them. We will do everything for Pakistan's development but not compromise on the national interest. #SSonDunyaTV

I met Reham Khan sahiba only once when she interviewed me in 2014 for PTV programme. Imran Khan sahib is in the habit of cooking up lies. I filed three defamation cases against him for three allegations. Neither he nor his lawyer appeared in the court to respond. #SSonDunyaTV
PMLN government fixed energy & terrorism challenges. Our valiant armed forces rendered exemplary sacrifices to establish peace and writ of the state. #SSonDunyaTV
After fixing the energy crisis in these 5 years, It is water crisis now that is scaring us. It is on the top of our agenda. #SSonDunyaTV

Political instability that persisted for the last 1.5 years has largely contributed to economic problems. Plugging the deficits in state-owned enterprises is the biggest challenge now. We had plethora of problems but we needed to prioritize them. #SSonDunyaTV

While generation of additional MWs has been ensured, now is the time 2 attend to distribution & transmission issues. Circular debt is a daunting challenge afflicting power system. Cut down on line losses & improving system efficiency is key 2 eliminate circular debt. #SSonDunyaTV

Zaeem Qadri is my old companion & I have had very good relations with him. We offered him provincial assembly ticket but he had a different idea. Whatever others may say about him, I will not. Misunderstandings can happen. Will meet him before or after elections IA. #SSonDunyaTV
The detection of Chiniot iron ore scam alone resulted in preventing Rs. 450 billion from being siphoned off. Likewise, Rs. 160 billion were saved in the energy projects. #SSonDunyaTV

When was the last time that anyone saved as whopping a sum as Rs. 682 billion in the development? These tangible savings were channelized into the social sector development such as education & health. #SSonDunyaTV

It was not NAB or any other anti-corruption watchdog body but the Punjab govt & myself that detected potential corruption of Rs. 70 billion in Saaf Pani Company & got FIR registered. In Punjab, we made sure that corruption is eliminated at institutional level. #SSonDunyaTV

I appeal to the whole nation to pray for recovery of Begum Kalsoom Nawaz. Nawaz Sharif is busy in looking after her. Mian sahib is not talking about political issues & it is appropriate given the health condition of Kalsoom bhabi. #SSonDunyaTV

Elections'18 present momentous challenges & opportunities 4 the country. PMLN govt, under the leadership of Nawaz Sharif, overcame major challenges of terrorism & energy crisis during past 5 years. Controlling power outages to a large extent is no small achievement. #SSonDunyaTV

If this country has 2 move forward, it requires concerted efforts. Confrontation is not an option. All stakeholders need 2 sit across the table to talk about issues such as our India, US & Afghanistan policies. We need to be one with one voice on key national issues. #SSonDunyaTV

To overcome national challenges, we need collective wisdom. We have wasted a lot of time and energies. Let us think about our children. Let us think about future of this country. We can not afford repeat of disruptive politics. #SSonDunyaTV

Both Nawaz Sharif & I have had a relationship with Ch. Nisar that spans over 3 decades. I had convinced NS for award of a party ticket to Ch. Nisar. But then statements were made that caused misunderstandings & difference of opinion is found in every political party. #SSonDunyaTV

If NAB continues to victimize PMLN in the name of accountability, such an election will not be considered as free & fair. Let the candidates belonging to all parties present themselves before the people. People are the best judge on the performance of the parties. #SSonDunyaTV

Will be on the Kamran Khan Show on Dunya TV in a short while and will respond to the important questions.

Had a great day in Karachi today. Our economic vision & accomplishments in Punjab have strong resonance in Karachi, which is mini-Pakistan. Karachiites have always been warmly welcoming: Thank you, we won‚Äôt let you down! Good night! -ss

Just visited the Mazar-e-Quaid to offer Fateha. It is always a humbling experience to be at the Mazar of the great leader who shaped the course of history through his selfless dedication and singularity of purpose. I draw my inspiration from his lofty struggle.
The city of Quaid has not been given fair deal. Being the mega city which is business hub, Karachi deserves special care. The PML-N government will transform the landscape of the city.

The economy is back on track. Karachi is such an amazing city. It welcomes people belonging to the whole of the country & gives them opportunities for growth.The PML-N has prioritized the issues of vital importance for Karachi. Karachi needs a better and improved infrastructure.

WhenPMLN took over in2013, energy crisis, terrorism &likely economic meltdown were major challenges.Just imagine where we stand today aft 5yrs. 90% problem of load-shedding has been resolved.Terrorism has been curtailed.Karachi is thriving thanks 2restoration of peace in the city

Will the economy go up or down if non-stop sit-ins are staged? We have to decide whether we to vote for those who shut the country or those who take it forward; Whether we have to vote for those who set up projects under CPEC or those who create hurdle in its way.

The politics of rhetoric, character assassination & lock-downs has hurt the country and has to be rejected. The challenges facing the country require serious &positive political approach. The business community should ask others as to what they did in power.

Besides, I also articulated the broad contours of the policies we will implement to promote business &commerce in the country in general &Karachi in particular. Time has come that the nation elects its leaders on the basis of performance and delivery.

Had a wonderful interaction with the business community of Karachi a little while ago. Was humbled by the kind words expressed by the business leaders for my person. Shared with the story of development and business model we followed in Punjab.
Congratulations to President Erdogan on his electoral victory. Wishing his new term brings stability and prosperity for the people of Turkey.

Will be reaching Karachi today IA on a two-day tour to kick-start PMLN's Election Campaign 2018. Being a party of the Quaid-i-Azam, it is our pledge that we will not rest till we accomplish the dream of Pakistan being a progressive, inclusive, democratic & Islamic welfare state.

Remembering Mohtarma Benazir Bhutto on her birthday, Pakistan lost a leader with courage & determination, whose contributions to democracy are appreciated by all. May her soul rest in peace!

Today on the occasion of World Refugee Day, we express our sympathy, support and solidarity with the world‚Äôs homeless & stateless persons who now number 68 million. Pakistan has the distinction of having hosted the largest refugee population for the longest duration in history.

Dangers posed by climate change are present & real. Being an agrarian economy, the country faces severe challenges to its water resources & food security. In view of the gravity of the problem, I have directed PMLN's Manifesto Committee to prepare a comprehensive road map.. (1/2)

Thanks to all the police officials, doctors, nursing & waste management staff & other service providers for their amazing work in the line of duty. They perform their duties away from families on Eid so that we can be with our loved ones & have the best of times. Real Heroes! -ss

Father's Day draws our attention to critical role that our fathers play in shaping our lives.
My late father, Mian Sharif sb, was a self-made role model for our entire family, who inspired & influenced us. I learnt values of honesty, a dedicated work ethic & discipline from him.

Just heard about the incident of firing on security officials in Quetta. Terrorists have tried to vitiate the festive environment of Eid. We owe our Eid celebrations to d martyrs who r protecting us @ the cost of their own lives. They have sacrificed their today for our tomorrow!
Leaving for UK shortly to inquire after my Bhabhi's health. She is in ICU and needs your prayers.... Eid Mubarak to all of you ... have a great day! -ss

Wishing all Pakistanis celebrating, a happy Eid with their families. I want everyone to pray that next Ramazan & Eid will be in Naya Pakistan where we will be on the road to fulfilling our great God-given potential & becoming the nation that was envisaged by our founding fathers.

Just spoke to Turkish President and the Prime Minister & exchanged Eid greetings. He asked about PMLN Quaid Nawaz Sharif & conveyed his best wishes for early recovery of Begum Kalsoom. Conveyed my best wishes to President Erdogan & AK Parti for the upcoming elections in Turkey.

Happy birthday to H.E. President Xi Jinping whose vision of shared prosperity articulated through Belt & Road Initiative is reshaping the world. CPEC will continue 2 remain a singular contribution of the Chinese President, which has helped Pakistan's economy & polity in a big way
All our prayers are with Begum  Kulsoom Nawaz. May Allah grant her Shifa e Kamila.

My Bhabhi Begum Kalsoom Nawaz is being kept in ICU due to her serious condition. The whole family is praying for her recovery. 
As the Holy Month of Ramadan comes to an end, I ask my compatriots to join me in prayers for her speedy recovery. The power of prayer is paramount!
Saddened to learn of the death of Sports Editor Dawn, Majid Khan tonight in Karachi. He was a dedicated journalist with a passion for the game. My prayers go to his family.

The killing of Kashmiri journalist @bukharishujaat is yet another reflection of the Indian repression to muzzle independent voices and to stop the truth of the worst human rights violations in the held valley from being reported. Strongly condemn this coward act!
Yet another amazing victory by Team Pakistan in T20. Takeaway lesson: when you have a goal to achieve, & a leader to inspire you, no obstacle is insurmountable. Pakistan Zindaabad!

Dr Ishrat Hussain has raised very valid points in his op-ed. No dev model is sustainable unless it is deeply rooted in the people being the engine of growth. Reverse brain drain through an attractive incentive system is dire need of the hour to propel national progress. Must Read

Glad to know that renowned Pakistani writer, Kamila Shamsie, was awarded prestigious Women Prize for Fiction for her novel... Yet another sign that our women are making incredible contributions to several fields & making Pakistan proud in the process...

It's time for comprehensive peace talks in our region. International community must focus on the peace process in Afghanistan. Dialogue b/w Pakistan & India over Kashmir should also resume, so that the long-festering Kashmir dispute is resolved in accordance with UN resolutions.

If the United States and North Korea can return from the brink of a nuclear flashpoint, there is no reason why Pakistan and India cannot do the same, beginning with a dialogue on Kashmir whose heroic people have resisted and rejected Indian occupation. (2/3)

Singapore Summit between USA & North Korea should set a good precedent for Pakistan & India to follow. Ever since the start of Korean War, the two nations have been at odds with one another; both threatening to use military force with their nuclear arsenals facing each other(1/3)
Our homeland is Blessed by the Almighty since the birth of Pakistan on August 14, 1947, coincided with 27th Ramadan, Laylat Ul Qadr, making our dawn of freedom more auspicious. -ss

My msg to all PTI old party workers is: If any of you feel you have been neglected or unfairly overlooked in allocation of Party tickets, you shd bring a petition to PTI Central Off addressed to Add SG Arshad Dad. I will personally review each petition & take action accordingly.

Statement by NAB prosecutor today that there is now ample evidence to show that Avenfield apartments belonged to Nawaz Sharif since 1993, shows how the law works differently for the ordinary citizen and for the powerful. This is our tragedy - existence of 2 parallel Pakistans.
I pray for enduring peace in Afghanistan with the hope that the ceasefire initiative by both sides, the first since 2001, will achieve positive results, InshaAllah. -ss

People & valiant armed forces of Pakistan have paid a heavy price 4 peace as 70000+ soldiers & civilians have been martyred & wounded since 9/11. No country has sacrificed more than Pak in campaign against terrorism& we have fought the most successful inland war against terrorism

Should the PMLN return to office after the July 25 general elections, it will be our top priority to promote peace in Afghanistan as peace in Afghanistan is inextricably intertwined with peace and security in Pakistan.

Its a positive first step towards promoting an Afghan-led & Afghan-owned peace process. PMLN govt had played a pivotal role in initiating steps for peace in Afghanistan, including hosting 1st ever direct, face 2 face talks between Afghan govt & Afghan Taliban in Murree in July'15
We welcome the initiatives for ceasefire in Afghanistan during Eid-ul-Fitr, mooted first by the Afghan government and then also by the Afghan Taliban.

Politics for change is the one that is deeply rooted in the moral ethos. When you trade morality for power & employ every trick, fair & foul, to get to the prized post, you lose all justifications for a moral case. IK betrayed his workers' trust just 2 fulfill his craze for power

With four more Palestinians martyred, brutish Israel continues with its killing spree. Even Palestinian nurses, children & people with special needs are not safe from its oppression. World is equally culpable in these crimes against humanity due to silence it has maintained. -ss

As the country confronts spiraling power & water crises alongside a heat wave, I have written a letter to the Caretaker PM to take nation into confidence & inform them of the correct picture of the acute power crisis & status of the Rs 500bn circular debt left by the PMLN govt.

Liba Wahaj has made her parents and the country proud through her meritorious achievement of resolving the maths puzzle in a record time. Prodigies like her are the future of this country & given investment in their education, they can work wonders. Congrats to the little gal!

Grieved to learn about the passing away of veteran politician Rasul Bux Palejo whose struggle for democracy, human rights and rule of law will continue to inspire many. My condolences to the bereaved family! May Allah bless his soul in eternal peace! -ss

While Pakistan can defend itself against any aggression with its military might, the real wars we have to win are in the realms of economy, terrorism, exports, health, education, poverty & information tech. Only by winning these wars we can build a better tomorrow for our people.

The only way nation can break begging bowl & become self-reliant is 2 come down hard on corruption & apply fair, transparent & across the board accountability. Many cases such as Nandipur, EOBI, NICL, & Chiniot Ores are crying out 4 an action by concerned authorities. #5YearsOfSS

I want to sensitize every section of Pakistan's elite, be it Generals, politicians, Judges or anyone else, if we do not work in harmony for soft revolution, then God forbid, no one can stop the bloody revolution from happening. Let us act before it is too late. #5YearsOfSS
Independence of press and media is key to building a democratic society. Media's role in national development cannot be ignored. #5YearsOfSS

Let me make a public pledge here. If the PMLN govt comes into power, we will make sure that Diamir Basha Dam is completed on priority. Project will store 8.1 MAF water and generate over 4000 MW clean and cheap electricity. #5YearsOfSS

Nandipur Power Project is a glaring example of corruption whose contract was awarded without any bidding. Former Law Minister Babar Awan sat on its file for three years, which resulted in its cost escalation, thereby wasting billions of rupees due to cost overruns. #5YearsOfSS

Kala Bagh Dam is no doubt an economically very feasible & useful project. However, nothing is more important than national cohesion among the federating units. I would not support building of Kala Bagh project as long as it is objected to by other provinces. #5YearsOfSS

Given history of Martial Laws & geo-strategic challenges facing the country, only way we can serve national interest well is for all the stakeholders to sit together & propose a way forward. PMLN will take lead on such a process after reelection IA. #5YearsOfSS

Besides extending the scope of Rescue 1122 to other regions, Punjab launched innovative projects such as Motorbike Ambulance Service & 'Mahfooz Maan' under which pregnant women in rural areas are transported to hospitals for safe deliveries. #5YearsOfSS

Playing the role of an affectionate big brother, Punjab has always been keen to extend every kind of help to other federating units. Since the 7th NFC Award in 2010, Punjab has voluntarily surrendered a total of Rs. 88 billion of its share to other provinces. #5YearsOfSS

Punjab contributed Rs. 1 billion to Pak Army for construction of fence along Pakistan-Afghan border. The fencing is a wonderful initiative of COAS, which will stop infiltration of undesirable elements from Afghanistan, leading to improved security in the country. #5YearsOfSS

Under the Punjab Safe Cities Authority, 12000 cameras have been installed in Lahore. The home work has been done for extension of the project to five other Divisions of Punjab. I ask what has other provinces done on this count? #5YearsOfSS

We set up Punjab Food, Agriculture and Drug Authority, which will serve as an umbrella for provision of pure and unadulterated food, agricultural and drug products to the people. This initiative is inspired by successful conduct of Drug Labs. #5YearsOfSS

Punjab invested billions of rupees for development of agriculture sector. Under Land Records Management & Information System, all the land records of rural areas has been digitized. World Bank described LRMIS as the successful case study for other countries. #5YearsOfSS

Punjab government distributed interest-free loans of worth Rs. 40 billion among the 2 million people. The scheme has so far benefited over 12 million people, enabling them to earn their livelihood through honest means and stand on their feet economically. #5YearsOfSS
In the realm of education, Punjab has set up 19 Universities and 200 new colleges during its tenure. #5YearsOfSS

Punjab govt achieved an unprecedented feat of saving Rs. 682 billion for the 1st time in Pakistan's history. If there is anything I can b proud of as servant of the people, it is these savings of nation's hard-earned money.These savings have been used 4 public welfare #5YearsOfSS

PMLN will invest its passion & energy into building dams & water reservoirs. It is PMLN that completed land acquisition for Diamir Basha Dam with Rs. 100 billion. What did PTI do for construction of any hydropower project in water-rich KP province? #5YearsOfSS
Imran Khan gave 11-points. The question is: how many of these points were implemented by PTI government in KP? #5YearsOfSS

Punjab is proud to bring 90,000 children working at the brick-kilns to schools by offering their families financial incentives. I personally led this anti-labour campaign. Now they are getting education from schools and will become productive members of this society. #5YearsOfSS

We established state of the art Pakistan Kidney & Liver Institute & Research Centre. 2 first kidney transplants have been carried out successfully. Free medical treatment to the kidney and liver patients will save them from agony of traveling to India for transplant. #5YearsOfSS

Punjab transformed public transport system. A good, efficient, & dignified public transport system is key to improvement of local economy & facilitation of movement to all manner of people. 3 Metro bus systems, upcoming Orange Line Metro Train Project & Speedo buses>> #5YearsOfSS

Punjab-Tianjin University of Technology has been set up in Punjab. Unless you equip the youth with vocational & technical training, u cannot make them stand on their feet. This University is in addition to many technical colleges already working in the province. #5YearsOfSS

Under Punjab Educational Endowment Fund, scholarships worth of worth Rs. 17 billion have been distributed among 350,000 students belonging to the poor households purely on merit. Can KP or Sindh cite any such one single example? #5YearsOfSS

Punjab set up power projects out of its own resources in addition to overseeing CPEC and federal power projects that were completed in record time. The electricity generated from these projects have been added to the national grid, benefiting the whole Pakistan. #5YearsOfSS

Federal Government under Nawaz Sharif brought about marked improvements in the area of counter-terrorism, energy and economy. Pakistan armed forces & other law enforcement agencies personnel rendered sacrifices to bring terrorism to its lowest point. #5YearsOfSS

I will be addressing a press conference at 3 pm today in which I will highlight the performance of the Punjab government over the course of last five years. Will also throw light on progress achieved in some of the key areas of governance.

Strongly condemn terrorist attack on FC check post in Mastung. I pay my heartfelt homage to the FC personnel who laid down their lives in the line of duty. Sympathies for their bereaved families and prayers for early recovery of the injured. -ss
@ChaudhryUmerIqb Thank you Chaudhry sahib!

The generosity of the people of Pakistan never ceases to amaze me. Our Zakat Iftars for SKMT have broken all records this year. Today at Islamabad's SKMT Zakat Iftar we broke last year's record of Rs 8.5 crore and collected over Rs 12 crore.

Any PTI mbr who asks for money from a prospective candidate in return for a PTI ticket; or anyone you know who gives money in order to get favoured for a PTI ticket must be reported to the Party by calling this no: 0303 5375113. I will be deciding the final allocation of tickets.

We owe our success & place in society 2 the role our parents play in shaping our lives. Islam has placed utmost emphasis on being excellent in our treatment of parents & elders. Whatever I achieved in life is owed to my father & constant prayers of my mother. God bless ur parents

Just arrived Bahawalpur after inaugurating upgraded DHQ Hospital Rajanpur... Will be inaugurating Drug Testing Lab, E-Khidmat Centre, Cardiology & Kidney Centres, Regional Blood Centre in addition to Cholistan Vet University & Child Protection Bureau in Bahawalpur Insha Allah ...

Proud 2 appoint Asma Hamid as chief law officer of province. She is 1st woman 2 become Adv Gen of Punjab. Her expertise in law & deft handling of cases has retrieved govt land & property worth billions of Rs. It is 2 recognise her professional competence & 2 encourage other women
Praying for Zakia Mehdi, in hospital in Dubai, to get well again.

Seems a whole new ministry is needed to check the scale of SS's #SharifFamily corruption. PTI demanded audit of 56 companies but only 11 were audited & audit reports revealed irregularities of Rs 166 bn. All key ministers & MPAs involved thru brothers, wives & close family mbrs.
Want to congratulate Justice (r) Nasir ul Mulk on being appointed Caretaker PM.

Youm-e-Takbeer: a day of national pride when the country emerged as the first nuclear power of the Islamic world under the leadership of Nawaz Sharif. Takeaway lesson: consensus on key national issues is the way forward for this country. Congrats to the nation!

Strongly condemn the attack by JUI F hoodlums on our MNA Qaiser Jamal's Hujra in Darra Adam Khel on Sunday simply because he stood up for Pakistan and supported the FATA merger bill in National Assembly.
I want to thank the people of Karachi for their generosity. We raised Rs 13 crore at our annual SKMT Zakat Iftar today - breaking last year's record.

We demand that all the senior officers working with SS in Punjab should be put on ECL and not be allowed to leave the country, because the mega corruption of SS and Sons' Corruption Limited Company needs to be exposed.
What an incredible victory at Lords today! The men in green make the nation proud. Pakistan Zindabad! -ss

Congratulations to the Pak cricket team for a great win against England at Lords. This was a team hardly any expert gave a chance of beating England & that too so comprehensively. A great team effort. Last time I landed in Karachi Pak won Champions trophy & today the Lords Test!

Off to Muzaffargarh ... will inaugurate the expansion project of Recep Tayyip Erdogan hospital; adding 250 beds & other necessary medical facilities.. will also visit the revamped DHQ hospital muzaffargarh IA!

Last 5years witnessed record power generation. Against 18000MW capacity developed over last 66 years, PMLN govt added a whopping 11000+MW to national grid in just 5years. If u ask me 2 single out 1 factor that explains this incredible accomplishment: It‚Äôs passion 4 public service

Just visited the family of Lance Naik Shaheed Muhammad Shahid Minhas in Shakargarh. The whole nation salutes him for his sacrifice for defence of the motherland. These heroes continue to inspire us with their heroic acts. May Allah be with the bereaved family!
Off to Shakargarh ...

Historic day for Pakistan as NA passed a constitutional amendment to merge FATA with KP. Mainstreaming of FATA will open up new doors of development for the region. It‚Äôs yet another example of how we can attain impossible by coming together 4 Pakistan. Congrats to people of FATA!

I want to congratulate the people of FATA. The merger of FATA with KP is a new beginning for those hardy and proud people who have been left behind in the world. The merger will confront a host of problems but with determination and perseverance these can be overcome.

In 2013 election campaign, we vowed 2
end the curse of loadshedding. Today AH, 3 LNG-fired power plants are fully operational & contributing ~3600MW to national grid in addition to 1320MW Sahiwal & 400MW Bahawalpur Solar Park. Going 2 review progress on 4th LNG plant in Jang 2day

Adios @ABdeVilliers17 ! I remember how you devoured WI with an incredible century off 31 balls. Cricket fans will miss you - one of the greatest batsmen in all forms of the game! btw @SAfridiOfficial how can we forget your 37-ball knock that held the field for quite long!

Visited residence of Col Sohail Abid Shaheed to offer Fateha today. Was deeply moved by courage & fortitude of his family. Sons of the soil like Col Sohail are our pride & our identity. No sacrifice can be more supreme than that of a life. The whole nation is deeply indebted!

Off to Sargodha. Will address a public meeting besides inspecting Langarwala bridge connecting Sargodha & Khushab. I was scheduled to visit revamped DHQ hospital Khushab too. However, in compliance with guidelines of ECP, I have had to cancel my trip to Khushab.

Will be visiting revamped Chiniot District headquarter hospital shortly IA where almost ~3000 patients are treated on daily basis. As part of @GovtOfPunjab hepatitis control program, Hepatitis Prevention & Treatment Clinic (linked with PKLI&RC) has been established here as well..

Absolutely shameful! A thrice-elected PM today declared before NAB Court that the Avenfield Apts belonged to his sons and he didn't know where they got the money from! But as they are UK citizens the law of Pakistan does not apply to them acc to NS! Qatari letter also  disowned.

Will IA be inaugurating Pakistan Institute of Neurosciences (PINS) this afternoon - a state of the art neurosurgical tower upscaled on modern lines at Lahore General Hospital, consisting of 500 beds, 10 operation theaters, Pathology lab & other important medical facilities ...
@RiazToori Have ordered for verification of facts. Rest assured that the perpetrators, howsoever powerful, will not be spared. Thank you for informing me.
I want to thank the generous people of Sialkot who made it possible for SKMTCH to collect Rs 8 crores at the annual Ramazan Zakat collection today. This broke last year's record of Rs 7 crores.

Reaching Bhikki power plant shortly IA. Proj achieved a milestone as it has attained its combined cycle of 1180MW in just 32 months. Since the launch of its phase 1 in March‚Äô17, Bhikki has contributed a total of 3.1 billion units of affordable electricity to national grid so far!

Condemn the terrorist attack in Jalalabad on a cricket ground while match was in progress last night. It is sad that the emerging Afghan cricketers, who have brought so much joy to their war-torn country, are being targeted.
Grieved to learn about the killing of students including a Pakistani exchange student, Sabika Sheikh, in an incident of shooting at a US school. My heart-felt sympathies to bereaved families!
Today at the SKMTCH Iftar fundraiser we raised Rs 14.5 crores - breaking the previous year's record of Rs 13 crores. I want to thank all our donors in Lahore for their generosity.

I pay homage to our valiant security forces for foiling the terrorist bid in Quetta, saving the country from a huge loss. The nation stands shoulder 2 shoulder with armed forces, police & security agencies in this fight against terrorism & proud of their sacrifices for motherland

Wishing Muslims everywhere Ramazan Mubarak - may they have a peaceful Ramazan. May Allah protect those in conflict zones & those confronting the brutality of Israeli and Indian Occupation forces in Palestine and Kashmir.
We salute our brave soldiers like Col Sohail Abid who embraced martyrdom in an anti-terrorist operation in Balochistan. May Allah give his family the strength to bear this loss.

The holy month of Ramzan is a great opportunity for purification & cleansing of self & reform of our conduct. The essence of this holy month lies in the establishment of an egalitarian society. Take care of the fellow human beings. May Allah bless u all. May Allah bless Pakistan!

Much as I appreciate Nawaz campaigning for PTI through his now-obvious love fest with Modi, to save his corruption & business interests; I am alarmed that at the rate he is speaking Modi's language PTI may not be able to take in the massive exodus from PMLN.

This day will be remembered as a black day in history. Opening of US Embassy in Jerusalem is the greatest disservice to the cause of peace & stability in the region. Israel has blood of innocent Palestinians whose only 'crime' is to demand their own homeland as promised by the UN

Like Kashmiris, Palestinians are heroically resisting repression.. Pakistan remains firmly committed in its moral, political & diplomatic support to them. This is high time for implementation of the UN resolutions for self-determination if the world has to have a shot at PEACE...

PMLN rejects all assertions, direct or implied, made in news report of DAWN,dated 12-5-18. State of Pakistan & all its institutions stand together in the global fight against terrorism. We strongly believe that interests of Pakistan r supreme to all personal & political interests

Will address the people of Sindh at Sindhri Mirpur Khas shortly InshaAllah ... I‚Äôm sure you are aware of the fact that mangoes of this soil that are also known by the name of this area (Sindheri Aam) are popular the world over ...
Off to Sindhri, Mirpur Khas ...

Nawaz Sharif is the modern-day Mir Jafar, who collaborated with the British to enslave his nation for personal gains. Nawaz speaking Modi's language against Pak State simply to protect his ill-gotten Rs 300b stashed in his sons companies abroad.

International community, from Australia to Africa, appreciated our delivery in Punjab on people-centric development! Great interaction with ambassadors of 75+ countries today in ISB. We have so many friends & well-wishers, must harness this goodwill for greater good of Pakistan!

Looking forward to engaging with envoys of friendly countries today in Islamabad... Pakistan‚Äôs journey of progress & development from 2013 to 2018 has been incredible... Pakistan‚Äôs soldiers, policemen and citizens have contributed massively to the world peace and stability... -ss

Pakistan is at the cusp of historic democratic transition. PMLN government fought heavy odds to place the country at a take-off stage. Will be sharing an incredible story of last 5 years with the diplomatic community & heads of multilateral agencies tomorrow in Islamabad IA.

Inaugurated another hepatitis prevention & treatment clinic (HPTC) during my visit 2 DHQ hospital Jhelum 2day. DHQ is recently upgraded & equipped with latest machinery & state of art pathology lab. A network of HPTCs is being setup across Punjab linking to main PKLI&RC in Lahore

On my way 2 Nankana Sahib 2day, had a stopover @ wheat procurement centre in Safdarabad 2 get feedback of wheat growers. @GovtOfPunjab has introduced an IT powered system 4 fair distribution of gunny bags. Later inaugurated Hepatitis filter clinic& new outdoor bloc of DHQ Nankana

The Asghar Khan case reveals vividly how PMLN is a creation of the Establishment and funded by them; & the case also shows how the "ladla" was protected and this open and shut case was not heard by the SC for two decades.

Int Thalassemia  day: Thalassemia is the commonest inherited disease in Pak. Work on an emergency footing must be done to implement its preventive programme. Our Health Card  prog in KP ensures no one is denied access to medical aid for want of funds.
Off to my third visit to Sindh today in less than three weeks. Will be addressing PMLN Hyderabad division workers convention in Matiari ... PMLN is getting re-charged in Sindh Alhumdulillah ...
Pleased to know the feedback of patients at DHQ Chakwal .. the hospital is equipped with modern facilities & brilliant HR ... and MashaAllah rendering quality medicare to the people of this area ...

Off to Chakwal today ... My visits to DHQs across the province are aimed at personally seeing the improvements that the government has brought about in the health sector in last 5 years and to know the public feedback..

Strongly condemn the attack on PTI workers by PPP at our jalsagah camp in Karachi yesterday. Sindh govt must take action against those who used violence against our workers. Strong arm tactics by PPP reflects their fear of PTI's rising popularity in Sindh.

Just had detailed meeting with our parliamentarians 4m South Punjab.. Massive development work was carried out in this region with 36% share of budget spent on an average. It was right of the people that we fulfilled. Those doing politics in the name of South Punjab stand exposed

The held Kashmir presents a picture of a living hell where humanity is shamed on daily basis by the Indian occupation forces with abandon. The whole valley is up in protest against the Indian brutalities... How long will the world continue to look the other way as Kashmir burns??

Strongly condemn the assassination attempt on my friend Ahsan Iqbal... Just spoke to him & he is in high spirits MashaAllah ... Those who indulged in this heinous act will be brought to justice... PMLN will not be browbeaten into submission... Prayers for quick recovery!! -ss
Strongly condemn attack on Ahsan Iqbal today.
Sapling*

Just reached RahimYarKhan - Will inaugurate operational Khawaja Fareed University of Engineering & Information Technology, a project that will benefit the youth of South Punjab educationally. Will also speak to students besides inaugurating completed Hasilpur-Bahawalpur road.

Visited DHQ hospital Vehari earlier today.. After installation of CT scan machines at DHQ level, state-of-the-art Pathology Labs are being set up across the province.. We have co-opted the private sector for revolutionary changes in this vital sector..

A free independent press is of vital importance for a strong democratic Pakistan. Journalists give voice to voiceless, expose misgovernance & injustice in the society & hold govts/leaders accountable with sole objective of making our society & the country a better place to live..

Inspected a state-of-the-art medical depot that is an excellent facility for storage of centrally procured medicines, Biosafety Level-3 Lab & a monitoring surveillance system that has connected THQs & DHQs of Punjab through IT. Also visited extension project of Drug Testing Labs.
Wishing Naeem Bokhari the best of health and a speedy recovery. My prayers, and the prayers of so many others, are with him.
@Specterational Have directed chief traffic officer to take appropriate measures to fix it asap ... sorry for the inconvenience

PMLN acknowledes and encourages the role of women in national politics. Any statement demeaning them is highly irresponsible. We have to maintain decency and element of respect in political discourse. I apologise for anti-women remarks made by some party leaders.

Today our Quaid's words continue to resonate: ‚ÄúI also hope that while planning your factory, you have provided proper residential accommodation and other amenities for the workers, for no industry can thrive without contented labour‚Äù - Jinnah at Valika Textile Mills Ltd 26.9.1947

Respect to labourers who have contributed so richly to building of this country with their sweat & blood. A society's moral conscience has 2b determined by its treatment of less privileged sections who r its real benefactor. We would not have come this far without their hard work

Today, let me reiterate PTI's commitment to protecting the rights and dignity of Workers & ensuring that the rights enshrined in our Constitution become a reality. No country can develop without protecting the rights of its workers.

Disgusted by & strongly condemn the filthy language used by Rana Sanaullah & Abid Sher Ali against our PTI women. In the past 30 yrs these people have always disrespected women which is against our religion & culture. I want to thank our women for coming out in such huge numbers!
I strongly condemn the targeted killings of the peaceful Hazara community. It is shameful for our nation that we cannot protect this small community of our citizens.

I invite those who accuse us of being urban-centric 2 come 2 Layyah to see what transformation has been brought about in health sector here. Visit 2 DHQ will give you a fresh perspective about the our pervasive health reforms across the province irrespective of urban-rural divide

Deeply saddened by the news of a terrorist attack that targeted journalists in Kabul. The Afghan brothers and sisters have suffered extreme hardships including the loss of precious lives. My sympathies are with the bereaved families and the people of Afghanistan.

Challenge political opponents 2 compete with PMLN on performance & delivery. PMLN brought country out of economic mess. Consider: highest agriculture growth rate of 3.81% in last one decade, highest industrial sector growth rate of 5.8% & above all biggest ever GDP growth of 5.8%

Will be addressing a public gathering in Mardan shortly from now. Will expose those who cheated the people of KP in the name of ‚Äúchange‚Äù and wasted their time. The people of KP will throw them out through their vote in upcoming elections InshaAllah.

Today is one of the happiest & most fulfilling days of my life as I see SKMCH accredited by US Joint Commission International. This means that after a thorough audit lasting for days, SKMCH has been recognised internationally as a provider of  world class services.

Got telephonic call from Turkish President a little while ago. He conveyed his best wishes 4 PMLN & prayed for early recovery of Begum Kalsoom Nawaz. Thanked President Erdogan for his best wishes & kind words. We wish him success in the upcoming elections. Pak-Turk dosti Zindabad

Visited another recently completed THQ hospital at Kahna. Pleased to know the satisfactory feedback of patients and state-of-the-art facilities that are being provided there. Apart from constructing new hospitals, district & tehsil level hospitals have been revamped across Punjab

Another darbari of the Godfather disqualified on the same pattern - using iqama to shield corruption & indulge in money laundering - as well as being guilty of brazen conflict of interest.  Allah Al Haq hai - Kh Asif targeted SKMTH & has been publicly humiliated here & abroad

I want to congratulate all those who stood with me and PTI during 22 testing years of political struggle. Today as PTI marks 22 years of being, it has gone through a political struggle of difficult opposition politics like no other political party in Pak.

Great day 2day as provinces joined Fed.govt in unanimously approving National Water Policy.Adoption of this policy followed by signing of Pakistan Water Charter manifests r commitment 2 fight water challenge proactively. Principle of "in unity lies our strength" stands reinforced
Strongly condemn the attack on the check post in Quetta. I extend my heartfelt sympathies to the bereaved families and pray to Allah Almighty to rest the departed souls in peace!
I want to thank Aneel and the Manchester SKMT Committee for raising a record ¬£900k last night (abt Rs 15 crores); Thank you also to all the British Pakistanis for their generosity.

Productive day in Karachi.. Met political leadership of Karachi, Pmln workers & the business community. For the success of democracy, all political parties must work in unison on shared national agenda. Time has come that we learn 2 put past @ back burner & move on as one nation!

Freedom of thought & expression is a constitutional right of all Pakistanis. Pushtun,Punjabi,Mohajir,Sindhi &  Baloch r all equal Pakistanis. PMLN does not believe in politics of ethnicity. Pakistan belongs to all of its people. Let us work together 4 peaceful&prosperous Pakistan

Will shortly be addressing a public gathering in Layari.. The amazing welcome I have received from political leaders and the Karaciites has obligated me to rid Karachi of filth & broken roads.. Fixing Karachi together is our mission statement..

Just visited Mardan House where I met Shahi Syed and other ANP leaders and discussed prevailing political situation in the country and particularly in Karachi. Heading to meet MQM headquarters Bahadurabad.

Allama Iqbal, intellectual giant & sage of his times, is my inspiration and a teacher... His revolutionary ideas and the concept of a welfare state is the essence of Pakistan... We owe this country to the vision of Iqbal and leadership of the Quaid... -ss

I welcome the remarks of CJP on the shortcomings he observed in Peshawar especially the sewerage system which is in need of drastic measures. We should have given more attention & funds to improve these basic facilities for the ppl but we are  trying to take corrective measures

Appreciate CJP's praise for KP IGP & CS. When competent officers are appointed solely on merit, as in KP, the Police & Administration work effectively. In contrast, Punjab & Sindh have seen nepotism flourish with appts made on personal affinities of loyalists and "yes men".
Deplorable how Sindh police is instituting false cases against our people who were part of the protest against a young girl's murder in Karachi. Reflects the shameful state of law and order in Sindh.

Approach of 'we' instead of 'I' & 'you' needs to be our hallmark. Development of one province is not enough,if all federating units progress in unison,then Pakistan will be able to move forward & carve out a distinguished niche for itself in the comity of nations that it deserves

Will be inaugurating National History Museum & Amphitheater this evening, the first of its kind in Pakistan that is spread over 35000 square feet. The Museum preserves & celebrates ideology & struggle for Pakistan under the leadership of the Quaid-i-Azam.
Taking governance to the doorstep of the people has been a hallmark of our politics. Efficient delivery of services is possible through empowerment of the people at the grassroots.

The shameful firing on Justice Ijaz ul Ahsan's house is typical of intimidation Sharifs & PMLN do against judiciary & all those who expose them. On 29 April at Minar-i-Pakistan we will show that nation stands with Judiciary & against corrupt mafia that has stolen nation's wealth.

Strongly condemn the firing at Justice Ijaz ul Ahsan's house. These Sicilian-mafia-like tactics to pressurise senior judiciary are unacceptable in any democracy. PTI stands firmly behind the Judiciary & Rule of Law & this is one reason behind our 29th April Minar-i-Pakistan jalsa

Back 2 LHR after my visit 2 KHI with marathon, back 2 back dozen plus meetings with: business leaders, lawyers, media, young entrepreneurs, politicos & PMLN workers gave me HOPE that Karachi is looking 4 sincere & honest leadership that can restore the greatness of this mega city

Karachi is mini Pakistan where people of all backgrounds live. PMLN govt restored peace & the cosmopolitan image of the mega city by eliminating terrorism & busting armed gangs under the leadership of Nawaz Sharif. Peaceful & prosperous Karachi is central to Pakistan's progress.

Subh Bakhair. Leaving for Karachi on a day-long tour where I will meet a cross section of people including lawyers, businessmen, media, youth, minorities, besides addressing the PMLN Workers Convention in the evening InshaAllah..

We have always believed in the supremacy of law and the neutrality of its arbiters. Despite the judicial verdict, PML-N will continue to be the largest political party of the country under the guidance of Nawaz Sharif.

Today is a day of test for the nation when a judicial decision has barred a popular national leader from serving the county who made it a nuclear power and who has the distinct honor of being elected Prime Minister thrice.

PMLN & PPP revealed their intent of not granting voting rights to Overseas Pak when they objected to this in the SC hearing yesterday. This is why they created hurdles in Elec Reforms Comm also on this issue. Unacceptable to deny this constitutional right to Overseas Pakistanis.

For how long will India continue to get away with its brutalities in the occupied Kashmir? For how long will the world conscience feign ignorance while the young Kashmiri lives are cut short? The worst human rights violations in the held Kashmir must prick the world's conscience.

@BushraGohar Thanku.. Had a great meeting with senior ANP leaders today in Peshawar. The way ANP has taken on terrorists unflinchingly despite losing scores of workers & leaders is indeed appreciable. A day will soon come when country will b rid of terrorism in all its forms & manifestations

Ppl of KP r politically aware. They will not allow fake change makers 2 cheat them again. Real change is the one that touches people's hearts & makes their lives better. Upcoming election is an opportunity 2 reject those who indulged in politics of agitation & abuse & wasted time

Today I am going to Peshawar to address PMLN workers convention.
I'll also try to have a look at the snail-paced BRT project to assess that in how much time, after winning next elections IA, we'll be able to complete the project with...what our Chinese brothers say...Punjab speed

PTI rejects yet another amnesty scheme which is one more brazen attempt by Abbasi to save criminals. Why would PM seek to do this just 45 days before govt term ends? & why just 2 weeks before budget? This is a tax on honest people - a slap on the face of honest taxpayers.
Shahbaz Sharif's sudden praise for the COAS sounded more like a job application!
Want to congratulate CJP for his decision on PTI's petition, ensuring that overseas Pakistanis, the nation's most valuable asset, have their right to vote materialise.

Strongly condemn the brutality of Indian  forces against innocent Kashmiris and the killing of unarmed civilians in IOK. The people of Pak stand with the Kashmiris democratic struggle for self determination. The UNSC must act against Indian aggression in IOK.

International community MUST take notice of the Indian atrocities on the Kashmiris. Implications of silence on the gross human rights violations in the held Kashmir are grave for peace & stability in the nuclearized South Asia.

Each time India tried to hoodwink the international community by seeking to describe the indigenous freedom movement as externally inspired, the Kashmiris called its hoax & exposed the reality of its designs through the exercise of their democratic right of peaceful protest ...

Strongly condemn Indian brutalities on Kashmiris. Worst human rights violations on Kashmiris over the decades has exposed the real face of India that claims to be the largest democracy. Real democracies listen to the voices of their people, and protect their fundamental rights..

Heartiest congratulations to the Christian community on Easter. 
Wishing you peace, love and prosperity & we deeply acknowledge the contributions of the Christian community for Pakistan!
Wishing our Christian community a very happy and peaceful Easter.

Merciless slaying of innocent young men including a woman in Gaza & injuries caused to over 1400 peaceful protesters during the Land Day March is a slap in the face of the world conscience that continues to hibernate as the Palestinians suffer brutalities unleased by the Israelis

Listing of 9 talented young Pakistanis in the annual '30 under 30' Forbes Asia List is the best story to come out in recent weeks. Pakistan's youth, talented, committed & endowed with amazing entrepreneurial qualities, holds the key of its progress in their hands. Congrats to all

National Stadium Karachi will b hosting its 1st major cricketing event in 9 years. Today, our people's resilience and passion for cricket won over fear. Good luck to both the teams & the people of Karachi for hosting it. My advice 2 foreign players: DONT MISS BUNDU KHAN KE KEBAB!

Will be chairing the stock-take on health & education, the last of this tenure. We have used this quarterly mechanism to assess the pace of reforms in these sectors, identifying challenges & opportunities for optimum performance. Grateful to my colleagues & wonderful team!

‚ÄòThe Investment Forum: Punjab on a path to prosperity' organized by the Punjab Board of Investment and Trade today in Lahore showcases the development profile of the province built during last ten years. It tells the story of making Punjab the preferred investment hub.

What an exciting end to the playoffs! Excitement of the spectators was legendary in both matches ... Full marks to police, law enforcement agencies, district administration and PSL management for a job done wonderfully well. Good luck for the final match in Karachi!
What an amazing game of cricket ... Well done Peshawar ... could only watch the most sensational last over ... Well played Quetta!

As if Sharifs' & Dar's crime of money laundering & corruption had not taken enough of a toll on the country's economy, the disastrous policies of Dar have led to the rapid fall of rupee value over the last few months, piling up the mountain of external debt for Pakistani nation

The richest wealth is wisdom. The strongest weapon is patience. The best security is faith. The greatest tonic is laughter and the greatest force is love. The surest assurance is hope in God. And the source of our strength is the joy of the Lord. Surprisingly all are free.

Warm welcome to Quetta Gladiators, Peshawar Zalmi and Karachi Kings to Lahore .. Hope playoffs happen to be most exciting .. home crowds, home grounds and amazing display of cricketing skills will make PSL3 all the more fun .. Go and enjoy the matches :)

Heartiest congratulations to Air Chief Marshal Mujahid Anwar Khan on the assumption of command of Pakistan Air Force. PAF, under the leadership of the new Air Chief, will further go many notches higher in professional excellence.

Punjab Govt & Pakistan Air Force signed an agreement today for development & operation of Cadet College Fort Munro in DG Khan. The college will deliver quality educational services to the students of the region & be another milestone in the development profile of DG Khan Division
Finally finished attending the last and final membership camp in Multan. Today I have set a record attending 25 camps in 7 hours without any break. MashaAllah the country is ripe for a new dawn.

As I went around our membership camps in Multan city today I realised what a white elephant the Multan Metro is - hardly any buses & even fewer passengers. The project will need major subsidies to survive. Clear the project was for kickbacks going into offshore accts not for ppl.

Punjab Assembly has passed a landmark Punjab Sikhs Anand Karaj Marriages Act 2017. The new legislation has provided legal status to the Sikh marriages. Congrats to the Sikh community of Pakistan and the members of Punjab Assembly for such a tremendous legislation.

Brave police officials lay down their lives in the line of duty. The nation is proud of sacrifices that the Punjab police, security officials & our citizens have rendered in the war on terrorism. Prayers for the departed souls & bereaved families who lost their loved ones!

Death of iconic physicist Stephan Hawking is indeed a huge loss for humanity. Through his path-breaking research & scholarly contributions, he proved what a man can do; that it is the power of mind that can conquer any obstacle & physical disabilities mean nothing. RIP
Strongly condemn the attack by PM's son & his bodyguards in Senate gallery on our MNA Hamidul Haq. The Gullu Butt mindset of PMLN is pervasive in PMLN and is damaging to democracy in Pakistan.

We welcome the CJ probe into adverts where SS was told to return the taxpayers' money he spent on personal publicity. Nowhere in the world is taxpayer money used so shamelessly for personal publicity as in Pakistan. No wonder people are reluctant to pay their taxes.
Congratulations to Baloch Senator Sadiq Sanjirani for becoming Chairman Senate. This will strengthen the federation. We are happy for the people of Balochistan & for the federation of Pakistan.

I want to commend the KP police for succeeding in arresting the main accused in the Mashal Khan murder case, Arif Rangi, a PTI councillor. This is how a professional and depoliticised police force works, in contrast to the politicised police forces of Punjab and Sindh.

On International Women Day I want to reiterate PTI's commitment to fight for women's rights. We will also ensure the privileged few do not deprive ordinary women of their rights. Appreciate A Abbas raising this in SC and CJP supporting the rights of all citizens equally.

Today we celebrate the services, and contributions of our women that they are making for the development of Pakistan. Their struggles & stories are a source of inspiration. They are the linchpin of progress the country has made over the last seven decades. #InternationalWomensDay

The money in play in Senate elections is a major reason why the public's perception is strengthened that people come into politics to enrich themselves rather than serve the people
The horse trading in Senate elections allowed PPP to win 2 seats in KP where they only have 7 MPAs. This sort of electoral farce raises some serious ethical questions.

Senate elections yet again witnessed shameful horse trading where MPAs bought & sold their votes as country witnessed this sale of their "elected" ppl to highest bidder. This shows moral decline of our political class. In which Western democracy does such a sale happen?

PML-N rises to the occasion. Punjab MPAs prove all naysayers wrong by electing Dr Asad Ashraf with absolute majority. I dedicate this victory to the leadership of Muhammad Nawaz Sharif. Mubarak to all

Again govt chooses to target the masses by adding to their burden of taxes with latest petroleum products price hike. Shameful how govt refuses to collect taxes from the powerful & allows Sharifs & others of their ilk to continue draining national resources thru money laundering.
Wishing our Hindu community a very happy and peaceful Holi, the festival of colours.
Strongly condemn the incident of terrorism in Quetta. My sympathies and condolences are with the bereaved families.

I want to thank everyone for their prayers and good wishes on my marriage.

Saddened by the news of an Iranian plane crash and loss of precious lives in it. I extend my sympathies and condolences to the leadership and brotherly people of Iran. Our thoughts and prayers are with the bereaved families at this difficult hour.

Just addressed a book launching ceremony. The book titled 'Governing the Ungovernable", authored by renowned economist & public policy scholar Dr Ishrat Hussain, makes a strong case for responsive, robust & inclusive institutions for effective governance.

Shocking how PMLN govt has failed to counter the Indian narrative against Pak in the context of the FATF created to enforce the UN list of proscribed orgs & actions ag terror financing. This is a complete failure of PMLN's foreign policy & diplomacy.

Hopefully today details about the LNG deal will be made public in the SC. The nation desperately awaits as the secrecy surrounding this multi billion dollar deal with Qatar has aroused all manner of suspicions.

Deeply saddened by the news of sudden demise of renowned lawyer and human rights activist Asma Jahangir sahiba. Pakistan has lost a passionate champion of human rights and a staunch supporter of democracy. May her soul rest in peace!

The dream of Pakistan becoming a welfare state envisaged by our founding fathers rests on the premise of empowering people economically and educationally to shape their own lives. The projects such as Self-Employment Scheme and PEEF are helping realise this dream.
Thousands of students who got education under PEEF are contributing to national development. They are our role models with inspirational stories.
Every family that we empower economically becomes an example for many more and this way light continues to spread.

The return rate of the loans under CM's Self-Employment Scheme is 99.9%, something that strengthens one's conviction in the bright future of our motherland. Contrarily, the corrupt elite has got their loans worth billions of rupees written off by using its influence & positions.

Addressed a ceremony today to distribute interest-free loans among 25K families under CM‚Äôs Self-Employment Scheme, an initiative that benefited 1.85 million households. During 6 yrs, loans worth Rs.40Bn have been distributed among the poor, enabling them to transform their lives.

Strongly condemn rocket attack on the security forces' vehicle in North Waziristan. The armed forces of Pakistan are writing a glorious chapter of sacrifices in annals of national history. The nation stands united behind their forces in the war to flush out terrorism.
While others have been busy staging protests & sit-ins, we burnt midnight oil to serve the people. Inaugurated projects of worth Rs. 5.5 billion in the health sector in Multan, today‚Äôs afternoon.

In Mashal case, apart from the thoroughly professional job done by KP police, I would also like to commend the prosecution team's untiring efforts in giving valuable inputs at the investigation stage and of effective prosecution in  the court. A collective professional effort.

MSR and his media house had been targeting the KP police incessantly and without any substantive cause. Now, after the KP police performance in both Asma and Mashal cases, will MSR and his media house have the moral courage to apologise to the KP police and KP govt?

After court verdict on Mashal case, KP police has once again shown it's professionalism by bringing a murderous mob under the ambit of the law. This is the first time in Pakistan where police has been successful in bringing the main accused plus other mob mbrs to justice.
I want to thank the organisers, especially Babar Ata, for the fundraiser arranged at Bahria Enclave on Sunday 4th Feb for SKMT. Their efforts helped raise Rs 7 crores.

Nawaz as usual also held forth with a litany of lies abt KP govt. Fact is there are 350 micro hydel stations completed in KP - all NS had to do was to send his paid hacks to chk this out! As for police, health and education reforms - all NS had to do was to talk to KP ppl!

Yesterday Nawaz Sharif made clear his idea of democracy and of a PM heading a democratic govt was where the PM is above the law of the land after being elected. He can money launder,  evade taxes, conceal assets, lie before parl - all corruption is permissable coz PM is elected!

Durable peace in South Asia hinges on the resolution of Kashmir's longstanding issue in line with UN resolutions & Kashmiris' aspirations. No matter what, we will continue 2 provide our political, moral & diplomatic support 2 our Kashmiri brothers & sisters. #KashmirSolidarityDay

Strongly condemn the suicide attack on the army sports area in Swat.. Those who laid down their lives in the defence of the motherland are our benefactors. War on terror will be taken to its logical end until the last of terrorists is hunted down. Prayers with bereaved families!!

Strongly condemn the suicide attack on army unit sports area in Swat in which eleven including our soldiers and officer were martyred. May Allah give the families of these brave men the strength to bear their loss.
Saddened by the terrible news of Mir Hazar Khan Bijrani's death yesterday. He was always such a gentleman.

Want to congratulate the SC for moving against Nehal Hashmi on his abuse of &  threats to senior judiciary and their families. I can assure them the whole nation stands with the SC & they shd not be weighed down by the contemptuous & abusive behaviour of Sharifs & their darbaris.

We are petitioning SC for an early hearing of the case against Kh Asif as he is a grave security risk in the sensitive office he holds. He has a foreign domicile, works for a foreign concern, receives salary from abroad & has foreign bank accts - all of which he did not declare.
Deeply shocked to learn about the murder of veteran PPP politician Mir Hazar Khan Bijrani & his wife! May Allah rest their souls in eternal peace & give patience to the bereaved family & friends...
