Finally, a very important core of our textile policy will be zero rating of all textile export inputs.

Second point is that the profitability of the entire value chain will be made viable.Textile industry cannot compete internationally if the cotton farmer is not viable. Profitability of cotton farmer will be ensured by making available quality inputs at affordable prices.

Yesterday PTI launched its Textile policy in Faisalabad after consultations with all stakeholders in this critical industrial sector. PMLN govt, by putting heavy taxes on energy inputs, has made Pak industry uncompetitive.

PTI petition on Overseas Pakistanis voting rights before SC bench headed by CJP progressed forward today as NADRA committed to delivering a prog enabling Overseas Pak to vote, within a month. This right has been enshrined in the Constitution & ECP must facilitate.

Congrats to KP govt for yet another ppl-friendly initiative: 1st prov to actually enforce minimum wage for thousands of factory workers & factory owners now required to pay them thru banks. While fed & all prov govts set minimum wage in budgets, none enforce it as KP has now done
What a match.. superb bowling & brilliant team work... congrats team Pakistan!

Sad how controversy being created on whether or not Imran Ali had "accounts". We need to desist from sensationalism and press for a credible JIT to fully investigate the horrific tragedy of little Zainab and the other child victims of Kasur.

What a charged crowd it was at Malakwal.. Their chants resonated with their emotions. My conviction has further been reinforced that when you burn your midnight oil in serving the masses, they do respond. Vote of Mandi Bahauddin will be for politics of development inshaAllah!

After the arrest of Imran Ali in the Zainab case, a tale of a well-connected operation of child pornography, abuse & murder is unravelling as he is found to have numerous bank accts. Clearly the scale of these crimes ag our innocent children shows involvement of powerful people.

I congratulate the CJP for taking note of  disenfranchisement of Overseas Pakistanis & asking NADRA & ECP to find ways to give them their right of vote. Overseas Pakistanis are our most valuable asset.

Ahead of its annual moot, World Economic Forum has released an Inclusive Development Index 2018 that placed Pakistan @ 47th position way ahead of India that was ranked @ 62nd position on a list of 103 economies surveyed=>A proof that PMLN govt steered economy in right direction!

@MaryamNSharif @GovtOfPunjab Thank u baiti.. Allah b praised. With the prayers of Ami jee, parents of Zainab & whole nation we succeeded in resolving this heinous case that caused such a perpetual anxiety for me.. Thankful to my team & everyone who worked on this case.. May Allah keep our children safe!

Both NS & daughter know they will be convicted so they are attacking SC & NAB esp with NAB supplementary ref on JIT report's conclusion that Maryam is beneficial owner of the 4 Mayfair apartments & she gave fake documents to SC to cover this up. Forgery another crime committed.

Will launch Pakistan Sehat Card in district Layyah later today inshaAllah that will benefit 140,000 families by providing them health cover. With massive development works underway, the profile of district Layyah is changing.

If he is clean he should face all charges like I did and disprove them.

Addressed press conf in which I responded 2 all of the 3 baseless allegations made by some 'hyper-efficient' NAB officials reg Ashiana housing scheme. Earlier in my meeting with NAB officials 2, I trashed false, misleading& absurd allegations with complete facts, figures & record
Shocking how govt has rejected all the names submitted for selection of Prosecutor General NAB. Sharifs still trying to get their own umpires to save their corruption.

Sharifs after having their billions in corruption exposed have taken to issuing threats to NAB & the senior judiciary. This is absolutely shameful & unacceptable. People will not allow this Sharif dictatorship - this "fironiyat" that they have practiced for 3 decades to continue.

Now the motive behind NS's public mtgs has become evident with his declaration that the SC will have to take back their decision on his disqualification. He is seeking to build public pressure & in the process has let slip the fake sincerity in his desperate cry:Mujhe kyun nikala

The SKMT dinner last night in Dubai broke all records for overseas fundraisers. I want to congratulate our team and thank the people of Dubai for helping create this record with $ 900k in cash being collected.

Punjab police's brutal "encounters" are well documented. Sindh's highly politicised police is no better. Today SP (Rao Anwar) killed a boy named Naqeeb ullah Mehsud in Karachi. He had been picked by police on 7 Jan & today he was killed in an "encounter". Utterly condemnable

Very sad to know martyrdom of our police officials in Quetta. Terrorists are a blot on the face of our society. Their cowardly acts cannot undermine our resolve to rid this land of scourge of terrorism. We will eliminate them with the power of unity and conviction inshaAllah.
Fasten your seatbelts as I will be making explosive revelations in my press conference this afternoon!

When a Parliament, which must protect nation's interests, passes a person-specific law allowing a disqualified person guilty of Rs 3 bn money laundering, tax evasion, concealment of assets, forgery & perjury to become head of a pol party, then such a law is a "laanath" on Parl.

If our Zainabs and Asmas cannot stop us from playing sordid political games and unite us for safety and bright future of our children, NOTHING ELSE WILL. I appeal to all to rise above their biases and speak with one single voice. Let our children not say that we failed them!

Grieved to know abt 3-year old Asma's murder in Mardan. Issue of child abuse is above all divides of politics, caste, regions & ethnicity. Let us get together 2 bring all those 2 justice that r targeting the future of our nation, our children. We can fight political battles later

Empowering students to become problem solvers is at the heart of our education reforms. The launch of Punjab Next Generation School Initiative tomorrow IA is meant to unlock creative potential of our students to be innovators & critical thinkers.

Going 2 launch various educational initiatives tomorrow IA as part of our education reforms roadmap. These reforms r aimed @ improving learning outcomes & addressing challenges of enrollment, retention & provision of quality education; areas Punjab shown significant progress in..

If the Geo/Jang investigative journalists do not have the moral fibre to answer the 5 questions I have asked abt MSR then it implies they are prepared to work for a man who takes money from those whose agendas can harm Pak such as NS who has money laundered Rs 300 bn from nation.

4. NS & MSR can rest assured that their vicious campaign has only strengthened my resolve to fight them all the way.

1. For 3 days I have been wondering have I looted a bank; or money laundered bns in nation's wealth; or ordered a model-town-like killing spree; or revealed state secrets to India? I have done none of these but discovered I have committed a bigger crime: wanting to get married.
Sad to hear of the passing of Zubaida Apa - she introduced our rich culinary traditions to younger generations. She leaves a void that will be difficult to fill.
Saddened to learn of Air Chief Marshal Asghar Khan's death early this morning. He transformed the PAF and was a man of steadfast principles and integrity. My prayers and condolences go to his family.

Deeply saddened by the news of passing away of renowned chef & a great human being Zubaida Apa. She was a household name, thanks to her amazing expertise in cooking. May Allah Almighty bless her soul in peace and grant patience to her family!

Served a defamation notice on ARY News & 92News Channels for false, fabricated & utterly misleading reporting on my recent visit to the brotherly country of Saudi Arabia. It is hard to fathom the lows some of so-called channels have fallen to in pursuit of their vested interests!

Shameful how Sindh govt used force in Karachi on a peaceful protest by sugar cane growers against the grave injustice being done to them by the sugar mills. We stand with the hard working farmers who should get the right price from the powerful sugar mills' owners cartel.

From the start I had opposed Pak becoming part of US-led so-called "War on Terror". Now, after suffering 70k dead, over $100 bn loss to economy, when we had nothing to do with 9/11, constant " do more" US taunts & after nation has been humiliated by Trump, GoP saying the same.

During my first visit after inauguration of the 1st phase of PKLI&RC, I was pleased to observe patients' satisfaction. We have envisaged it not just as a hospital. Rather it is a research centre that will offer & implement a complete program for hepatitis prevention & treatment..
My name is Khan and I am not a terrorist. Moreover, the SC has pronounced me Sadiq and Ameen and I am coming after them crooks!

Absolutely shameful how the govt has dropped a petrol bomb on the poor nation at the start of 2018. Instead  of undertaking tax reforms and cracking down on money laundering, the govt continues to burden the masses - this time with a big increase in petroleum products' prices.

We thank Allah for the good things that happened over the past 12 months & seek His forgiveness for our failings. Let us be the source of comfort to the less privileged. Will IA continue to serve my people with my soul & heart for nothing is nobler than this mission. Happy 2018!

For me 2018 promises to be a most exciting time in Pakistan's history as the nation stands on the threshold of change with justice and rule of law bringing an end to corruption mafias; & making this country great and prosperous for ALL its citizens.

As 2017 draws to a close, we as a nation should thank Allah by making it a year which gave us hope for justice as the entrenched corruption mafia crumbled because of the SC & work of JIT which brought the powerful under Rule of Law.

For how long will Pakistan have to suffer the constant humiliation wrought on it by the greedy Sharif brothers dashing abroad seeking help from foreign leaders to save the wealth they plundered from the nation? The Sharifs greed is becoming a national security threat for Pak

New revelations made by us today show the rise & rise of Dar from Sharif's munshi to millionaire to billionaire! Apart from the Dar family's 2 $200m towers in Dubai, we have uncovered Dar's 11 companies, one of which owns 52 Dubai villas;

I have always maintained Panama & Iqama were only a tip of the corruption iceberg. Tomorrow in my press conference I will reveal more facts about the ill-gotten wealth/properties stashed abroad by the Sharifs & their corruption mafia.

Visited the site of PKLI early this morning. Progress on construction of PKLI & RC going as per plan.. Directed Minister and Secretary Health to shift their offices to the site to ensure the completion of Phase1 of this project by 25th Dec inshaAllah...

I challenge Nawaz Sharif to start a Tehreek against judiciary as I will start one in support of our judiciary & we will see whom the people support. Or if he has the courage he should tell his puppet PM Abbasi to call early elections & let the nation make its choice.

Must thank Naeem Bokhari for his excellent defence as my lawyer in 2 landmark cases before Supreme Court - both of which we won - and for doing these cases gratis as part of his commitment to PTI of which he is an integral part.

Grieved over loss of precious lives in Quetta Church. Pakistan belongs to all of its citizens. All places of worship r sacred. As a nation, we will make sure that terrorism is eliminated. My sympathies r with bereaved families who lost their loved ones in this despicable attack!

Strongly condemn terror attack on church in Quetta targeting our innocent citizens during their prayer service. The govt must ensure special protection for churches as Christmas approaches. My prayers go to the victims' families & for the speedy recovery of the injured.

JKT you have shown unswerving commitment to the cause of Naya Pakistan & worked with utmost dedication for our cause. For me it doesn't matter whether you hold a position in PTI or are in Parliament, you will always remain right next to me as we build Naya Pakistan InshaAllah.

Today as we remember with sorrow the devastating terrorist attack on APS Peshawar that martyred our precious innocent children & their teachers, we must ensure this can never happen again so our future generations can be nurtured safely to follow their dreams

Two more brave sons of the soil offer the supreme sacrifice of their lives in the line of duty. Our armed forces are writing the story of Pakistan with their blood. We are proud of their valour. Terrorists cannot browbeat a nation whose people are ready to offer any sacrifice.

Govt's non-serious approach to FATA reforms is an insult to the ppl of FATA who have sacrificed so much but have still to be given their full democratic rights. Delay in implementing the complete reforms package is causing unrest in FATA & will have serious repercussions.

A supreme sacrifice rendered by Major Ishaq in a search op against terrorists !! It is this spirit of sacrifice & commitment to protect motherland against all manner of threats that makes us so much indebted to the sons of the soil.. My deepest condolences to the bereaved family!

Today all PMLN members of the NA should hang their heads in shame for making a farce out of our democracy. They opposed an amendment to the election law, simply to allow NS to remain as head of PMLN despite being disqualified from membership of Parliament under the Constitution.

Remembering Faiz on his death anniversary today - a poet with a vision for empowering the poor, liberating people from shackles of occupation and standing up against imperialists and their apologists.
